pa'i smon lam gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dbang rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'gengs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rgyu 'thun pas mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas

kyi rnam par 'phrul pa khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams kyi smon lam gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar rgyu dang rkyen la pa'i sgo bcu po 'di dag la pa rgyu dang rkyen la

pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad byung ngo / /'byung ngo 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byung ba shin tu

bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas ye shes yul ni bsam yas pas/ /byin rlabs rnam 'phrul de dag 'di lta bu/ /

zhing rnams rgya mtsho bstan pa mtha' dbus med/ /rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi yongs su sbyangs/ /byang chub sems ni kun gyi bsam pa bzhin/ /smon lam rgya mtsho bsam yas rnam sbyangs shing / /sems can las rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pas/ /

phyogs kun zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad 'byung / /byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi rnam 'phrul dang / /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i sgos/ /smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon bsgrubs shing / /nam mkha'i dbyings la 'byam klas zhing

'byung ngo / /spyod pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus rnams/ /spyod cing tshad med bde gshegs yul la 'jug /phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun sbyong zhing / /bskal pa mtha' yas zhing rnams re rer spyod/ /sems can bsam dbyings

bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /las kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad byung / /nyon mongs las kyis de dag nyon mongs bcas/ /mos dang bsam pas rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam dag rgyan can rnams/ /rin

chen rgyus byung sna tshogs dri med pa/ /dad pa rgya mtsho rnam par spel ba'i phyir/ /rgyal sras rnams ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams spyod/ /chos dbyings rdul gyi khongs su rgyal sras rnams/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyad pa spyod pa dag /rdul gyi khongs

su mtha' yas zhing ston te/ /rnam dag mkha' bzhin mtha' dang dbus yang / /nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra'i rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste/ /snying po byang chub rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na/ /pad+mo'i stan 'khod kha dog mtha' yas kun/ /de dag zhing

bcas lus kyi nang na 'khod/ /skad cig sems kyis dus gsum byung ba yi/ /zhing 'byung tshul dang 'jug pa kun kyang ston/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dus gsum zhing bstan pa/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgya mtsho'i zhing zad/ /tshul gyi khyad par mtha'

yas sna tshogs pas/ /rdul rnams kun la mtha' yas rgyan gyi rnams/ /sangs rgyas skad cig gcig la byin gyis rlob/ /rgyan gyi rnam pa tshul kun rab tu mkhyen/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gnas pa shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho kun la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas la rab tu gnas so/ /

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po

che thams cad kyi kha dog gi mdog la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sgyu ma lta bu'i las kyi byung ba lha ma yin dang mthu bo che lta bu'i

lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus

rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi byung ba'i rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas te/ de dag la pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gnas pa shin tu bstan pa

ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu gnas pa shin tu bstan pa'i don 'di nyid yongs su bstan

pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /kun kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'di dag rin chen rang bzhin dri pa/ /rnam dag sna tshogs nor bu kun 'bar 'od zer rgya mtsho'i 'od ldan ltos/ /'di dag rgyal ba'i byin rlabs

rgyu yis dbyings legs 'khor bar rnam par snang / /de dag gis ni phyogs bcu nam mkha'i dbyings rnams gzhi kun rab tu khyab/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la dri 'od can nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas/ /snang ba'i snying po 'od can nor bu'i rgya mtsho dag la legs

par gnas/ /'gro ba de dbus rgyal ba 'khor la chos kyi 'khor lo bzang po bskor/ /'di ni sangs rgyas yul yin sems can rgya chen shin tu mgu ba byed pa'o/ /la la me tog sgron ma kun tu rgyas pa'i mu tig nor bus brgyan/ /'od zer dra ba'i kun nas

sprin 'bar spos 'phro sprin gyi 'od can te/ /zhing mang mtha' dang dbus med rgya chen pad+mo'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab brgyan zhing rnams 'byam klas kun kyang rab tu mdzes/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho dkyil 'khor dbyings rnams la la sangs

rgyas byin la gnas/ /yangs shing rin chen mang ldan rgya chen de dag byang chub sems dpas gang / /lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho mang tshogs lha dbang lus la de bzhin gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan rnam par snang ba mdzad kyi 'khor lo rtag tu 'khor/ /

nor bu'i shing dang spos kyi 'od 'phro'i sprin rnams mnyam pa'i dbyings la gnas/ /chu yi phung po dag dang rdo rje'i rgya mtsho brtan la'ang de bzhin gnas/ /la la gos dang brag dang rgyal mtshan me tog rgya chen dag la gnas/ /kun na'ang rnam 'phrul 'di

dag rgya chen rnam par snang mdzad ston pa mdzad/ /zhing rnams ring dang thung dang gling gi gzugs dang rnam pa sna tshogs te/ /sna tshogs rgyan can snying po dri ma bral ba yongs dag dri med snang / /rnam pa sna tshogs de dag smon lam rgya mtsho'i dbyings la rab tu gnas/ /

sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun nas yog par rtag tu nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'byam klas la la spyi'u tshugs yod dang med la gnas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i cod pan rin chen 'khor los bzung bas dag par gnas/ /de na sangs

rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen thams cad kun nas rab tu snang / /rin chen sangs rgyas gsung rnams kun tu gtong ldan las kyis de dag sprul/ /chos kyi dbyings mnyam zhing rnams 'byam klas mig yor sgyu ma dang yang 'dra/ /mig 'phrul rnam phye rnam dag dri

med sems kyis shin du bskyed pa ste/ /nam mkha'i dbyings rnams sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po gnas 'gyur 'di la snang / /las kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas bstan/ /skad cig sems kyis zhing rnams 'byam klas 'gro

ba'i kun dang mnyam pa'i rnams/ /zhing rdul kun la kun tu bzang po rtag par rab tu sgrub byed cing / /de na bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba smin par bya phyir spyad pa spyod/ /chos dbyings rgyas par bkang ste de dag kun tu rnam 'phrul rgya chen ston/ /rdul rnams

kun na chos dbyings yangs pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang gnas/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis byin gyis brlabs pas kun kyang yog cing yongs su rgyas/ /ji ltar rdul phran gcig la rnam 'phrul de bzhin 'gro ba kun na'o/ /rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas

rnam 'phrul rgya chen rab tu ston pa mdzad/ /zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad mig yor lta bu sgyu ma smyig rgyu 'dra/ /snang ba med cing 'byung med phyogs bcu dag na 'gro dang 'ong ba med/ /mkha' la gnas pa de dag rtag par 'byung zhing 'jig par de bzhin

'gyur/ /shin tu yangs pa de dag smon lam rnam sbyangs las kyis yongs su bzung / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyi dbyibs ni rnam pa sna tshogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam

klas pa la la ni kun nas zlum po'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas gru bzhi'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni nam mkha'i rnam pa du mar rnam par phye ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas

pa la la ni kun nas 'khyil ba'i dbyibs su 'dug go /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni 'od 'phro ba'i ri'i dbyibs su 'dug go /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni shing sna tshogs kyi lhun gyi dbyibs su 'dug go /'jig

rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni me tog sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni khyim sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug go /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni sems can sna

tshogs kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug go /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni mtshan sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug ste/ de dag la pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyibs shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu

phra ba snyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs kyi tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rnam pa

sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing la ltos/ /rnam phye sna tshogs mtha' yas dbyibs su gnas/ /dbyibs kyis rnam par phye ba sna tshogs te/ /phyogs rnams kun nas zhing rnams rgya mtsho snang / /la la zlum po la la zur gsum ste/ /de dag

la la phyogs nang gru bzhir gnas/ /nor bu pad+mo 'khor lo'i yan lag brgyad/ /kun kyang las rnams rgya mtshos rnam par bris/ /rdul med 'od kyi dbyibs dang tshul 'dzin cing / /gser las grub pa rnam phye sna tshogs te/ /sgo mang mtha' yas pa nas

rgyu zhing 'jug /las rnams rgya mtsho bsam pa dag pas gnas/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs snying po can/ /nam mkha' 'di la ji ltar sprin gnas bzhin/ /de dag rin chen mang zhing rnam par phye/ /de dag kun na sangs rgyas rnam par

mdzes/ /zhing rnams 'di kun sems kyis rnam par brtags/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang snang bas kun nas gnas/ /rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad/ /bde dang sdug bsngal myong bar

gyur pa ni/ /rnam par dag dang nyon mongs tshul bzhin te/ /chos nyid 'di ni rtag tu yod pa yin/ /de ltar las rnams rgya mtsho bsam mi khyab/ /skra gcig rtse la bsam gyis mi khyab cing / /thams cad rdul med sna tshogs dbyibs su gnas/ /

kun nas sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs/ /'khor rnams rgya mtshor chos rnams rab tu ston/ /rdul gcig rtse la phra dang yangs pa'i rnams/ /thams cad rdul snyed kha dog kun dang ldan/ /kha dog dbyibs rnams kun kyang rnam par

brtags/ /de dag kun na rgyal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor/ /rdul rnams kun la rab tu zhing bstan pa/ /de dag smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa yin/ /nam mkha'i dbyings su las kyis sprul pa ni/ /sna tshogs sems dang bsam pas rnam par brtags/

sems can kun mnyam rdul rnams thams cad la/ /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa dag /rnam par snang mdzad chos nyid de yin te/ /rdul phran kun la zhing rnams shin tu gnas/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya

mtsho'i lhun dag ni gzhan dang gzhan du shes par bya ste/ /'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che'i rgyun thams cad kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su bkod pa'i

rgyan gyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni 'od kha dog sna tshogs kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams cad kyi mdog gi

lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rdo rje'i gzhi mi shigs pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi brlabs kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che'i mtshan

nyid kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nyi ma'i nor bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che shin tu phra ba 'dzin pa'i

lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni snang ba'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog 'od 'phro ba'i rnam pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dri dang kha dog sna tshogs kyi

spos kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog cod pan gyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams

cad shin tu bstan pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sems kyi rnam par rtog pa skad cig gcig gis pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi rin

po che'i dbyibs kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs rnam par dmigs pa'i lhun can no/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid la rab tu gzud par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag

smras so/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams la ni/ /rin chen rang bzhin kun nas gnas/ /rdo rje bzhin du mi shigs sra/ /rin chen pad+mo rnams la gnas/ /la la 'od zer rang bzhin te/ /dag cing gzung med 'od zer 'byung / /rgyan rnams kun gyi 'od

zer gyis/ /sna tshogs mkha' bzhin dri ma med/ /la la 'od kyi rang bzhin te/ /dag cing 'od gsal gzer la gnas/ /'od kyi sprin can sna tshogs 'od/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la ni/ /

mig yor lta bur gnas pa ste/ /brjod du med cing gzung du med/ /smon lam dbang gis rab tu byung / /la la nor bu mu tig rgyu/ /snying po thams cad rnam par 'bar/ /mu tig 'khor lo'i gzhi dag la/ /byang chub sems dpa' yongs su gang / /

rin chen 'od 'phro byung ba'i zhing / /'od 'phro'i sprin gyis mngon khebs shing / /rin chen thams cad sna tshogs ldan/ /thams cad las kyi sprul pa yin/ /la la mtshan las byung ba ste/ /gzhi kun mtshan gyis kun tu bris/ /cod

pan rnam pa sna tshogs bkod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par sprul/ /rgya mtsho'i sems las byung ba yi/ /zhing rnams mos pa nyid la gnas/ /yul na mi gnas sgyu ma bzhin/ /yongs su rtog pas yang dag bskyed/ /sangs

rgyas sku yi 'od zer gyis/ /nor bu sna tshogs kun tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams rnam par snang / /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab sprul nas/ /la la kun tu bzang po yis/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho shin tu sprul/ /

nam mkha'i rgyan rnams thams cad dang / /smon lam rnams kyis rnam par bris/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar

pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phros pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'khor lo rjes su brjod cing rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams

kyi rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho las rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i glong yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan sna tshogs rnam par

dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste sems kyi skad cig la bskal pa mtha' yas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste rin

po che dang spos thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste snying po byang chub kyi rgyan dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang / spyod pa yongs su ston

pa'i rgyan dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rgya che mtha' yas te/ /rnam

dag las kyis rnam pa sna tshogs gnas/ /phyogs bzhi zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnams kun kyang / /sna tshogs rgyan can yangs par kun nas gnas/ /kha dog sna tshogs yangs pa'i zhing gi rnams/ /rgya mtsho rtag par phyogs rnams kun tu 'byung / /

rgyan dang rin chen 'od 'phro sna tshogs sprin/ /sgra 'byin zhing gi dbyings rnams khebs par byed/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho rnams/ /de dag kun kyang rgya mtsho'i zhing na grags/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang smon lam sprin gyi rnams/ /

de dag zhing mang rgya mtshor sgra yang 'byin/ /'gro ba'i las rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa dag /rgyan gyi sprin rnams kun nas sgrar 'byin te/ /sems can de dag rnam smyin ci 'dra ba/ /sangs rgyas byin gyis kun nas sgra yang sgrog /dus gsum 'byung

ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /rnam 'phrul zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang / /dmigs pa re re la yang sangs rgyas kun/ /de 'dra'i zhing mang rgya mtsho'i rgyan la ltos/ /'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang / /phyogs bcu'i da

ltar 'byung ba ji snyed pa'i/ /bskal pa de dag rgyan mang yangs pa yang / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho re re dag na snang / /dmigs pa kun la sangs rgyas sprin gyi rnams/ /'gro dang mnyam pas 'jig rten kun tu 'gengs/ /rnam par 'phrul

zhing sems can rnam par 'dul/ /'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to/ /spos 'od sprin dang de bzhin me tog klung / /rgyan rnams sna tshogs thams cad kun nas kyang / /rtag par kun tu khyab par rab tu 'byung / /'di ni zhing rnams rgya

mtsho'i rnam thar to/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi snying po byang chub rnams/ /sna tshogs rgyan can kun kyang ma lus par/ /thams cad rgya mtsho'i zhing 'di dbyings dag na/ /nam mkha'i sprin bzhin rnam par ston pa snang / /rgyal

sras kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas 'byam klas rgyan gyi rnams/ /'gro ba'i grangs snyed bskal pa rgya mtshor rnam sbyangs pa/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na rab tu snang / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya

mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la bsten pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas skal ba mnyam pa dang / byang chub

sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi bsod nams rgya chen po'i sprin rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad rab tu brtan pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / yongs su sbyangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa

thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu 'god cing gzud pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa dang / 'byung ba rgya mtsho la rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub

pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshul yang dag par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa dang /

de dag la pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par

bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid rnam par bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad sna tshogs rgyan/ /smon lam tshul rnams rgya mtsho kun

gyis byung / /kha dog mtha' yas las kyi rgya mtsho dag /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rtag tu 'od mang 'gyed/ /sngan cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing / /bskal pa mnyam pa'i las dge yongs sbyangs te/ /snying rje byams pas dgongs yangs

kun bkang zhing / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa 'di kun sbyangs/ /chos sgo kun tu ting 'dzin sa kun gyis/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho yangs sbyangs te/ /bsam gtan tshul dang rnam thar sa sbyang zhing / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs yangs pa byung / /

mos pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas stobs bskyed cing / /rgyal ba'i mnyam nyid ma nor rtogs byas nas/ /bzod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams yongs sbyangs shing / /rnam dag kha dog mtha' yas zhing rnams byung / /bsod nams sprin ni nam mkha' mnyam

bskyed cing / /'gro ba kun phan bde don spyod spyad de/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho sems can kun bstan pas/ /'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed tshad med pa'i/ /pha rol phyin pa ma lus kun sbyangs te/ /

smon lam mthar phyin mi zad goms byas pas/ /dri med rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yangs pa 'byung / /'byung ba'i spyod pa gang yod tshad med dang / /chos rnams thams cad yangs pa yongs sbyangs te/ /sna tshogs thabs sgos sems can sbyangs pas na/ /'di

'dra yid 'ong rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'byung / /rgyan rnams kun gyi tshul dang sa sbyangs shing / /rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho kun zhugs nas/ /'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal mtsho bskams pas/ /zhing gi mtsho yangs 'di kun dag

par 'gyur/ /stobs rnams rgya mtsho gzhal med yongs sbyangs shing / /'gro ba 'di 'dra tshad med rnams sbyangs te/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yangs kun bsnyen bkur bas/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam mang rnam par dag /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig

rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku chung ngur kun tu ston to/ /'di lta ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni chos kyi

dbyings thams cad gzugs kyi skus gang bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku tshe'i tshad mi ring ngo / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku tshe'i tshad ring ngo / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob po/ /

sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob po/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni tshul gcig gis bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob po/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni tshul bsam gyis mi khyab

par bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob po/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sems can gyi khams nyung ngu rnam par gdul ba byin gyis rlob po/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa rnam par gdul ba byin gyis rlob ste/ /

de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i phyogs 'di

nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rgyal ba 'byung ba thabs rnams sna tshogs kyi/ /sgo nas zhing rnams rgya mtshor rab tu 'byung / /de dag sems can bsam pa

ji bzhin mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas thabs kyi sgo mang rgya mtsho'o/ /sangs rgyas chos sku bsam gyis khyab ste/ /mig yor ma yin mtshan nyid med pa'i gzugs/ /gzugs kyi khyad par 'gro ba 'di dag tu/ /sems can bsam pa'i phyogs bzhin

ston la ltos/ /sku tshe thung bar la la rnam par ston/ /la la bskal pa bsam yas byin gyis rlob/ /chos kyi sku ni phyogs rnams kun gyi sgo/ /rab tu mdzes par 'gro ba 'di na bzhugs/ /la la zhing rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas dag /sbyong

zhing 'byam klas phyogs bcu kun na yang / /la la zhing gcig rnam par sbyong ba mdzad/ /smon lam ma lus kun kyang tshul gcig go /la la bsam gyis mi khyab theg pa'i rgyan/ /sems can yid bzhin sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad/ /la la theg

pa gcig kyang rab ston te/ /rgyal ba'i thabs ni gcig kyang mtha' yas so/ /rang byung la la byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ /sems can mi mang lam la gzhog pa mdzad/ /la la skad cig gcig gis sems can rnams/ /rgya mtsho bsam

yas byang chub don du 'dul/ /la la spu yi sgo nas bsam yas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sprin rnams rab tu 'gyed/ /'gro ba kun tu de dag mngon bkang zhing / /thabs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul ba mdzad/ /la la sangs rgyas gsung gis

kun bkang zhing / /zhing du sems can yid bzhin rab tu sgrog /bsam yas bskal par de dag gsung sgrog cing / /sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas rnam par 'dul/ /la la zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /'khor rnams yang dag kun

nas 'khod bcas pas/ /zhing mang rgya mtsho phyogs su gang byas shing / /sangs rgyas mkha' la sprin ltar khyab par bzhugs/ /de ltar sangs rgyas thabs ni bsam mi khyab/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu rgyas bkang zhing / /

'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas mngon sum ste/ /sna tshogs rgyan mang du ma'i tshul dang ldan/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba

snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa tshad med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa dpag tu med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya

mtsho la la ni bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa mtshungs pa med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa kun nas mtha' yas par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa

kun nas mu med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa gzhal du med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa brjod du med par byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ de dag la pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa byin

gyis rlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid yongs su bstan

pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'jig rten rgya mtsho'i bskal pa tha dad de/ /sna tshogs tshul 'jug rgyan rnams gzhan dang gzhan/ /phyogs bcu'i

zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang / /bskal pa'i tshul ni rgya mtsho grangs kyang med/ /bskal pa mi mthun 'gro ba kun dang mnyam/ /phyogs dbyings 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams na snang / /bskal pa mtha' yas la la ring dang thung / /bskal pa

sna tshogs rgyal ba'i sgras kyang bsgrags/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams 'di dag phyogs dbyings snang / /byin rlabs bskal pa zhing rdul snyed dang ldan/ /la la gzhan rnams bskal pa gcig gis 'jug /la la bskal grangs smon lam du mas byung / /

bskal pa la la dri med la la nyon mongs can/ /la la rnam dag la la nyon mongs rnam par dag /bskal pa'i ming ni smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis byung / /sems can 'du shes rnam pas tha dad tshul la 'jug /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed sngon cad spyod spyad pas/ /'jig

rten khams rnams rgya mtsho shin tu yangs shing dag /de dag kun nas sangs rgyas yul rgyan tshad kyang med/ /'di dag rgya chen bskal pa'i 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams/ /bskal pa'i 'od dang 'od zer rin chen ming sna tshogs/ /bcom ldan dbyangs dang

'od mnyam 'od 'phro'i mig snang ba/ /snang dang dri med bzang po bskal pa'i ming la 'jug/ /bskal pa 'di dag rnam dag bskal pa kun las byung / /dri med bskal pa la lar sangs rgyas gcig skye'o/ /bskal pa la lar mi yi gtso bo mtha' yas

'byung / /bskal pa'i tshul rnams thams cad sa tshul zad mi shes/ /smon lam stobs mthus bskal pa sna tshogs 'jug par 'gyur/ /bskal pa la la mtha' yas rnams kyang bskal pa gcig tu 'dus/ /bskal pa la la gcig kyang bskal pa bye ba'i mthu/ /

bskal pa rgya mtsho kun kyang sna tshogs sgo nas 'jug/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi nang nas sgra yang 'byin/ /bskal pa la lar bskal pa kun gyi rkyen kyang 'byung / /ming gi rgyan rnams rnam par dag pa'ang de la yod/ /bskal pa la la sangs rgyas rdzu

'phrul mthu yis 'byung / /bskal pa'i tshul rnams kun gyi 'di ni rgyan yangs yin/ /zhing dang bskal pa rgya mtsho tshul ni gcig gis dag /zhing gi rdul rnams kun kyang tshad med gzhal du med/ /skad cig yud tsam nyi ma'i grangs

kyis bskal par 'gyur/ /'di dag thams cad sems can 'du shes rnam par byung / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/

'di ltar chos nyid rab tu thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag bskal pas 'jig cing 'du ba la rab tu 'jug par gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa kun nas gnas pa dang /

'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po pa rnam par dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag par gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' mos pa sna

tshogs kyi spyod pa rnams skye bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnam par dag la kun nas nyon mongs par gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste sems can rgya mtsho rgya chen po byang chub kyi sems la gnas pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin du dag par gnas pa dang / 'di lta

ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan du 'dod pas bskal pa rgyan tha dad pa'i tshul du gnas pa dang 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'dus pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa rgyan shin tu

mang por kun nas gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi rgyan nub par 'gyur ba dang / 'di lta ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams rgyan gyis

brgyan par kun nas gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa yongs su dag par gnas pa dang / de dag la pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i

rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho kun nas gnas pa'i tshul ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs

su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i chos nyid 'di dag ltos/ /chos kyis byung ste ji ltar gnas pa ltar/ /de dag 'byung zhing 'jig

par 'gyur ba yang / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu snang / /sems can nyon mongs mi zad ldan pa dang / /las dang nyon mongs ngan pas bsgribs pa'i rnams/ /de dag bsam la zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams/ /kun nas nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yin/ /

sems can rnam dag bsam pa ldan rnams dang / /bsod nams brtan dang rnam dag spyod yul can/ /rnam dag yul la nyon mongs ldan gyur rnams/ /de dag mos pa sna tshogs spyod yul gyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i dus dag na/ /bskal

pa de ni rnam par dag par snang / /sems can nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yang / /de yi chos nyid bsam yas yangs pa yi/ /byang chub bsam pa ji ltar bskyed pa dang / /de dag bsam pa ji ltar rnam 'phel bas/ /de bzhin bskal pa rgya mtsho mang

po dag /bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyan yongs su sbyong / /bye ba mang po mtha' yas mi zad pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu kun rgyu yang / /rgyan la rnam pa tha dad yod pa min/ /bskal pa tha dad tshul gyi bye brag snang / /rdul rnams re re

sbubs su dus kun tu/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa yi/ /rgyal sras ji tshul 'dod pa de bzhin du/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho de tshul dag par 'gyur/ /gal te rgyal ba rnams ni skyer 'gyur na/ /zhing rnams rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan

par 'gyur/ /bsam pa yongs su dag bzhin rgyas 'gyur te/ /'di na zhing rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /gal te rgyal ba mya ngan 'das gyur na/ /de tshe de zhing rgyan rnams 'grib par 'gyur/ /sems can rnams kyang snod du rung ba min/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho de yang nyon mongs

ldan/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul yangs pa dag /bsam gyis mi khyab gang tshe ston pa na/ /de tshe zhing rnams rgya mtsho mang po dag /kun kyang rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan par 'gyur/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha dad pa'i tshul

ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ /de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni

'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas skye zhing 'byung ba tha mi dad pa dang 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho dag gi snying po byang chub thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rgyas par 'gengs pa tha mi dad pa dang 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin dang / mtshan gyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa dang 'di lta ste/

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bskal pa mtha' yas par brjod cing rgyas par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tha mi dad pa dang /

'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du ba tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul 'byam klas pa thams cad la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi yul

rgya chen po ston cing brjod pa tha mi dad pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /rdul gcig steng na zhing mang rgya mtsho ste/ /kun na rgyan mang

rnam dag kun yod kyang / /gnod pa med cing 'dra ba gang yang med/ /'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'di la ltos/ /rdul rnams kun la bsam yas sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pa yid bzhin du/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho

thams cad khyab byas kyang / /de dag thabs la tha dad gang yang med/ /rdul rnams kun la shing dbang mtha' yas pa/ /sna tshogs rgyan phyung kun nas bres sbyangs te/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing du mngon bkang yang / /de dag tha dad 'gyur ba

nam yang med/ /rdul phran rgya mtsho rdul phran re re la/ /mi yi gtso bo 'khor rnams kun bskor cing / /'jig rten kun tu bkang ste 'phags bzhugs kyang / /gnod pa dag dang 'dra ba'i nyes pa med/ /rdul gcig la ni mtha' yas 'od kyi sprin/ /

phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun bkang zhing / /bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub spyod bstan kyang / /rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams tha dad gang yang med/ /rdul rnams kun la kha dog bsam mi khyab/ /sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun tu gang

byas te/ /sangs rgyas sprul pas sems can rnam 'dul yang / /'byam klas phyogs na tha dad gang yang med/ /rdul rnams kun la rgya mtsho'i chos brjod de/ /de dag 'khor lo tshul bzhin 'khor mdzad cing / /thabs dang mthu yi sgo mo sna tshogs kyis/ /

thams cad brjod kyang de la tha dad med/ /rdul gcig la ni rgyal ba kun gyi gsung / /'gro ba snod du gyur la de dag brjod byas te/ /rgya mtsho'i zhing du bskal par byin brlabs kyang / /de dag gsung gi yan lag tha mi dad/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas

rgyan gyi rnams/ /thams cad rdul sbubs gcig tu rab tu 'dzud/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu la ltos/ /las kyi dngos las de dag skyes pa min/ /rdul gcig la ni dus gsum rgyal ba dag /ji ltar byung ba de dag thams cad snang / /de dag

gshegs dang byon pa gang yang med/ /'gro ba kun nas sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa'i phyogs gsal bar bya ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ste le'u bzhi pa'o// //sangs rgyas

rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po brgyad pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad sngon byang chub

sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su dag par byas te/ bskal pa re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung du/

smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su dag par byas so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa de ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu

bzung ba ste/ de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'og ma ni gzhi kun nas rton pa zhes bya ste/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar bas brgyan pa'i gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/

nor bu'i rgyal po 'od rnam par dag pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che'i mthu zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro ba mnyam par ston pa zhes bya ba

yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rgyan kun nas rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba yod de/ 'od zer gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi me tog gi gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil

'khor gzhi kun nas dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ me tog thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i seng ge'i khri'i gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs su sgra sgrog cing kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de/ mu tig dang man shel gyi rgyal

mtshan sna tshogs kyi gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i shing dang me tog sna tshogs kyi glong gi gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dzin pa'i shugs

shes bya ba yod de/ spos kyi nor bu thams cad kyi ri rab kyi sprin gyi gzhis rton to/ /de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi khyim kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi gzhis rton to/ /kye rgyal

ba'i sras dag rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag thams cad kyi steng ma ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid bzang po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ste/ nor bu kun nas snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i spos kyi chu rgya mtsho'i gzhis rton to/ /

spos kyi chu rgya mtsho nor bu kun nas snang ba'i gzhis brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de las pad+mo chen po spos kyi rgyal mtshan khyer ba'i 'od zer dang ze ba sna tshogs shes bya ba mngon par byung ste/ pad+mo chen po de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan

pa kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa rnam par dag pa shin tu brtan pa rdo rje dang nor bu thams cad kyi khor yug gis bskor ba/ rim gyis gzhol bar gnas pa shing gi rgyud rgya mtsho sa la rab tu gnas pa 'di 'dug go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di nyid kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i phyogs 'di nyid brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /

gzhi rgyan me tog 'jig rten khams kyi rgya mtsho de/ /rin chen kun gyi snying po kha dog sna tshogs te/ /rdul rnams kun dang mnyam pa'i sngan cad sangs rgyas kyi/ /drung du sngon tshe rgya mtshor sbyangs pas dri med pa/ /rgya chen snying rje'i sprin gyis khams rnams kun

bkang zhing / /zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i lus kyang kun btang nas/ /sngon gyi bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa spyad pas na/ /'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams de yangs shing rnam par dag /sangs rgyas rnam par snang bas smon lam che mdzad de/ /'od snang

btang ba mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa ni/ /rlung gi phung pos btab kyang mi bskyod mi g.yo ste/ /nor bu kun rgyan sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snying po'o/ /me tog mdzod bkye gtor ba rin chen yid 'ong bzhin/ /sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis mkha'i dbyings la

gnas/ /rgya mtsho'i rgyan rnams thams cad sna tshogs brtan par gnas/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu 'od kyi sprin kyang gtong / /nor bu thams cad sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnams/ /byung zhing 'od zer sprin 'bar phyogs rnams kun tu gtong / /

'od zer me tog tshon dang 'od zer 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /phyogs rnams ma lus kun gyi chos dbyings khyab par byed/ /rin chen kun gyi 'od zer sprin rnams bkye ba ni/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi zhing rnams khyab par byed/ /sdug bsngal thams

cad bcil zhing byang chub mchog la bgrod/ /'jig rten rgya mtsho thams cad 'od 'phro rab tu 'bar/ /'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa sna tshogs rnams/ /rin chen kun dang spu rnams kun nas rgyal ba 'gyed/ /brgya byin dag dang tshangs pa'ang 'khor

lo sgyur 'dra dang / /'gro ba kun gyi lus su lus rnams kun kyang gnas/ /sprul pas 'od bkye chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad mnyam pa/ /'od zer sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad mtshan kyang sgrog /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi bsam pa tshim byas nas/ /tshul

rnams sna tshogs sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul/ /'jig rten rgya mtsho me tog snying po de nang na/ /rdul phran kun gyi khongs na chos dbyings thams cad kyi/ /rin chen 'od kyi sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'bar bar snang / /rnam par snang mdzad chos

dbyings rnam 'phrul zhing la ltos/ /bskal ba rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bstsal byas te/ /smon lam yangs pa'i sprin ni chos kyi dbyings mnyam dang / /bzang po spyod pa brnyes shing ye shes sa ldan pa'i/ /dgongs pa las ni rgyan mdzes de dag

byung ba yin/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pas snang ba zhes bya ste/ le'u lnga pa'o// //kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang

snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'khor yug chen po ni nor bu'i rgyal po pad+mo nyi ma'i gzhi la brten pa ste/ nor bu'i rigs rgya mtsho spos kyi tsan+dan thams cad las grub pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis lhun shin

tu 'phags shing zil gyis gnon pa nor bu spos zhim po gzi brjid kyi 'khor lo rnam par snang ba'i snying po can/ nor bu'i rgyal po rdo rje sra zhing mi shigs pa ltar shin tu mkhregs shing sra ba rin po che'i chu thams cad kun nas 'byung ba rin po che'i shing gi nags tshal gyi rgyan

thams cad me tog shin tu rgyas pa/ spos kyi rtsi mchog bzang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spos kyi me tog dpal can shin tu bzang bas rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs lta bu'i dra bas kun nas bres pa ste/ /

de dag la pa rgyan bzang po'i rnam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang khor yug gi rgyan dang yon tan yongs su dag pa 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs

rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yod pa/ /mtha' dang dbus med sna tshogs rnam pa can/ /nor bu mang pos rnam dag mtha' yas mchog /

de dag sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pas byung / /dri med khor yug rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni/ /nor bu mang po de bzhin spos mang dang / /mu tig gsal ba'i tshogs la rab tu gnas/ /kha dog mtha' yas rin chen rnams kyis brten/ /snying po nor bu'i sprin

can sna tshogs sra/ /'dzam bu chu klung 'od 'phro snying po'i tshogs/ /'od 'phro dam pa phyogs su snang zhing 'tsher/ /khor yug dri ma med pa rnam par mdzes/ /nor bu'i rdo rjes byas shing sra zhing brtan/ /mtshams rnams mi phyed nor bu sna tshogs 'brul/ /mtshan

ldan nor bu'i rin chen rnam bkod pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs su dag par snang / /spos chu'i sprin gyi kha dog mtha' yas te/ /rin chen tsan+dan me tog kun tu gram/ /pad+mo sna tshogs gos kyis kun nas yog /rin chen rtsi mchog dri zhim rnams dang

ldan/ /sna tshogs shing gi sprin gyis kun nas brgyan/ /nor bzang kun gyis kun nas gzi brjid 'bar/ /'od zer sprin gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ /gos kyi mdzod kyis shin tu 'bar bar gnas/ /spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug pa gdugs 'chang ba'i/ /

byang chub sems dpa' mang pos chos dbyings gang / /sgra dbyangs mang po rgya mtsho thams cad 'byin/ /'di ni rnam par snang mdzad chos 'khor lo/ /rin chen mdzes pa de dag thams cad dang / /nor bu dag dang kun nas 'od 'phro'i shing / /kun la rnam

par snang mdzad sku gsal ba/ /gzugs brnyan tshul du nang na yod pa snang / /thams cad gzugs su sku rnams mtha' yas te/ /sangs rgyas sprul mang kha dog mu med pas/ /thams cad phyogs dang chos dbyings kun bkang zhing / /sems can

mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul/ /thams cad rgyan las sgra dbyangs kun 'byung ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad smon lam 'khor lo yis/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag byas pa/ /de kun de las rnam par 'phrul zhing grags/ /'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor yug gi rgyan rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u drug pa'o// //kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la khor yug chen po de'i nang gi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa chen po'i gzhi ni nor bu mang po'i rgyan thams cad

kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje ltar shin tu mkhregs shing sra la brtan pa/ rin po che'i rigs thams cad las grub pa/ rgya mtshos rnam par phye ba mi shigs pa'i snying po can mi mtho ba mi dma' ba'i thang mnyam zhing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi

kha dog dang / 'od thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'i nor bu'i gzugs sna tshogs kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa/ rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i

pad+mo thams cad kyis gzhi byas pa dmigs pa thams cad du sna tshogs su gyur pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po spos kyi mdzod thams cad kyis gzhi mnyam par bdal ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing gi rgyan gyis

sprin gyi dra ba rnam par bres pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi 'od dang nor bu'i dra ba mig 'phrul lta bus rnam par phye ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la pa sa'i dkyil 'khor de'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams

rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/

de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi ni rnam dag mnyam/ /'khor lo'i dra bas bsgrubs pa mi shigs sra/ /rin chen sna tshogs mnyam pa'i gzhir gnas shing / /rin chen sna tshogs kun gyis kun tu yang / /

yid 'ong sa ni rdo rje gser gyi gzhi/ /rin chen chu ba ri bo'i 'khor los bsgrubs/ /pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor gzhi yin me tog sa/ /tsan+dan phye ma rin chen kun tu bkram/ /'od zer sna tshogs rin chen me tog rnams/ /'od 'phro 'gyed pas phyogs

su sprin kyang 'bar/ /sangs rgyas 'od snang nor bu rnam par bkram/ /sa kun me tog yid du 'ong bas yog /thams cad sprin ni phyogs na stug lding bas/ /mi zad yangs pa kun nas khebs par 'dug /zhing rnams thams cad phyogs rnams

kun bkang zhing / /sangs rgyas chos ni snyan par rab tu sgrog /rin chen nang snang sangs rgyas smon lam kun/ /shin tu dus ring rtag tu kun tu ston/ /sngan cad spyod pa ci 'dra spyod pa dag /kun kyang nor bu'i 'bru las gsal bar snang / /de yi rgya mtsho

nor bu sna tshogs bting / /de yi nang na sangs rgyas spyod yul snang / /sangs rgyas spyod yul de dag zhing gi rnams/ /rgya mtsho kun gyi rdul phran re rer snang / /me tog snying po tshon gyi 'khor los bsgrubs/ /der ni byang chub sems dpa' rtag

'dong zhing / /byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam kun kyang sgrog /snying po byang chub 'khor du rnam 'phrul lo/ /rin chen 'od zer 'od dang ldan pa dag /sa yi nor bu rgyan las rab tu 'byung / /sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di yang rtag tu ston/ /chos

dbyings nam mkha' lta bu'i kun tu 'gengs/ /sangs rgyas kun yul ye shes rgya chen dang / /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam sus shes pa/ /de dag phyogs rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho dbyings kyi 'phrul la 'jug /'jig rten

gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa'i gzhi rgyan shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o// //kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi sa'i dkyil 'khor de la spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag kun kyang gzhi rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal po dang spos thams cad kyis rlung rab tu bsgrubs pa'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal po bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba 'od rnam par snang ba'i dra bas kun nas

bres pa'o/ /rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang mdog tu snang ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su rgyas pa'o/ /rin po che thams cad kyi me tog sna tshogs glong du 'khyil pa'o/ /tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang 'dres pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor

dang smon lam rgya mtsho'i sgra 'byin pa'o/ /rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par snang ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin me tog sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu rab tu 'gyed pa'o/ /kha dog dang dbyibs mtha'

yas pa'i gdugs kyis khebs par rnam par 'phrul pas brgyan pa'o/ /dmigs pa thams cad la 'jig rten gyi khams mang po rgya chen po thams cad snang ba'o/ /phyogs kun nas rin po che'i them skas kyi phreng ba bcu rab tu bkye ba'o/ /mu tig rin po che thams

cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i mu khyud kyis kun nas bskor ba'o/ /rin po che shel gyi rgyal mtshan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa bcus kun nas brgyan pa'o/ /'di lta ste nor bu dang me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kha dog mtha' yas pa

bcus kun nas bskor ba'o/ /'di lta ste nor bu thams cad kyi pad+mo yid du 'ong ba'i grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba'o/ /'di lta ste nor bu rdo rje shin tu sra ba'i gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu bsgrubs

pa'o/ /rin po che thams cad kyi me tog pun+da ri ka dang / spos kyi chu yongs su rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba'o/ /'di lta ste rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba rin po che 'bar zhing kun nas 'phyang ba'i nor bu'i dra ba can gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba

snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o/ /tsan+dan dang spos dang nor bu mang po sgra thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag gis rnam par snang bar byas pa chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyis 'gram shin tu brgyan pa'o/ /'di lta ste rin po che dang gos dang rgyal

mtshan dang / dril bu mang po thams cad kyi sgra 'byung bas rgyan shin tu rgyas pa'o/ /rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu thams cad kyi ra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pas kun nas bskor ba'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang

spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sa stengs de na spos kyi chu bo yi/ /rgya mtsho nor bus brgyan pa rnams brjod de/ /

gzhi rnams rin chen gos kyi kun bting ba/ /mi shigs rdo rje lta bu sra zhing mdzes/ /spos dang nor bu'i rgyal po mang po dang / /nyi ma'i nor bu'i 'od 'phro stug sprin dang / /pad+mo'i rin chen 'phreng ba'ang kun nas bres/ /gzhi rnams dri med yid du 'ong ba'o/ /

spos kyi chu yis yongs su rgyas pa ste/ /rin chen 'od zer sna tshogs me tog glong / /sgra dbyangs rab tu gtong ba'i dbyangs kyis kyang / /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu sgrog /them skas phreng ba yid du 'ong dang ldan/ /gzhi ni rin chen nor bu mang pos

brgyan/ /stegs bu kun bkod rin chen pad+mo yi/ /sprin stug dra ba rnam par bres pa ste/ /rin chen nor bu'i shing gi 'phreng ba dag /rin chen gser gyi kha dog yid 'ong 'bar/ /'od kyi tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra dag kyang / /rnam par 'phrul mang dbyangs su

rab tu sgrog /spos chus yongs gang rin chen bsgrubs pa ste/ /me tog pun+da ri kas kun nas bskor/ /spos dang 'od dang bdug spos 'od zer 'gyed/ /de dag 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan mu tig 'bar ba can/ /gos dang

nor bu sna tshogs kun 'phyang zhing / /rin chen nor bu'i dril bu dra ba dag /thams cad mkhyen par 'jug pa'i sgra yang sgrog /pad+mo'i grong khyer rnams kyis kun nas bskor/ /kha dog mtha' yas nor bus rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs rnams kun nas mu

tig sprin bkye zhing / /grong khyer rgya mtshos de dag rab tu brgyan/ /dra ba bzang pos kun nas bskor ba ste/ /rin chen byas pa'i gzugs bzang khyab kyi bar/ /rnam pa du mar 'bar zhing yid 'ong ba'i/ /rgya mtshos bzang zhing mdzes par rab tu brgyan/ /sngon

cad sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ /sna tshogs rgya mtsho zhing rnams yongs sbyangs pa/ /shin tu rgya che mtha' dang dbus med pa 'ang / /de dag kun na rnam par 'phrul pa byed/ /spos chu'i rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang spos chu'i chu

klung g.yas phyogs su 'khor zhing 'bab pa gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'khor bar byas pa ste/ spos chu'i chu klung de dag thams cad kyang 'khor kun nas rdo rje'i pad+mo kha dog dang dri mtha' yas pas bsgrubs pa'o/ /nor bu'i 'khor lo dang nor bu'i 'od rnam par

dag pa sna tshogs kyis mtha' kun nas dkris pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bus rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs sgrog pa'i dril bu'i dra ba rin po

che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /spyod pa'i 'od kyi klong sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu rab tu 'byung ba'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad nang na snang zhing 'od shin tu 'bar ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho lta bur

snang ba thams cad kyis shin tu yog par byas pa'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnam par snang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i snying po'i me tog shin tu rgyas pas kun nas khebs pa'o/ /dus gsum du

gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gyi 'khor lo dbyangs su sgrog pa'o/ /spos kyi chu dang rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od dang / 'od zer gyi sprin rab tu 'byung ba ste/ chu klung de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan pa 'jig

rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi rgyan dang / yon tan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i

tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /chu klung dri ma med pa'i chus rgyas shing / /gzhi ni nor bu rdo rje'i pad+mos byas/ /rin chen mang po sil bus gzhi bkram zhing / /kun nas brgyan pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong / /them skas phreng bas de dag kun nas bskor/ /pad+mo 'phyang ba'i mu khyud 'khor

can te/ /me tog brgyan pa'i mu tig phreng ba dang / /me tog lda ldis sna tshogs kun nas bres/ /nor bu'i chu bo spos chu 'byung ba ni/ /rin chen kun gyi kha dog mdog ltar 'bab/ /rin chen nor bu'i me tog mdzes par bkod/ /sil snyan sgra ni sangs rgyas gsung skad brjod/ /de dag rnyog

pa nor bu zla ba ste/ /rin chen sna tshogs thams cad dpa' klad do/ /phyogs rnams bcu po kun tu rtag par yang / /spos dang bdug pa 'od 'phro'i rgyan 'byung ngo / /chu bo rnams las rin chen thams cad kyi/ /'od zer 'phro ba kun tu rab tu 'byung / /me tog

nor bu'i phung po gdugs rnams kyang / /rin chen kun gyis gzer du rab tu 'bar/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan mang po dang / /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rin chen rnams las snang / /rin chen 'khor lo'i gzhi rten yid 'ong las/ /

spos chus rgyas pa'i chu klung rnams kyang 'bab/ /rin chen gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba yis/ /yog cing sangs rgyas gsung du sgra sgrog 'bab/ /rgyal ba kun gyi byang chub spyod pa dang / /kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog rab tu 'dzud/ /sangs rgyas

smon lam sgra dbyangs rnam pa dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gyi sbyor ba dag /rnam dag nor bu'i ngos dang ngogs kun nas/ /sgra rnams sgrog pa kun na rab tu snang / /chu bo thams cad dba' glong dag las kyang / /byang chub sems dpa'i

sprin chen 'bar ba dag /chos kyi dbyings rnams rab tu rgyas byed pa/ /'byam klas phyogs rnams kun na rab tu snang / /chu klung de dag thams cad dri med cing / /nor bu'i rgyal po sprin gyis kun khyab pa/ /mdzod spu'i dpal dang sangs rgyas gzi brjid

'bar/ /nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snang / /spos chu'i chu klung de dag gi bar dag kyang sa sna tshogs la rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa ste/ chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i me tog pun+da ri ka'i phreng ba/ gling

bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o/ /chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par phye ba'o/ /shing gi gseb thams cad nas kyang rgyan thams cad

kyi sprin rtag par rab tu 'byung ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i dpal 'byung ba'i sprin dang / 'od rnams kyang rab tu 'byung ngo / /shing gi bar de dag thams cad kyang 'od shin tu 'bar ba ste/ spos dang me tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal

po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam bskal pa thams cad du byin gyis rlob pa'i sgra sgrog pa'i sprin gyis yongs su gang ba'o/ /spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od gzer gyis rnam par snang bar byed pa'i sprin gyis mngon par khyab pa'o/ /spos kyi rgyal po yid du 'ong

ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyas pa'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i kha dog yang dag par ston pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par gang ba'o/ /gos kyi tshogs sna tshogs sprin lta bus mngon par yog pa'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur 'od gzer gyi dra ba'i sprin

gyis yog par byed pas rnam par rgyas pa'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od kyis mngon par gang ba'o/ /nor bu'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi las rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan shin tu ston pas rgyas pa ste/

de dag la pa chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi bar gyi rgyan yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su

bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /chu klung bar rnams shin tu rnam par dag /rin chen rgyan can gser gyis rnam par bres/ /yal ga me tog sprin rnams 'phyang

lding ba'i/ /shing gi phreng bas kun nas mngon par khyab/ /shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor sgo dag nas/ /rin chen mang po'i sprin rnams kun kyang 'byung / /me tog 'od mang rin chen snying po can/ /phyogs rnams kun sgor 'gro ba khyab par byed/ /gzhi rnams

nor bu mngon par bkram pa ste/ /me tog rnam bres rin chen 'bru dang ldan/ /kun nas rin chen sprin gyis khyab pa ste/ /rgyan dang sems can thams cad gzugs brnyan snang / /sangs rgyas 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po yis/ /sa rnams thams cad kun nas

rnam par gang / /phyogs rnams thams cad 'bar zhing snang ba'i sprin/ /rdul phran kun la gzugs brnyan gyur par snang / /nor bu'i rgyan gyis shin tu rnam par rgyas/ /mu tig gsal ba'i dra bas rnam par phye/ /nor bu'i 'khor los kun nas rab tu bkod/ /

kun na rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul pa snang / /'byam klas 'od zer ldan pa'i rin chen gyis/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa bkye ba kun na snang / /sangs rgyas mang pos phyogs rnams kun khyab cing / /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i chos nyid rab tu sgrog /rin chen sna tshogs

pun+da ri ka yis/ /chu rnams kun rgyas snying po nor bu spos/ /de las mi zad 'od zer rgya mtsho'i rnams/ /rab tu 'byung ba'i pad+mo sna tshogs 'byung / /dus rnams gsum po'i rgyan rnams thams cad kyang / /nor bu de dag 'bru yi nang na ste/ /'byung ba

med cing gzung du'ang yod pa min/ /de ni sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu/ /rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad thams cad du/ /rgyan dang sprul pa thams cad rab tu 'gyed/ /sngon cad sangs rgyas smon lam mthu dag gis/ /de dag 'gro zhing 'ong bar snang

ba med/ /rdul rnams rgya mtsho thams cad dag la yang / /rgyal sras thams cad spyad pa rab spyod de/ /rang gi zhing dang lung bstan sa yi rnams/ /bsam pa rnam dag tshul bzhin de dag mthong / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i dmigs pa dag la'ang dmigs

pa re re zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan dang rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag cing yon tan mtha'

dang dbus med pas yon tan rnam par dag pa'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing gi rgya mtsho 'di rnams thams

cad kyang / /rin chen rgyan can 'od zer gnas pa ste/ /sdug cing gsal ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog /rin chen thams cad 'od kyang rnam par 'bar/ /mu tig nor bu'i sprin rnams zad mi shes/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan phyogs su rnam par

snang / /zhing na yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rtag tu ston pa byed/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi sprin ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad snyan par sgrog /rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi spyod

pa rnams/ /rin chen rnams las rtag par snang zhing grag /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dri med 'od/ /rgyan rnams thams cad nang na rnam par snang / /'khor rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid 'chang ba dang / /sprul pa rnams kyis zhing gi rgya mtsho

gang / /sangs rgyas sprul pa rnams ni sgyu ma 'dra/ /de dag la ni byon pa gang yang med/ /sangs rgyas yul rnams byin gyis brlabs pa yi/ /zhing rnams kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul/ /zhing rnams 'byam klas par ni rnam 'phrul zhing / /ji snyed zhing du

de dag kun rgyu ba/ /de dag nor bu kun la rab tu snang / /de ltar zhing gi rgya mtsho rnam par sbyangs/ /sprul pa rnams ni mig yor 'dra ba ste/ /thams cad dag na chos nyid 'di yang snang / /'di ni rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul te/ /smon lam rnam par 'phrul

las byung ba'o/ /bzang po'i spyod pas gang rnams byung gyur pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes mchog rgya mtsho can/ /de dag rdul phran kun la rang rang gis/ /rang gi zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi zham ring du/ /

bskal pa bye ba rgya chen bsam yas su/ /de dag spyod yul thams cad mthong bas na/ /skad cig sems la de dag thams cad ston/ /zhing rnams mnyam med 'byung ba med pa ste/ /de dag mkha' 'dra mnyam zhing mtshan nyid med/ /smon lam stobs

kyis kun tu gnas pa ste/ /sems can rnams la phan phyir rab tu sbyangs/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas

kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas te/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs

rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa de dag thams cad kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa/ phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la

lta ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis 'jug pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan yod pa/ gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du 'du ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du ma 'dres pa/ rnam par 'phrul ba dang / byin gyi

rlabs gzhan dang gzhan yod pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni pad+mo'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni rin po che'i kha dog mtha' yas pa'i me tog rgya mtsho la rab

tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni rin po che'i 'phreng ba mu tig gi 'bru'i snying po can gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni spos chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni me tog thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni nor bu rin po che'i dra ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni

'od gzer gyi rgya mtsho klong du gyur pa'i chu bo la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i cod pan sna tshogs kyi rgyan la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni

sems can gyi lus sna tshogs rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung nor bu'i rgyal po la rab tu gnas so/ /de dag la pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas

pa'i gnas shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni ri rab kyi dbyibs

lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni chu klung gi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni kun tu 'khor ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas 'khyil ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /

'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni 'khor lo'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni ris kyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni shing gi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams

'byam klas pa la la ni khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni phyogs 'byam klas pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten

gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni/ khang ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni pad+mo'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni rta babs kyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams

'byam klas pa la la ni sems can gyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sprin gyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi

khams 'byam klas pa la la ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni dra ba sna tshogs bkye ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sgo kun nas yod pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o/ /

'jig rten gyi 'byam klas pa la la ni dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs lta bu ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i dbyibs rnam par phye ba shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do/ /

kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag ni lhun gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni phyogs thams cad kyi nor bu'i sprin gyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni

'od kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che dang spos 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog /kha sprod las bsgrubs pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi

tshul la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che'i 'od kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni

sangs rgyas kyi kha dog gi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi 'od kyi lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba'i sgra 'i

lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba'i sgra'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i sgra 'i lhun

can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi rgya mtsho'i sgra 'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgra 'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi

khams kyi tshul la la ni zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i sgra 'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i sgra 'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad kyi dge ba 'byung ba'i sgra 'i lhun can no/ /'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i sgra 'i lhun

can no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dge de dag la pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa'i tshul gyi lus ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams

kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa'i tshul gyi lus rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /zhing gi rgyud rgyan shin tu brtan

par grub/ /dri med dri bral 'od 'gyed snying po can/ /nor bu pad+mo rgya mtsho kun la gnas/ /la la gang+gA'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs tshul gyis gzhi gnas shing / /dbyibs kyang sna tshogs kha dog gzugs kyang mang / /ri rab grong khyer shing

gi dkyil 'khor dang / /zhing rgyud thams cad la la phyogs kun lta/ /la la 'od lus me tog snying po can/ /nor bus byas pa kun nas sprin dang chu/ /la la'i rgyud gsal mu tig 'od zer lus/ /nor bu'i gzhi gnas kun kyang mi shigs sra/ /'byam

klas la la kha dog sna tshogs gsal/ /'od 'dra 'od 'phro me mar sprin gyi mdog /la la'i rgyud ni sgra dang skad kyi lus/ /de las sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs mtha' yas 'byung / /la la'i rgyud ni smon lam sgra yi lus/ /spyod pa rnam 'phrul sprin gyi sgra yi lus/ /

la la bsod nams yangs dang las kyi sgra/ /la la'i lus ni rgyal ba'i yon tan sgra/ /zhing gi rgyud rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pa/ /kun nas mi zad du ma'i sgo nas 'jug /rnam 'phrul yangs pa mi zad rgyan gyi rnams/ /tshad med kun gyis phyogs kun rgyas par

'gengs/ /phyogs rnams kun tu zhing rnams 'du 'gyur te/ /yangs pa'i tshul gyis zhing gi rgyud zhugs par/ /phyogs bcu kun tu 'du bar snang ba yang / /'gro ba med cing 'jug pa yod pa min/ /tshul gcig gis ni rgyud rnams

kun kyang 'gengs/ /thams cad ma lus re rer rab tu 'du/ /de la tha dad gang yang mi dmigs te/ /gzhi med kun 'gengs mtha' dang dbus yang med/ /zhing rnams tshul gyis rgyud la rnam 'phrul ba/ /sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad pa kun nas snang / /

smon lam sgra ni rgya mtsho rab brjod cing / /zhing gi dbyings na sems can kun kyang 'dul/ /zhing rnams sangs rgyas sku yis kun khyab snang / /bsam gyis mi khyab byang chub sems dpas gang / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mi mnyam stobs ston cing / /sems

can mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul/ /zhing gi rgyud kyi gnas shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ste le'u brgyad pa'o// //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dgu pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i dbyings de ni spos chu'i rgya mtsho mig 'phrul gyi rnam par phye ba gzhi kun la rab tu gnas pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gang chen mtsho'i dbyings

kyi spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nang na spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbus ma ni ze ba yid du 'ong zhing 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ste/ de'i nang nas nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rnam par dmigs

pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo chen po bzhi spos dang nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan can ces bya ba mngon par byung ste/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi

khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te/ de dag las thams cad kyi 'og ma ni dpal 'byung ba'i 'od zer rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig

rten gyi khams te/ de ni rdo rje thams cad kyi rgyun dang / 'od kyi 'khor lo'i sa mtshams nor bu rin po che'i ze ba mang po la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i 'khor thams cad dang nor bu'i rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu yog par gyur pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can dag ste/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshul rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs kyi pad+mo dpal gyi rgyan ces bya ba rgyan thams cad kyi sa mtshams can rin po che'i pad+mo shin tu mang ba la rab tu gnas pa seng ge'i khri'i

dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ mu tig gi 'bru rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba

yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer mchog gi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan kun tu snang ba

zhes bya ba spos kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sa mtshams can rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i 'khor lo gzi brjid bzang po'i nyi ma'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ yan lag brgyad du dma' ba'i dbyibs can 'jig rten gyi khams

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi dpal gyi dbal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i

steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sa mtshams can kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rdo rje brag gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa rin

po che pad+mo'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rdo rje'i 'od zer dang rin po che 'bar ba mtha' yas par snang ba'i 'od kyi nor bu'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa gcig tu dag pa 'jig rten gyi khams/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba

yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i 'od zer stobs dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams

'od shin tu bkye ba'i me tog sil ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can shing dang nags tshal gyi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i rin po che'i 'khor lo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ phyogs thams cad nas grwa du

ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa nor bu'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i dbyangs su sgrog pas kun nas yog pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin

gshegs pa spos kyi 'od zer dga' ba'i stobs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sna tshogs kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams

sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che shi la'i rgyal mtshan gyi sa mtshams can/ rdo rje'i khyim gzhal med khang rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa kun nas gru bzhi'i dbyibs

su 'dug pa 'khor lo nor bu gtsug gi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/

'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od zer me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ me tog

pad+mo sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can rin po che thams cad kyi 'od gzer dang rin po che'i kha dog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kha dog thams cad kyi gos dang mu tig dang stegs bus kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba rgya mtsho'i

shugs dang / yon tan grags pa'i dbang phyug 'od gzer ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba

'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po sgra thams cad gtong ba'i rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i pad+mo

la 'dug cing nam mkha'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mig 'phrul gyi dbyibs lta bur 'dug pa/ 'od kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal

mtshan ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul

shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i 'khor lo'i shing gi rgyan gyi sa mtshams can/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi sprin 'bar ba'i sgra yi rgya mtsho'i gzhi la rab tu gnas pa/ tshangs

pa'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ seng ge'i khri'i sprin rin po che yid du 'ong ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyan can gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi gzi brjid thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa rgyan mtha' yas pa dang / mu tig gi 'bru
