mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mtha' rgal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal byang chub

sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par

sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed dam pa'i

sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan

'das la phyag 'tshal te/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin

tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ rig byed dbang phyug gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu

phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su brten nas/ seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/

'og gi phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams shel gyi mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed tshangs pa'i dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal

byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'og gi phyogs su brten nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon

par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /steng gi phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed sna tshogs kyi

sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi phyogs su brten

nas seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad la bltas te 'di skad

ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni ngo mtshar thob pa sha stag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni bsam gyis khyab po/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa ni bsam

gyis khyab po/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan ni bsam gyis khyab po/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ni bsam gyis khyab po/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas

kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis khyab po/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa ni bsam gyis khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni bsam gyis khyab po/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu rgyu ba ni bsam gyis khyab po/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bsam gyis khyab ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyogs

bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu sems can 'dul ba rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud cing / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dag tu chos ston te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams

mjed 'di nyid dang / de ma yin pa'i gling bzhi pa gzhan dag na'ang sku gzhan dang gzhan mtshan gzhan dang gzhan/ kha dog dang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan/ chu zheng gzhan dang gzhan/ sku tshe'i tshad gzhan dang gzhan/ skye mched

brnyes pa gzhan dang gzhan/ dbang po brnyes pa gzhan dang gzhan/ 'byung ba'i skye mched gzhan dang gzhan/ sku gzugs gzhan dang gzhan du de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten

gyi khams gling bzhi pa bcom pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid na yang de bzhin gshegs pa la don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /seng ge'i nga ro can zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ shAkya thub pa zhes

bya bar rab tu shes so/ /drang srong dam pa'i mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rnam par snang mdzad ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /go'u ta ma'i rigs zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dge sbyong chen po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu

shes so/ /mu stegs byed ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa bcom pa dang ldan pa na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i

sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dang / 'dab chags su shar phyogs logs na gling bzhi pa shin tu bsrungs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la rdo rje zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbang phyug ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /blo gros mnga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /

thub par dka' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /skyabs mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thugs dgyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mtshungs pa pa

zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /tshig gcod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa shin tu bsrungs pa zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan stong phrag bcur sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i

sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su lho phyogs logs na gling bzhi pa bzod par dka' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la dbang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /nor grags zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dri ma med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /

yang dag par gsung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'dul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dgyes pa mnga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rnam par grags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /don mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mtha'

yas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa bzod par dka' ba na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis

rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dang / 'dab chags su nub phyogs logs na gling bzhi pa gnyen dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la chu'i lha zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /blta na dga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/

rgyal po dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /seng ge 'dul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /bden pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mtha' las 'das par gshegs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dgyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /chos

kyi blo gros zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'phrin las grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mkhas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag las sogs pa gling bzhi pa/ gnyen dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na mtshan stong phrag bcur de

bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su byang phyogs logs na gling bzhi pa seng ge yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la thub pa chen

po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dka' thub kyis bsgrubs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /zhing la dpa' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thams cad thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /yid bzang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /yongs su

dag pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /shugs 'dzin ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /lda ldi bzang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /brtul zhugs brnyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa seng ge yod pa

na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na gling bzhi pa rnam par bstsags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin

gshegs pa la bdud rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /zhi ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /bzang po'i lha zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya bar rab tu

shes so/ /blo gros mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thugs mnyam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /blo gros kyi dbyangs zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /ring du bzhud pa zhes bya bar rab

tu shes te/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa rnam par bstsags pa zhes bya ba na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su/ shar

lho'i phyogs mtshams na gling bzhi pa dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jigs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /phung po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /khyab pa dang ldan pa zhes

bya bar rab tu shes so/ /ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rang bzhin 'dzin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rigs par spyod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gi rgyal po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya bar rab
tu shes so/ /stobs kyi brtson 'grus zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa dga' ba na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams

kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na gling bzhi pa snying po dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la g.yo ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mkhas pa'i rgyal po

zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /skyod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mdzes pa'i spyan can zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rgyal ba'i mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbyangs kyi dbang phyug ces bya bar rab

tu shes so/ /thams cad gtong ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /drang srong 'dzin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /ri rab dpal zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gling bzhi pa snying po dam pa na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa

sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na gling bzhi pa sa bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/

'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rin po che'i gtsug phud ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dran par bya ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /don gyi mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /shin tu bzhad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes

so/ /rigs gtsang ma zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /phyag shin tu 'phyang ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thog mar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa

gling bzhi pa sa bzang po na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su 'og logs na gling bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs

pa la shin tu grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /seng ge'i kha dog ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rno ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gser gyi 'od 'phro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gsung

mthar thug pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /phan pa mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mthar thug pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /lha ma nor ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /sbyin pa snyoms pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la

sogs pa gling bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa na mtshan brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gling bzhi pa 'di dang 'dab chags su steng logs na gling bzhi pa nor 'dzin ces bya

ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la blo gros dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /zhal dag pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /bshes gnyen dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thog mar gshegs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /

byin rnam par bkod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dga' bar mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dgongs pa grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gcig la brten pa

zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de dag las sogs pa gling bzhi pa nor 'dzin na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed

'di na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya yod de/ /de dag kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyis brjod de mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras

dag 'jig rten gyi khams mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'phags par lhag pa zhes bya bar rab

tu shes so/ /dbugs phyin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /bsam pa grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /nyan pa'i bdag po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /khyab par bzhugs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbang du gyur pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/

sA la'i lhun zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rtsal chen po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /blo 'dra ba med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de

bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang 'dab chags su lho phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la rang bzhin thugs su

chud ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /bsam pa grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na mtshan brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu

shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang 'dab chags su nub phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bstsal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la dgongs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /lam rnam par bsgoms pa

zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /brten pa'i gzhi zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /khyab cing grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /don mkhyen pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /bye brag la dgyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gzigs pa dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /

'dul ba thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /kun tu snyoms pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dgyes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bstsal ba na/ mtshan bye ba brgya

stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su byang phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin

gshegs pa la tsam pa ka'i kha dog ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mthu shin tu gnas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /byin gyi rlabs yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rang bzhin dam pa

zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /blo gros kyi nyi ma zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thogs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /zla ba shar ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rlung gi shugs zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /sgra shin tu gsal ba

zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams

mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs na 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la sdug bsngal dang bral ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thams cad las grol ba

zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /grol zhing mkhas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'das pa'i gter zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rin po che'i 'od ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'jig

rten ston pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gnas med pa'i sa thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dang ba'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thugs sgul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag

la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su shar lho'i phyogs mtshams

na 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /byang ba thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gsung snyan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rtsa ba khyad du

'phags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rgyun gyi gdugs zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rgyu shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rnam par phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dam pa'i bsam gtan mnga' ba

zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /ran par gsung pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /blo rgya mtsho zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de

bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang 'dab chags su lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu song ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la thub pa'i

dbang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mngon par sel ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dus las shin tu grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /ngo bo nyid yongs su mkhyen pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /bka' nyams pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /

bskal pa mnyam pa med par gzigs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbang phyug gi dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /drang srong ston pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'phrin las brtsams pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rdo rje seng ge zhes bya bar rab tu shes

te/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu song ba na/ mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su nub byang gi phyogs

mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la me tog yang dag par bstsags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /tsan dan gyi gdugs zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /pad mo'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes

so/ /shin tu 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /chos kyi ldum bu zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /shin tu sbyangs pa'i gdugs zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /spyan shin tu yangs pa zhes bya bar rab tu

shes so/ /tshul bzang po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /chos rtse gcig ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dra ba'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur

de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su 'og gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'od 'phro 'gyed pa zhes

bya bar rab tu shes so/ /shin tu 'dul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbang po'i mtshon cha zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mi rtag pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rtsa ba thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'phro ba pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rlung

dang mnyam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /gtong ba la mos pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /lam shin tu brtags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'joms pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi che

ba na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag /bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang 'dab chags su steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin

gshegs pa la dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rin po che tshad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /mchod sbyin la brtson pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /lha'i 'od ces bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /

'khor los 'phags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'khor lo mi ldog pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /bya ba dang bzhud pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thams cad mkhyen pas shin tu grol ba zhes bya bar rab

tu shes te/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na/ mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag ji ltar 'jig

rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi rab tu shes pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa grangs med pa/ dpag tu med pa bsam gyis khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pa sa

mtshams med pa brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so/ /gzhung de ltar lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub

phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi

phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa grangs med pa/ dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pa sa mtshams med pa brjod du med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas

gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na 'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi rab tu shes te/ sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ yongs su smin par mdzad pa de dag gis ni spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /

gsung gi rnam pa tha dad pa dang / nga ro rnam pa tha dad pa dang / phrin las rnam pa tha dad pa dang / rnam par smin pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /

skye mched rab tu thob pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis/ /sems can rnams la chos yongs su bstan pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin

tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po bcu drug pa/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa

zhes bya ba de la/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang byung ba zhes bya'o/ /gnod pa zhes bya'o/ skal ba mi mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /pa zhes bya'o/ /kun 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /gsal shing gi rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ /gnas

kyi rtsal ba zhes bya'o/ /gdon mi za ba zhes bya'o/ /shu ba'i gzebs zhes bya'o/ /byis pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'di na kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang yongs

su 'brel ba zhes bya'o/ /chud za ba zhes bya'o/ /tshor bar gcen pa zhes bya'o/ /myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya'o/ /nges pa zhes bya'o/ /dran pa can zhes bya'o/ /brjod pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can gyi phyi bzhin snyegs pa

zhes bya'o/ /phyin ci log gi rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang 'dzud pa zhes bya'o/ /rdul dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /zhi ba zhes

bya'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o/ /mi nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin med pa zhes bya'o/ /so sor ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /nub par 'grol ba zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin du gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras

dag gang yang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na theg pa gcig ces bya'o/ /zhi bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /dgra dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /

yongs su rtog bzang ba zhes bya'o/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /khur 'dor ba zhes bya'o/ /'gro ba med par 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /'phags pa'i rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o/ /drang srong gi spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /gter bcu zhes bya ste/ /

kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras

dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la/ 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na/ tshol ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /rtsa ba brtan pa zhes bya'o/ /bya ba ma byas pa zhes bya'o/ /

rtsod pa thams cad ces bya'o/ /rnam par phye ba nyam chung ba zhes bya'o/ /kun gzhi dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /gsod pa'i mchog ces bya'o/ /'gul zhing g.yo ba zhes bya'o/ /dngos po'i gzugs brnyan ces bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun

'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang / 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na las su rung ba zhes bya'o/ /ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /srid pa zhes bya'o/ /'jigs pa zhes bya'o/ /'jigs pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /mtshams dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /

sdig pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /'dod pa zhes bya'o/ /na ba zhes bya'o/ /sgal ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang / 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na don ces bya'o/ /

'jigs pa sel ba zhes bya'o/ /yon tan thob par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya'o/ /tshul bzang po zhes bya'o/ /'dul ba zhes bya'o/ /yan lag gcig pu zhes bya'o/ /sdig pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /rtogs

pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na/ sde'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /gyen du 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /sbyor ba dang ldan

pa zhes bya'o/ /lta ba mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /mtha' las grol ba zhes bya'o/ /rtogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /rjes su brtul ba zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phyogs su snang ba zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa

'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug

bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na 'jig pa zhes bya'o/ /skal ba gcod pa zhes bya'o/ /smad pa'i gnas zhes bya'o/ /nye bar bsrabs pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par sred pa zhes bya'o/ /khon du 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/ /nad

dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o/ /rgyud 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o/ /dka' bar bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o/ /rab tu brtags pa zhes bya'o/ /mos pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig

rten gyi khams lhag pa na rab tu 'jigs pa zhes bya'o/ /gti mug gi rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /dgra dam pa zhes bya'o/ /bkres pa'i yan lag ces bya'o/ /ro med pa zhes bya'o/ /kun skyes pa zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /bkur bar bya ba

zhes bya'o/ /mun par khyer ba zhes bya'o/ /blo gros bcom pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang / 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na don chen po zhes

bya'o/ /phan pa'i yan lag ces bya'o/ /don gyi don ces bya'o/ /tshad med pa zhes bya'o/ /mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /rtog pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /mchog tu dul ba zhes bya'o/ /rtag tu mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /gnas par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /yan lag

byas pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na me'i tsha ba zhes bya'o/ /yan lag dang po zhes bya'o/ /rnam par gdon za ba zhes bya'o/ /

mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya'o/ /tshul zab mo zhes bya'o/ /'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /mi dma' ba zhes bya'o/ /rtogs pa khong du chud pa zhes bya'o/ /grol ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ /rab tu 'grel ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa

'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i

bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bstsal ba na 'gyod pa zhes bya'o/ /kun spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /gcig la gcig ces bya'o/ /kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /ro gcig pa zhes bya'o/ /chos ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /kun gzhi dang mngon sum zhes

bya'o/ /log pa la gzhol ba zhes bya'o/ /log par lta ba zhes bya'o/ /grangs med pa zhes bya'o/ /dgra'i dpung zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang / 'jig rten gyi khams

rdul bstsal ba na 'dod chags pa zhes bya'o/ /smra ba zhes bya'o/ /mi dkar ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhi las skyes pa zhes bya'o/ /gzung ba zhes bya'o/ /sdig pa'i kha ba zhes bya'o/ /lhag pa zhes bya'o/ /khur zhes bya'o/ /skyed pa zhes bya'o/ /sra ba

zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa na mi mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /bral ba zhes bya'o/ /dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/ /rtsa ba dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /

bsgrims pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /bag la nyal ba pa zhes bya'o/ /'phags pa zhes bya'o/ /phyi ma zhes bya'o/ /dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig

rten gyi khams rdul bstsal ba na dngos po'i snying po zhes bya'o/ /skal ba sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /grol ba'i don gyi rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin du gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /mi smad pa zhes bya'o/ /mchog tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ /srid pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o/ /

sba ba'i snying po zhes bya'o/ /mthar thug par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /yongs su rtogs pa dag pa zhes bya ste/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bsal ba na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi

bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na 'dod chags kyis

rgyas pa zhes bya'o/ /gtum pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /rgya mtsho'i yan lag ces bya'o/ /yang dag pa las 'das pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /skal ba med pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /'phro ba zhes bya'o/ /skye zhing 'jig pa zhes bya'o/ /sgrib pa zhes bya'o/

ral gri'i dngo zhes bya'o/ /tshal stug po zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na nor bu sbyin pa zhes bya'o/ /'dud

par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /bskal pa zhes bya'o/ /chags pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /seng ge zhes bya'o/ /dngos po len pa zhes bya'o/ /'brel ba zhes bya'o/ /snod ces bya'o/ /g.yo ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug

bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na mtshams bral ba zhes bya'o/ /phye ba zhes bya'o/ /yi ge med pa zhes bya'o/ /sbyor ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /mthong ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /bya ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /

nye bar bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o/ /sred pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhol ba zhes bya'o/ /skyid de ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na zhi bar byed

pa brjod pa zhes bya'o/ /khyab par 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /mngon du bya ba la sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /bde bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ tshe tshad med pa zhes bya'o/ /shin tu bsgoms pas mthar phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /lam gyi dam pa zhes bya'o/ /thob par dka' ba'i

yan lag ces bya'o/ /pha rol gyi mtshams zhes bya'o/ /brgal dka' ba zhes bya ste/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems

can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa na 'phrog par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /smon pa'i bshes

gnyen zhes bya'o/ /mi brtan zhing 'jig pa zhes bya'o/ /brjod pa sna tshogs shes bya'o/ /nyam nga bas 'tsho ba zhes bya'o/ /don 'dul ba zhes bya'o/ /khur 'dor ba zhes bya'o/ /rtsa ba zab pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin sems pa zhes bya'o/ /nam

mkha'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa na sred par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /shin tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /nyes pa'i skyon can du gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /

rlabs shes bya'o/ /'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /'du shes can zhes bya'o/ /'bras bu la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /brjod du mi rung ba zhes bya'o/ /tha dad pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes

bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa na bzlog pa zhes bya'o/ /smra ba dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /'jigs pa bstsal ba zhes bya'o/ /shin tu byung ba zhes bya'o/ /gti mug med pa zhes bya'o/ /nub pa

zhes bya'o/ /'phags pa zhes bya'o/ /sel ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa na brjod du med pa zhes bya'o/ /tshul

nyams pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par rig pa'i lam zhes bya'o/ /bsngo ba dge ba zhes bya'o/ /rgya chen po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par phye ba'i tshul zhes bya'o/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ /zil par gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /ye shes

kyi bdag po zhes bya'o/ /don yongs su shes pa zhes bya ste/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'pho bar byed pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems

can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la 'ang 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na khur tsa ba'i khur zhes

bya'o/ /snying po med pa zhes bya'o/ /rkun po lta bu zhes bya'o/ /rga shi zhes bya'o/ /chags pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ /shin tu mched pa zhes bya'o/ /ngal bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /ngom zung gnag pa zhes bya'o/ /kun tu 'phel ba zhes bya'o/ /ral gri dang 'dra ba zhes bya'o/ /kye

rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang / 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na 'jig pa zhes bya'o/ /'khrugs pa zhes bya'o/ /bskyod pa zhes bya'o/ /nyam chung ba zhes bya'o/ /'phrog pa zhes bya'o/ /bral ba

zhes bya'o/ /mi ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /thab mor gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /rtsod par gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /gnas su gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang / 'jig rten gyi khams

phan pa na kun spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /yang dag pa zhes bya'o/ /zhum pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /yan lag g.yogs pa zhes bya'o/ /smad pa spangs pa zhes bya'o/ /rjes su mthun pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhir 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /yan lag spangs pa zhes bya'o/ /tha

dad pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /glag med pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na snang ba brjod pa zhes bya'o/ /thams cad kyi rgya zhes bya'o/ /

bsam gtan gyi gter zhes bya'o/ /snang ba yod pa zhes bya'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can zhes bya'o/ /dngos po zad pa zhes bya'o/ /lam yangs pa zhes bya'o/ /dul ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ /dge ba yod pa zhes bya'o/ /rtsa ba rgyu ba med pa zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i

sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams phan pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi

mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na bsam pa thibs po zhes bya'o/ /gnas sna tshogs su bkram pa zhes bya'o/ /skye gnas su skyes pa zhes bya'o/ /rim pas 'dug pa zhes bya'o/ /ngo tsha med pa

zhes bya'o/ /shes par bya ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/ /'ga' 'ga'i ro zhes bya'o/ /rtseg pa zhes bya'o/ /rtag tu 'jig pa zhes bya'o/ /'gal rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i sgo zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i

bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na shin tu g.yo ba zhes bya'o/ /rig pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /blo gros dang ring ba zhes bya'o/ /'phongs par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/ /'jigs pa zhes bya'o/ /kun tu 'dren pa zhes bya'o/ /nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /

rten du gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /dngos po'i bdag po zhes bya'o/ /mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na ngoms pa zhes bya'o/ /bdud rtsi zhes bya'o/ /

rgyu ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /rang gi med pa zhes bya'o/ /rtog pa byang ba zhes bya'o/ /yang dag par gzhog pa zhes bya'o/ /rgyu ba dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /mched pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /lam med pa zhes bya'o/ /mi gnyis pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug

bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na snang bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /bstan pa rgya mtsho zhes bya'o/ /don rnam par gdon mi za ba zhes bya'o/ /chos dang phrad pa zhes bya'o/ /'khor ba med pa zhes

bya'o/ /'brel pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /lam rgya chen po zhes bya'o/ /yang dag par phyin par 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /sbyor ba dag pa zhes bya'o/ /mthong ba'i bdag po zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la pa 'jig

rten gyi khams kun tu 'gro ba na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i

bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na skye bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o/ /chags shing zhen pa zhes bya'o/ /khur khyer ba zhes bya'o/ /mi sdug pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o/ /nad thibs po zhes bya'o/ /

sdig pa byed pa zhes bya'o/ /sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na gzhir gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /sbyor ba dang ldan

pa zhes bya'o/ /tshod las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /chos 'phel ba zhes bya'o/ /rtogs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ sdud pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /sdud par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /lang du red pa zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi gzhi zhes bya'o/ /lta ba chung ba zhes bya'o/ /mthong ba chung ba

zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na/ gnas zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /rmongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /yang dag pa zhes bya'o/ /des shin tu rtogs pa zhes

bya'o/ /dge bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /skyon med pa zhes bya'o/ /'khor ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o/ /bdag nyid rtogs pa zhes bya'o/ /ma skyes pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags

pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na sa mtshams nye bar gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /sel ba dang 'grogs pa zhes bya'o/ /skal ba mi mnyam pa'i don can zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin yangs pa zhes bya'o/ /yongs su rtog pa zad

pa zhes bya'o/ /byin gyi rlabs kyi lam zhes bya'o/ /tshogs kyi tshul zhes bya'o/ /dran pa dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /rtag pa'i lam zhes bya'o/ /grol ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ste/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams yongs

su dga' ba na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes

bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na/ 'tshog pa zhes bya'o/ /rdza ma lta bu zhes bya'o/ /nad dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /lus la yod pa zhes bya'o/ /rab tu 'phel ba zhes bya'o/ /pa'i sgo zhes bya'o/ /sdug bsngal gyi skyon can zhes bya'o/ /

rtag par bya ba zhes bya'o/ /rang la gzhog pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /'gro zhing 'ong ba zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na 'tshe ba zhes bya'o/ /mdud par

'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /tshor ba'i yan lag ces bya'o/ /a na sems pa zhes bya'o/ /rab rab byed pa zhes bya'o/ /'dud par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par bral ba zhes bya'o/ /shin tu gdung ba zhes bya'o/ /kye hud na zhes

bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /g.yo ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /skyon med pa zhes bya'o/ /ma nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /'grogs pa

med pa zhes bya'o/ /tshad med pa zhes bya'o/ /yangs pa zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi yan lag zhes bya'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /ma chags pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog

par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na brtan pa'i spyod yul zhes bya'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa mtshams zhes bya'o/ /bden pa la thug pa zhes bya'o/ /don rab tu chud pa zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin

la gtugs pa zhes bya'o/ /lta ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ /dran pas bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o/ /grol ba sdud pa zhes bya'o/ /skyobs pa'i sa mtshams zhes bya'o/ /'khrug pa med par 'gro ba zhes bya ste/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la sogs pa

'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags

pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na bsam pa nub pa zhes bya'o/ /shin tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /yan lag gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /g.yo sgyu che ba zhes bya'o/ /'brel pa zhes bya'o/ /'dod pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /du mi

rung ba zhes bya'o/ /skye gnas ma rung ba zhes bya'o/ /nye bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /dngo skam pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la/ yang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na gdul

ba'i gzhi zhes bya'o/ /sems kyi tshul zhes bya'o/ /bcings pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /nges par rtogs pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /rnal 'byor dang mi mthun pa zhes bya'o/ /brtag par bya ba zhes bya'o/ /sgo zhes bya'o/ /rtog par

bya ba zhes bya'o/ /bsgribs pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na gnas med pa zhes bya'o/ /sbyin bsreg gi dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phyir

log pa zhes bya'o/ /mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o/ /kun tu song ba zhes bya'o/ /chen po zhes bya'o/ /du ba med pa zhes bya'o/ /mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /yangs pa zhes bya'o/ /shin tu mchod pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang sdug bsngal

'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na/ mthong bas mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /spang ba'i don ces bya'o/ /rnam par bsgom pa'i rgya zhes bya'o/ /mtshan nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /

rnyed par dka' ba zhes bya'o/ /de ma thag pa'i don ces bya'o/ /mkhas pas brtag pa zhes bya'o/ /'grogs pa'i don ces bya'o/ /mi g.yo ba la mngon du gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /khyad par gyi don ces bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ltar de dag la

sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi

mjed 'di na ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa dpag tu med pa grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa mu

med pa sa mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams

kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod de de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang /

de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pa sa mtshams med pa gzhal du med pa brjod du med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na yang / 'phags

pa'i bden pa yongs su bstan pa yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod de de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin du

'jig rten gyi khams thams cad shar phyogs nas steng gi phyogs shes bya ba nas/ phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dag la yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod do/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang sdug bsngal 'phags

pa'i bden pa'i ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo/ /kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i ming dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa'i ming dang / lam gyi bden pa'i ming dag kyang de bzhin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa'i

le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba phrag brgya bkye ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas nas 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /shar gyi lus

'phags bye ba phrag brgya dang nub kyi ban lang spyod bye ba phrag brgya dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /khor yug rdo rje'i ri bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /

mngon par 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'tshang rgya ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /ri rab

ri'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i khams kyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /mtshe ma'i lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya

bstan to/ /'phrul dga'i lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /gya nom snang ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya

bstan to/ /'bras bu chen po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /'og min bye ba phrag brgya bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar 'di na bcom ldan 'das

sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ bskor cing mdun du byas par snang ba de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa

bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ngo / /de dag thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal

dang / sangs rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag

go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang / pad mo'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ud pa la'i mdog

dang / sa le sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog dang / shel gyi mdog dang 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na

tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod de/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi skyod pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa dang / rig byed bsgribs pa med pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang

phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin te/ gcig ji

lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /

'jig rten kun dang mi ldan zhing / /bral bar gyur te dngos med pa'i/ /yang dag sangs rgyas sus shes pa/ /de dag gi lam mi gnas/ /shes rab chen po sus mthong zhing / /dngos po'i 'du shes mi 'jug la/ /rnam par bsgoms shing shes

gyur pa/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs par gyur/ /'jig rten khams 'di mthong gyur te/ /sangs rgyas che ba nyid dag la/ /gang gi sems ni mi g.yo ba/ /de dag mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos la gang gi rnams/ /mnyam pa'i sems

su rab 'jug cing / /mi gnyis mngon gyur brtan pa rnams/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/ /gang rnams bdag dang sangs rgyas dag /rang bzhin mnyam par rab gnas shing / /mi gnas len pa med pa rnams/ /de dag bde bar gshegs par

'gyur/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /rnam par shes dang sems pa dag /grangs med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /de dag thub pa chen por 'gyur/ /blta bar bya las 'das pa dang / /rnam par blta las de bzhin te/ /chos la gang

dag rmongs med pa/ /de dag rab tu 'od byed 'gyur/ /gang gis shes rab chen po rnams/ /sems bskyed kun la rab gnas shing / /thams cad mthong yang skye med pa/ /de dag grags pa chen por 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la skye ba med/ /'jig

pa'ang yod pa ma yin te/ /de ltar gang gis shes pa ni/ /de dag bla na med par 'gyur/ /gang gis gcig la mang shes shing / /mang po'ang gcig tu rab rtogs te/ /gnas kyi rnams su'ang 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de dag 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /de nas 'od

zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas 'das te/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so/ /byang shar gyi phyogs

mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang steng gi phyogs dag tu yang 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams re re zhing yang

'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du yang bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci'ang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar

bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gi gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa

bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam

dpal dang / sangs rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go /byang

chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang / pad mo'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / uta pa la'i mdog dang /

sa le sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog dang / shel gyi mdog dang 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring

na/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi skyod pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa dang / rig byed bsgribs pa med pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang /

rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig

tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag

kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /gang gis 'gro ba shin tu gtses gyur cing / /sred pa'i gsal shing ldan par kun shes nas/ /rang 'byung kun mkhyen yon tan tshol ba rnams/ /de dag chos nyid 'di 'dra 'di yin no/ /chos kyi rang bzhin gnas

pa mthong gyur nas/ /mtha' gnyis gang gis rab tu spangs gyur cing / /ldog pa med cing dgos pa kun shes pa/ /de dag nga yi 'khor lo mtshungs med skor/ /gang rnams chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa yis/ /'khor ba'i skye dgu kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /

bskal pa bsam yas rgya chen go gyon pa'i/ /drang srong chen po'i longs spyod 'di 'dra'o/ /gzhan gyis mi pham dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan can/ /bdud rnams thams cad mthar 'byin mgon po rnams/ /byams pas gang dag mi 'jigs sgra 'byin pa/ /

de dag chos nyid 'di 'dra 'di yin no/ /'di dag nang nas byung ngo zhes bya bar/ /nyon mongs sel ba'i sems ni skad cig tu/ /thams cad shes pa su yi rgyud skyes pa/ /de dag rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag ston/ /gang rnams chos kyi rnga ni rdung byed cing / /

byang chub sems kyang srog chags thams cad la/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun tu shes byed pa/ /rang byung de dag tshul ni 'di 'dra'o/ /gdul bar dka' ba mtha' yas spyod yul can/ /zhing rnams bye ba gang dag spyod gyur cing / /nam yang dngos po dag

la mos med pa/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs bzhin rnam par 'phrul/ /gang rnams dga' zhing mos pa mtha' yas pa/ /rgyal ba rnams ni shin tu rnam dag cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa mkha' 'dra rjes dran pa/ /de dag la ni

smon lam 'di yang btab/ /sems can don la gang rnams mos gyur cing / /re re dag gis mnar med sdug bsngal ba/ /bskal pa dpag med smin par bya dad pa/ /de dag skyon med pham med shin tu srung / /gang rnams lus dang srog la mi lta zhing / /sangs

rgyas chos la rtag tu brtul zhugs te/ /mkhas pa bdag med rnam par su spyod pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas chos nyid 'od thob po/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya snang bar byas pa

nas gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang

ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig pa de bzhin du

'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang

chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal dang / sangs rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi

dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang /

pad+mo'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ut+pa la'i mdog dang / sa le sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog dang / shel gyi mdog dang 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams

cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod de/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi skyod pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa dang / rig byed bsgribs pa med pa dang /

rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa'

sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin te/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ /gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang

brjod de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du/ /thugs su chud pas bsgribs pa med gzigs te/ /zil gyis mi non chags pa mi mnga' bar/ /skye dgu rab tu 'dul bar shin tu

snang / /la las gser gyi ri bo 'dra ba de/ /sku cher skye bar gyur pa rab tu mthong / /skyes bu zla ba rnam par mdzes pa de/ /tha ma'i sku yang 'dzin par la las mthong / /yon tan tshad las 'das pa kun mnga' zhing / /dgongs pa mkhyen bzhin shin tu mkhas

gyur pa/ /skye dgu'i seng ge don yod gshegs pa ste/ /la las 'chag cing gshegs par shin tu mthong / /phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par snang ba de/ /la la mthon thing spyan du de bzhin mthong / /'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa'i

skye dgu rnams/ /gzigs nas bzhad par de bzhin la las mthong / /gzi brjid mtshungs med mnga' la la la yis/ /seng ge'i nga ror gsung ba de bzhin mthong / /zil gyis mi non ma log gsung mnga' ba/ /sku yi tha mar ston pa la las mthong / /bcings

pa kun las rnam par grol ba de/ /la las khab nas 'byung bar rab tu mthong / /sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spyod pa rnams/ /gzigs shing zhi ba der gzhol la las mthong / /la las byang chub snying po dam pa la/ /chos rnams thams cad mngon par sangs

rgyas shing / /yon tan thams cad pha rol phyin pa dang / /mun pa rdul bstsal nyon mongs sbyangs pa mthong / /la las chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yang / /thugs rje chen po brnyes pa de mthong ngo / /la las skye dgu tshad med rnam 'dul bar/ skyes bu'i dam pa de ni de

bzhin mthong / /la las gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa de/ /'jig rten thams cad zil gyis mnan mdzad de/ /rdzu 'phrul chags med bla med stobs mnga' ba/ /seng ge'i nga ro sgrog par de bzhin mthong / /la las rab tu zhi ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ /'jig rten sgron

ma mya ngan 'das par mthong / /rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong nas kyang / /stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' de dag rab tu shes/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das te shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong snang bar byas pa nas gzhung de

bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang

rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa sangs

rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo / /thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam

dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar du'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /

byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang

re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig

na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /gang gis bde gshegs rnams kyi chos zab pa/ /zil gyis non pa brjod pa med pa rnams/ /gang la 'jig rten rtag tu myos 'gyur ba/

de dag thams cad rim gyis rab tu ston/ /gal te bdag gcig med du zin na ni/ /de yi spyod yul stong pa zhi ba'ang med/ /rang byung rdul rnams shin tu bstsal ba yi/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yang ji ltar 'byung / /mkhyen dang rnam grol

zhabs dang ldan pa rnams/ /mtshungs pa med la grangs kyang nam yang med/ de ni 'jig rten 'di na la la dag /rgyu la thogs pa med par 'dod phyir ro/ /gang la phung po med cing khams med de/ /skye mched dag dang skye zhing 'chi

med pa/ /de yi grangs ni 'jig rten 'di brnyes pas/ /skyes bu seng ge rnams su rab tu brjod/ /nang dang phyi zhes bya bar gdags pa rnams/ /de dag rang bzhin dngos nyid stong pa ste/ /rtog pa med cing rnam rtog de bzhin med/ /gzhal du med pa'i chos

nyid 'di 'dra'o/ /de dag la ni g.yo ba nam yang med/ /snyems shing ldeg dang sgrib pa gang yang med/ /'jig rten thams cad rjes su rab tu mkhyen/ /mtha' yas 'dul ba'i tshul ni 'di 'dra'o/ /zhi ba'i ting 'dzin spyod yul dgyes pa rnams/ /rtse

gcig gnyis la spyod pa ma yin te/ /yid kyis bstsags pa'ang de bzhin gang yang med/ /'dir ni sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa'o/ /rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba rnam dag dang / /las kyi rnam smin sems can spyod pa yis/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes

mi ldog ste/ /bde gshegs chos 'di de ltar bsam mi khyab/ /phyogs rnams bcu na ji ltar 'khod pa yi/ /'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs kun gzigs shing / /sems can tshad med yongs su 'grel mdzad kyang / /skyes bu'i dbang po de dag rtog mi

mnga'/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gser gyi mdog /de yang kun na rnam par kun tu gnas/ /de dag bsam pa ji 'dra ji bzhin du/ /thub pa rnams ni de ltar chos kyang ston/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/

shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu snang bar byas so/ /gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/

'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci'ang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub

sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gi gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas

kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal nas bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems

dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog nas 'dra ba'i mdog gi bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs

pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig

ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /lha

dang 'jig rten bcas pa zil mnan te/ /snying rje la ni gang zhig sems gtong zhing / /'gro ba thams cad bskyab par zhugs pa rnams/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /bde gshegs rnams la snying nas dad bskyed cing / /gang gi

sems ni nam yang mi ldog par/ /sangs rgyas spyod pa yongs su mi gtong bar/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /gang rnams gang du'ang 'jug pa yongs med cing / /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams las mi ldog pa/ /

shin tu brtan pa blo gdung med pa rnams/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /gang rnams 'gro zhing 'dug dang 'chag pa'i tshe/ /nyin mtshan rgyun tu rjes su sems byed cing / /sangs rgyas bdag nyid che la sems spel ba/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur

bar 'ong / /dus gsum thams cad rab tu gzhal byas kyang / /gang gi sems ni zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas yon tan rjes su slob mos pa/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su gzhal byas shing / /thams

cad ma lus zhi bar byed pa dang / /bdag dang bdag med 'dod chags bral ba'i sems/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su gzhal byas shing / /rtog dang rnam rtog thams cad rab spangs te/ /spyod pa 'di 'dra dag dang

ldan gyur pa/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab zhing 'jal zhing / /sems can rgya mtsho yid kyis 'thung byed de/ /blo che rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan gyur pa/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /gang gis zhing

rnams rnam par bsams pas na/ /gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes yod med pa/ /thams cad grangs su nye bar 'gro ba ni/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /gang rnams zhing ni rdul du gzhig byas shing / /thams cad phyogs su bkang zhing

bgrang byas te/ /de dag nang du rgyal ba 'dzud byed pa/ /de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong / /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya snang bar byas pa nas/ steng gi phyogs kyi

'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya'i bar du snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci 'ang rung ste gtogs par

gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i

gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub

sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar

gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes

bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams

cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba mthu

chen la/ /gang dag kha dog rigs kyis blta 'dod pa/ /mig nyams log par lta bar gyur pa ste/ /de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid mi shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog dbyibs dag ni/ /'jig rten kun na'ang shes par

nus pa med/ /gang gis bskal pa bye bar bsam byas kyang / /mthu chen rnams kyi kha dog mtha' med do/ /de bzhin gshegs la mtshan nyid mi mnga' ste/ /chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med cing dben/ /yan lag kun ldan blta na mnyam med pa/ /bsam

pa ji bzhin kun na rab tu snang / /sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhal du yod pa min/ /gang rnams ci yang 'di yi tshul bshad de/ /ldan pa ma yin mi ldan ma yin pas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rang bzhin rab tu dben/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phung po

'jig pa med/ /'byung dang 'jig par spro bar mi mdzad de/ /mnga' brnyes mnga' bsgyur rnam par gdon mi za/ /brjod du med par bstan pa rnam par spyod/ /lus dang sems kyang mnyam par rab gyur cing / /nang dang phyi yis rnam par dben pas na/ /gnyis

po bgrang du mi rung shes pa rnams/ /chags med bcings med bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/ /gya nom snang zhing thugs gsal 'od mdzad pa/ /spyod yul yongs dag kun tu snang gyur te/ /thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzigs kun na bzhugs/ /skye dgu'i

don kyang rgya chen yangs pa mdzad/ /gcig tu gyur cing mang por rab tu gyur/ /mang por gyur cing gcig tu de bzhin 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i khams ni du mar thugs chud cing / /thams cad tshul dang 'dra bar rab tu 'gyur/ /sku med de la chags pa gang yang med/ /

byon pa med cing bstsags pa yod min yang / /kha dog mtha' yas rnam par dgod byas shing / /'gro ba sna tshogs lus su de dag snang / /'jig rten thams cad sems kyis brtags pa yin/ /sems ni rtog pa nam yang ma yin te/ /bde gshegs ye shes

de 'dra'i rang bzhin no/ /de phyir rgyal ba'i sku ni 'di 'drar snang / /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcur snang bar byas nas gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams brgya stong phrag bcu'i bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de

dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba

phrag brgya dag na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ste thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag

thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog

ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshang pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs

shes bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang

byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /'jig rten rang byung de las

mchog med pa/ /mi gnas dam pa phul dang mchog gi rnams/ /drang srong chen po srid pa'i rgyud 'grel ba/ /yon tan kun ldan rnam dag 'di yin no/ /'du 'dzi med cing chags pa mi mnga' la/ /'du shes dngos med gnas pa med pa rnams/ /phun

sum dge ldan smad pa mi mnga' ba/ /mgon po rnams kyi chos nyid thub par dka'/ /shin tu 'od snang dag par gyur pa rnams/ /brgal du glags med rnyog pa med pa'i rnams/ /g.yo med mtha' ma rnam par spangs pa yi/ /bde gshegs

rnams kyi ye shes tshul 'di yin/ /lus dang sems la rnam par rtog med cing / /bde gshegs chos la gang zhig 'jug 'gyur ba/ /de dag chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin la/ /nam yang nem nur dbang du mi 'gro ba/ /'jig rten dag na

pa gang yod pa/ /de dag kun la bstan pa'i chos 'jug ste/ /gang dag phyir rgol med pas bstan mdzad kyang / /rang bzhin ldog par 'gyur ba gang yang med/ /dngos po rab shes las rnams yod min par/ /the tsom thams cad rnam par

spangs byas te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu rtogs pa'i tshe/ /sems la rnam par 'byed pa nam yang med/ /mi shes chos rnams rnam par phye ba dag /byung med tshig gi lam gyis rab brjod pa/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi rjes su 'brang

byas na/ /gcig kyang ma yin mang po'ang ma yin no/ /mang dang gcig pa nam yang yod min te/ /mang po rnams la gcig pa yod med do/ /mang dang gcig pa rnam par bsgom byas na/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas shes par

'gyur/ /'jig rten kun tu sems can zhing rnams dang / /shin tu zhi ba'i chos rnams rnam bltas te/ /mi gnas sems la rtog pa pa yis/ /dran ldan sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing gi rnams/ /de dag

rang bzhin ji bzhin brtag byas na/ /gcig dang tha dad gyur pa ma yin te/ /de ltar sangs rgyas tshul 'di shes pa yin/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba snang bar byas pa

nas steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba'i bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/

gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i

gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo / /thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang

chub sems dpa' de dag kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi

mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed

sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin

thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na'ang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /shes rab dpag med chos

rnams mtha' yas pa/ /srid pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa dag /tshe ring nad med mnyam med mtshungs med 'od/ /yon tan che mnga' 'di dag sbyor 'di'o/ /gang gis sangs rgyas chos rnams dngos rtogs shing / /dus gsum kun tu brtags kyang mi ngoms te/

dmigs pa shes byed rnam par mi rtog pa/ /bsam yas mos pa de dag sbyor 'di yin/ /sems can yul mos sems can 'du shes med/ /'jig tshogs chos shes lam gyi rgyud dang bral/ /bsam gtan nang dang sems la bcings pa med/ /chags med

yid ldan de dag sbyor 'di yin/ /rtog mkhas rab tu rtogs pa'i chos can rnams/ /mya ngan 'das spyod rigs la brtson pa dag /thar pa'i lam brtson mnyam pa nyid ldan pa/ /zhi ba thob pa de dag sbyor 'di'o/ /ded dpon rjes song sangs rgyas byang chub mchog /thams

cad mkhyen pa chos dbyings bzhin rtogs shing / /bde 'jug mkhas pas sems can rnams 'don pa/ /bde gshegs bsam can de dag sbyor 'di'o/ /sangs rgyas don tshig rjes su shes bya zhing / /chags med blo yangs rtogs shing bsam gtan byed/ /kun

tu 'gro bar song las rtsol spyod pa/ /rang byung spyod pa de dag sbyor 'di'o/ /nam mkha'i dbyings dang sprul pa yid ldan rnams/ /gnas dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid shes pa dag /mya ngan 'das rigs spyod pa mkha' 'dra rnams/ /thob dka' thob pa

rnams kyi sbyor 'di'o/ /zla ba zla phyed nyin dang nub bgrang zhing / /lo dang bskal pa'i rang bzhin su sems pa/ /'jig rten 'du zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / /grangs tshul sus rtogs de dag sbyor 'di'o/ /zhing gi sems can ji snyed skye 'chi ba/ /gzugs

dang gzugs med 'du shes 'du shes med/ /de dag ming dang gnas pa rtogs shes pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rtogs pa'i sbyor 'di'o/ /'das pa'i dus dang ma 'ongs da ltar la/ /ngag gis lam gyis gang na rtogs byed cing / /dus gsum rang bzhin ji bzhin
