rtogs gyur pa/ /mnyam med de dag sbyor ba 'di yin no/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu snang bar byas pa nas/ steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag

bcu'i bar du snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag

thams cad ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya

dag kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo / /thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag

thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams

gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi

g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de

bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /'das dus gang gis

bsgrub dka'i brtul zhugs che brtsams shing / /nam yang zhum pa'i sems su gtong bar mi byed de/ /brgal dka' rgal te bdag gis sems can kun gdul zhes/ /seng ge'i sgra sgrog de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/ /gang zhig 'dod dang sred pa 'byung zhing

'jug pa dang / /ma rig gzhol ba gti mug mun bsgribs 'jig rten rnams/ /sems can rang bzhin bdag med brtan pa bzod par 'gyur/ /bdag kyang 'jig rten mgon 'gyur zhes pa de yul 'di/ /'jig rten sems can mang po 'dod dregs 'dam bying ba/

med pa'i chos la rtog pas sdug bsngal mthong gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul chos la bag yod gang spyod cing / /bdag gis sems can kun bsgral de dag spyod yul 'di/ /sngon mtha' shes dka' tshad med brtan pas mthong gyur cing / /bdag rten sems

can pha rol mtha' yas 'khor gyur pa/ /de dag rgyal bas theg pa zhi ba mchog la bkod/ /bdag gis de 'dra'i chos bstan de yi spyod yul lo/ /sems can khams rnams mgon med nad kyis gzir gyur cing / /ngan song gzhol ba 'dod chags zhe sdang

gti mug gdungs/ /me lce 'bar phung 'jigs gzugs mi bzad bsregs gyur pa/ /mthong nas sgrol phyir zhugs pa de dag spyod yul 'di'o/ /lam gol lam ma yin pa'i rkyen la spyod gyur cing / /mun pa chen por rtol bar dka' rnyed 'gro mthong nas/ /

snang ba chen po bskyed de sangs rgyas chos ston ces/ /'di skad tshig brjod de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/ /srid pa'i mtshos g.yengs sems can rab tu mang ba dag /mtha' mi mthong zhing skyabs med do zhes mi dga' ba/ /mthong nas brtson 'grus stobs bskyed

chos kyi gru sbyar cing / /pha rol su 'gro zhes brjod de dag spyod yul 'di'o/ /sems can rtsa ba med la gnas pa mi mkhas kun/ /g.yang sa chen por ltung zhing sems nyams rmongs mthong nas/ /snying rjes chos kyi zam la mkhas pa su 'god cing / /dran

par gyis shes su smra de dag spyod yul 'di'o/ /shin tu dog pa'i btson rar sdug bsngal sems can rnams/ /nad dang rga bas gzir cing mtshams kyis mnar ba dag /mthong nas bdag gis thabs kyi chos rnams kun brtsams te/ /sems can kun dgrol

sems pa de dag spyod yul 'di'o/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad thos gyur the tsom med/ /chos dbyings spyod yul phyogs bcu kun tu rgyas bkang ste/ /'di dag thams cad brtags na gsog kyang mi 'jigs shing / /sems can kun la snyoms byed de

yi spyod yul lo/ /de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so/ /'jig

rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten

gyi khams tshad med pa snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar byas so/ /de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa

mtshungs pa med pa kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa sa mtshams med pa dpag tu med pa brjod du med pa dag kyang snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so/ /gzhung de

bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs

mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nas steng gi phyogs kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas pa nas/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i

bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang bar byas so/ /de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rgyas par byas pa nas/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/

gzhung de bzhin du 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ril gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing /

byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo /

thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar

dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa

mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing

byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do/ /thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji

lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to/ /bskal pa gzhal yas bsam gyis mi khyab sems kyi skad cig la/ gang gis mthong yang bstsags med 'gro dang dngos po'i tshul med pa'i/ /lam

du 'jug pa de ni thams cad kun gyis shes 'gyur te/ /stobs bcus tshul 'di ji ltar mkhyen bzhin 'jigs med sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /grags pa snyan par phyogs rnams kun tu mtshungs med grags gyur cing / /bgegs rnams kun las 'das te chos nyid

'di la dgar spyad de/ /tshad med thams cad so sor zhi zhing don rnams kun rtogs pas/ /de phyir phyogs rnams kun bkang bde gshegs chos nyid 'di ston to/ /dgongs pa ji bzhin de ni spyod pa'i 'bras bu 'thun pa ste/ /'jig rten don 'gyur de bzhin gshegs

la mchod pa yongs byas shing / /de dag thams cad so sor 'thun par ye shes rnams bsgoms pas/ /sems can dam pa sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di 'drar phyogs bcur ston/ /thog mar nyan 'dod bla ma bsnyen bkur bzod pa des

byas shing / /rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab rtogs bsam gtan bsnyen byed pa/ /bde gshegs nyid ni rtogs 'gyur 'gro ba rnam sgom sems tshim byed/ /chos nyid de 'dra spyad pa myur du bde gshegs thob par 'gyur/ /snying nas 'dri zhing phyogs rnams

rgyas byed rtse gcig thob byed cing / /rgyal ba'i yon tan mos las mi zlog spyod pas tshim byed pa/ /dngos dang dngos med thams cad shes byas spangs shing dngos zad pa/ /sangs rgyas bdag med dpe med mthong ba de dag lus 'di yin/ /bzang po'i spyod yul can

gyi sems kyi phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing / /zhing rnams thams cad chos kyi gter gyis khyab byas tshim byed pa/ /ji bzhin chos gnas chos nyid mtha' la the tsom med pa'i rnams/ /stobs bcu ci 'dra de bzhin gyur pa'i lus ni 'di dag go /bcom

ldan 'das kyis chos gang sgra brjod de la 'jug byed cing / /chos kyi 'khor lo ji bzhin blta dka' gzhal yas rtag bskor ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung kun byang chub yan lag rtogs/ /de ltar 'jug pas rtag tu

sangs rgyas sku rab 'di dag mthong / /mthong yang mig gi rnam shes tshul du rdul med mthong ba med/ /rnam shes sgyu ma bzhin pas mig stong stobs bcu mi mthong ngo / /'du shes thams cad rnam rtog yin gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba min/ /shin tu chags med

yul med de ni rgyal ba mthong ba yin/ /sems can las mang bstsags pa de dag shin tu blta dka' ste/ /nang dang phyi dang dbyibs dang mdog tu phyogs bcu kun na med/ /de bzhin rang byung sku ni gzhal yas phyogs rnams kun 'gengs pa/ /shes par dka' ba 'dren

pa chen po sgrib pa med pas brnyes/ /nam mkha' dag la zhing rnams bye ba dngos por gnas par snang / /de nas 'ong ba med cing phyogs bcu kun tu 'gro ba med/ /gcig cing gnas par 'gyur yang de dag ci la'ang gnas pa med/ /de bzhin rang byung rnams kyi sku ni mkha' dbyings

rtag tu 'gengs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer las rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po bcu bdun pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal

gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rang bzhin gcig pa'i sems la bye brag tha dad pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'di lta ste/ bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan song du 'gro ba dang / dbang po tshang ba dang

dbang po ma tshang ba dang / skye ba 'thun pa dang / skye ba mi 'thun pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bde ba myong ba dang / sdug bsngal myong ba snang ba dag la ltos/ las kyis ni sems mi shes so/ /sems kyis ni las mi shes so/ /tshor bas

ni rnam par smyin pa mi shes so/ /rnam par smin pas ni tshor ba mi shes so/ /sems kyis ni tshor ba mi shes so/ /tshor bas ni sems mi shes so/ /rgyus ni rkyen mi shes so/ /rkyen kyis ni rgyu mi shes so/ /dngos pos ni dmigs pa mi shes so/ /

dmigs pas ni dngos po mi shes so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /sems can bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ /gang 'di yongs su dri ba dang / /chos

rnams chos nyid ci 'dra ba/ /'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis/ /chos rnams 'di dag g.yo ba med/ /shin tu dngos po med pa ste/ /de phyir gzhan gyis gzhan dag gi /ngo bo nyid kyang mi shes so/ /ji ltar chu klung rgyud kyi rnams/ /
gzhan dang gzhan du 'grogs rgyu yang / /gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te/ /chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar 'bar ba'i mtshan ma can/ /'od 'phro gzhan dang gzhan 'grogs kyang / /gcig gis

gcig ni mi shes te/ /chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar rlung ni sten tshul gyis/ /gzhan dang gzhan gyi bar du rgyu/ /gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te/ /chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar sa yi khams kyi rnams/ /

gcig la gcig ni gnas gyur kyang / /gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te/ /chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no/ /mig dang rna ba sna dag dang / /lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnams/ /'di dag lam ni rgyu 'khod kyang / /byed pa po ni gang yang med/ /'byung ba'i rang bzhin

med pa yis/ /'byung ba nye bar bstan byas kyang / /bstan par byas pa gang yang med/ /bstan pa la ni dngos po med/ /mig ni rang bzhin nyid kyis stong / /rna ba sna yang rang bzhin gyis/ /lce dang lus dang yid rnams kyang / /med de yongs su brtags pa yin/ /gang

zhig rang bzhin dngos med par/ /tshul bzhin rab tu rtogs byed pa/ /de yi mig la 'khrul pa med/ /chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab po/ /yang dag pa dang yang dag min/ /bden nam 'on te rdzun yang rung / /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten kun/ /tshig gi las

kyis brjod pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems can thams cad sems can med mod kyi 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'dul ba'i dus la ji ltar

'bab pa dang / sems can gyi tshe ji lta ba dang lus ji lta ba dang spyod pa ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang mtshan ma ji lta ba dang bsam pa ji lta ba dang sbyor ba ji lta ba dang sems ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyis sems can gdul ba'i phyir mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub

sems dpa' nor dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /gang rnams rab tu zhi spyod cing / thos dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yin/ /'di don ji 'dra de bzhin du/ /'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis/ /bdag gi

lus la su gnas zhes/ /gang gi nang ni rab shes pa/ /yang dag yod dam med pa'i don/ /des ni rab tu shes pa yin/ /lus kyi rnam par dgod pa ni/ /phyogs na mi gnas brjod pa yin/ /de bas shes pa de gnas la/ /nam yang chags par mi byed

do/ /lus ni rnam par spyad pa yis/ /dngos po kun kyang rnam par bsgoms/ /sems ni phyir ldog mi 'gyur te/ /dngos po kun nas brtags pa'o/ /gang gi tshe ni rjes su 'brang / /gang gi tshe ni phyir ldog 'gyur/ /ji ltar mgal me 'khor lo yi/ /

thog ma tha ma bskor ba bzhin/ /dngos po thams cad mi rtag par/ /skye bo gang rnams rtogs pa yang / /lus la bdag kyang med pa'i phyir/ /'du shes phyir yang ldog par 'gyur/ /bdag med rmi lam lta bu yi/ /las ni kun tu rab tu 'byung / /rnam par

smin pas rab tu 'byung / /phyi ma ji bzhin sngon de bzhin/ /sems ni dbang byed yin par bshad/ /dad pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du/ /tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log /'jig rten thams cad ston par byed/ /ji snyed 'jig rten brda yod pa/ /de dag thams

cad brtags pa ste/ /chos nyid de ni nam du yang / /chos gcig la yang mi gnas so/ /rkyen rnams la ni rten bcas te/ /chos rnams so sor rab tu 'byung / /phyi ma ji bzhin sngon de bzhin/ /de dag ldog par de bzhin 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub

sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems can thams cad kyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams yongs su 'dzin pa med cing bdag gi med la mnyam pa yin yang / 'on kyang bde ba'i tshor ba dag kyang snang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag kyang snang /

yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa dang / nang du byed pa dang phyi rol du byed pa dang / tshor ba chung ba dang / tshor ba che ba dang / tshe 'di la myong ba dang / tshe gzhan la myong ba dag kyang snang la/ chos kyi dbyings la ni yid

du 'ong ba'am/ yid du mi 'ong ba yang med pa 'di ci zhig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /ji ltar las rnams byas gyur pa/ /tshor ba de bzhin 'byung 'gyur gyis/ /

'di la byed pa gang yang med/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/ /shin tu phyis pa'i me long la/ /ngo ni ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin/ /de la de ni de bzhin snang / /chos kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar zhing dang sa bon dag /gcig gi gcig ni

mi shes kyang / /rang bzhin nye bar ston par byed/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /sgyu ma byed pa mkhas pa zhig /lam po cher ni song 'dug ste/ /gzugs rnams ston par byed pa bzhin/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar shing gi 'khrul

'khor rnams/ /sna tshogs sgra mang brjod byed kyang / /de ni bdag dang bdag med min/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar bya rnams mang po yis/ /sgo nga'i sbubs ni phye ba las/ /sgra skad gzhan dang gzhan 'gyur ba/ /las kyi rang bzhin de

bzhin no/ /ji ltar ma yi mngal du yang / /bu ni 'pho bar mi 'gyur te/ /'on kyang dbang po sna tshogs 'gyur/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar sems dmyal 'jigs pa na/ /gshin rje'i ris gtogs sdug bsngal ba/ /de dag la ni 'ong

ba med/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ji ltar rin chen mchog rnams dang / /lha yi bu rnams kun ldan yang / /'pho bar snang ba gang yang med/ /de bzhin las kyi rang bzhin no/ /ji ltar 'jig rten la la dag /bsam gyis mi khyab 'bar gyur

kyang / /de dag 'ong ba gang yang med/ /las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig mngon par

sangs rgyas na 'on kyang chos tshad med pa yang yang dag par ston/ zhing tshad med pa yang rnam par ston/ sems can tshad med pa yang rab tu ston/ /gsung tshad med pa yang shin tu sgrog /sku tshad med pa yang shin tu ston/ /bsam pa tshad med pa yang thugs

su chud/ rdzu 'phrul tshad med pa yang yang dag par ston/ /'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa yang shin tu skyong / rgyan tshad med pa yang byin gyis rlobs/ /spyod yul tshad med pa yang shin tu ston/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam pa tha dad du mi snang ba 'di ci zhig /de nas

byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /gnas 'di shes par dka' ba ste/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis bdag la dris/ /de ni mkhas pas rnam par shes/ /yon tan mos pa dpyod par byed/ /

ji ltar sa ni gcig pu yang / /sems can mang po rab tu rgyu/ /de la gcig dang tha dad med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar ni gcig pu yang / /'jig rten kun na kun kyang 'bud/ /de la lce tha dad med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de

bzhin no/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho gcig pu las/ /chu klung tshad med 'bab gyur kyang / /de la chu yi bye brag med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar rlung ni gcig pu yang / /'jig rten kun na rgyu zhing ldang / /de la gcig dang tha dad med/ /sangs

rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /sprin chen rnams ni 'brug bsgrags shing / /sa rnams kun kyang ngoms par byed/ /de yi char la bye brag med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar sa ni gcig pu yang / /myu gu sna tshogs 'byin cing ston/ /sa la

bye brag 'byed pa med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar sgrib med nyi ma ni/ /phyogs bcu kun tu snang bar byed/ /de la 'od zer tha dad med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i zla ba ni/ /'jig

rten kun la rab tu snang / /gnas nas 'gyur ba gang yang med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ji ltar tshangs pa mi mjed bdag /stong gsum na ni 'dug mod kyi/ /de la lus ni bye brag med/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems

dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba bskyed pa gcig kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can rnams gzugs sna tshogs dang / kha

dog sna tshogs dang / rigs sna tshogs dang / dbang po sna tshogs dang / longs spyod sna tshogs dang / dbang sna tshogs dang / 'khor sna tshogs dang / yon tan sna tshogs dang / phyug dbul sna tshogs dang / shes rab sna tshogs su yang snang la de bzhin

gshegs pa ni gang la yang mi mnyam pa'am/ tha dad du dgongs pa gang yang med na 'di ci zhig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar sa ni ro gcig kyang /

sa bon tshul bzhin myu gu ston/ /byams dang sdang bar sems pa med/ /sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no/ /ji ltar chu ni ro gcig kyang / /snod kyi dbang gis rnam par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ /rgyud kyi rnams la rnam par

'gyur/ /ji ltar sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ni/ /rtag tu 'khor kyang mgu bar byed/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ /shin tu sbyangs pa dga' bar byed/ /ji ltar mkhas pa'i rgyal po dag /'gro ba mang po shes par byed/ /de bzhin sangs

rgyas yon phul ba/ /ji ltar bskyed bzhin shes par byed/ /ji ltar dri med me long la/ /ji 'dra'i gzugs rnams de bzhin snang / /de bzhin sems can bsam tshul de/ /sangs rgyas yon phul rnam dag 'byung / /ji ltar dug phan sman gyi

rnams/ /dug nad thams cad sos par byed/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ /nyon mongs dug ni chen po sel/ /ji ltar nyi ma shar ba ni/ /'gro ba 'di dag snang bar byed/ /mun pa dag kyang rnam par sel/ /sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no/ /ji

ltar zla ba dri med pa/ /kun tu mnyam pa nyid byas te/ /sa ni rab tu snang bar byed/ /sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no/ /ji ltar chu yi stobs shugs kyis/ /sa ni thams cad g.yo 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no/ /srid gsum 'gro ba

rnams kyang skyod/ /'bar dang 'od 'phro bcas pa'i me/ /thams cad dag tu sreg pa'i dngos/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ /'du byed thams cad sreg par byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson

'grus dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa gcig na thams cad lta ba mthun pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar ci'i phyir mi 'gyur/ de dag kun la'ang gzugs ni gzugs nyid du zad/ tshor ba ni tshor ba nyid du

zad/ 'du shes ni 'du shes nyid du zad/ 'du byed rnams kyang 'du byed rnams nyid du zad/ rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par shes pa nyid du zad/ 'dod pa'i khams kyang 'dod pa'i khams nyid du zad/ gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams nyid du zad/

gzugs med pa'i khams kyang gzugs med pa'i khams nyid du zad/ ma rig pa yang ma rig pa nyid du zad/ sred pa'ang sred pa nyid du zad la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'ang phan par byed pa 'am/ gnod par byed pa ma yin na/ de ci'i phyir/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ de ltar khyod kyis dris pa gang / /la la myur du rnam grol zhing / /la la dka' bar 'grol 'gyur ba/ /

sangs rgyas sras po bdag la nyon/ /'di 'dra dpag tu med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bstan gyi nyes ma yin/ /dad dang brtson 'grus nan tan gyis/ /rtag tu khyad par 'gyur ba yin/ /ji ltar rtsa dang shing gsher ba/ /mer bcug shin tu nyams chung zhing / /ring

por mi thogs 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar gtsub mas gtsubs pa'i tshe/ /ma byung bar ni myur bteg na/ /myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ba bzhin/ /de ltar le lo bstan pa la/ /nyi ma'i nor bu'i lci ba la/ /yang dang yang bzhag bteg

pa la/ de la me 'byung mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i tshe/ /byis pa rnams ni mig brtsums shing / /mi mthong ci phyir zhes smra ba/ /de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ /rkang lag med par skyes pa'i mis/ /ji

ltar smyug mda' kha bug gis/ /sa ni dbug par 'dod pa bzhin/ /de ltar le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar byis pa rgya mtsho las/ /yang du yang du bcus byas shing / /skam par la la 'dod pa ltar/ /de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar bum pa chus

bkang zhing / /bskal pa'i me ni byung ba'i tshe/ /la la gsad par 'dod pa ltar/ /de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ /ji ltar la la phyogs bcu yis/ /nam mkha' ji snyed tha mal pa'i/ /gzugs kyis rgyas par dgang smra ba/ /de bzhin le lo bstan pa la/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras chos kyi tshul nyon mongs pa thams cad skems pa 'di nyid blangs kyang / sems can la la 'dod chags kyi dbang du 'gro/ la la zhe

sdang gi dbang du 'gro/ la la gti mug gi dbang du 'gro/ la la nga rgyal gyi dbang du 'gro/ 'chab pa'i dbang du 'gro/ khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang du 'gro/ phrag dog gi dbang du 'gro/ ser sna'i dbang du 'gro/ sgyu'i dbang du 'gro/ g.yo'i dbang du 'gro la

chos de dag kyang sems med par yang gzung du 'ang mi nus te/ nyon mongs par gdags pa kun kyang rnam pa kun tu sems kyi rgyud tu zad na de ji lta bu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad

de smras pa/ /gang gis don de dris pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas sras po nga la nyon/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di/ /thos pa tsam gyis mi 'grub po/ /la la stobs med chu klung gis/ /nan gyis khyer bar gyur pa dag /skom zhing shi bar gyur pa bzhin/ /

ma bsgoms chos kyang de bzhin no/ /ji ltar 'gro ba mang po la/ /zas dang skom dag sbyin byas kyang / /bdag nyid bkres pas shi ba ltar/ /de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o/ /ji ltar sman pa la la zhig /sman rnams thams cad bdog bzhin du/ /lto

ba'i nad kyis shi ba bzhin/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /ji ltar dbyig gi mdzod dag tu/ /rin chen mang po bgrang byed kyang / /nam phyed tsam yang 'thob pa/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /ji ltar bde ba kun ldan pa'i/ /rgyal po'i pho brang

'khor skyes kyang / /zas dang gos dag mi bdog pa/ /de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o/ /ji ltar 'on pa rol mo yi/ /sil snyan glu la mkhas pa zhig /gzhan zhig de yid dga' byed pa/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /ji ltar dmus long

ri mo mkhan/ /tshong dus dbus su 'drir 'jug kyang / /bdag nyid kyis ni mi mthong ba/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /ji ltar mtsho chen mnyan pa zhig /skye bo mang po sgrol byed kyang / /bdag nyid de nang 'chir 'gyur ba/ /chos la ma bskyoms de

bzhin no/ /ji ltar lam gyi bzhi mdor yang / /phun sum tshogs pa kun brjod cing / /bdag gis thob par mi 'gyur ba/ /chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub

sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la la la ni sbyin pa brjod/ la la la ni tshul khrims/ la la la ni

bzod pa/ la la la ni brtson 'grus/ la la la ni bsam gtan/ la la la ni shes rab brjod pa mdzad/ la la la ni byams pa/ la la la ni snying rje/ la la la ni dga' ba/ la la la ni btang snyoms brjod par mdzad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub tu ni chos gcig 'gas 'byung bar mi nus so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /sems can gzhan gyi bsam shes pa/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste/ /de ltar

gang gis don dris pa/ /sangs rgyas sras po bdag la nyon/ /smra ba'i mchog ni gang yang rung / /chos gcig gis ni 'byung ba med/ /gang yang 'byung ba yod pa / /'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin med/ /bskal pa gang la gnas pa yi/ /bsam pa

mkhyen nas don mdzad cing / /gang la ji dag tshul 'thun pa/ /de bzhin chos kyang bstan pa mdzad/ /ser sna can la sbyin pa brjod/ /tshul khrims ngan la tshul khrims rnams/ /mi bzod pa ni bzod pa des/ /brtson 'grus 'byor pa le lo la'o/ /

rnam par 'khrug la bsam gtan brjod/ /shes rab 'byor pa shes med la'o/ /gdug pa'i sems la byams pa bshad/ /'tshe ba rnams la snying rje ste/ /zhum pa la ni dga' ba bshad/ /'khor ba'i sems la btang snyoms te/ /sangs

rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyang / /rim pas de ltar 'byung ba yin/ /ji ltar sa la las byas pa/ /khyim gyi dngos la rim pa yin/ /de bzhin sbyin pa tshul khrims dag /byang chub sems dpa'i thog mar 'gro/ /rgyal po'i gnas dang grong rdal rnams/ /

rung ba'i phyir ni ra ba ste/ /de bzhin bzod pa brtson 'grus dag /byang chub sems dpa' rung phyir ro/ /ji ltar gdugs gcig rgyal po ni/ /sa rnams thams cad skyong bar byed/ /de bzhin bsam gtan shes rab dag /byang chub sems dpa'i skyabs bzhin no/ /

'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/ /bde ba thams cad ster ba ltar/ /de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyang / /byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba 'byin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal la 'di

skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'byung ba gcig na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / /'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can

gdul ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / tshe'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnams rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'khor tshogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / bstan pa'i tshul rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos

kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam pa tha dad pa dag ci'i phyir snang bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i

dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /chos kyi rgyal po chos nyid ni/ /'jam dpal rtag tu gcig pa ste/ /sgrib pa med pa gzigs pa yi/ /'byung ba de yang gcig pu'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad

sku gcig ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku/ /shes rab thugs kyang gcig pa ste/ /mi 'jigs stobs kyang de bzhin no/ /sngon cad byang chub zhugs pa'i tshe/ /ji ltar yongs su bsngo mdzad pa/ /'khor du chos

rnams bstan pa dang / /de dag zhing yang de bzhin 'gyur/ /zhing gi phun sum gang yod pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams la thams cad 'grub/ /sems can ji snyed sbyangs pa'i rnams/ /de yi rnam pa de ltar mthong / /ji ltar sangs rgyas chos nyid du/ /kun

gyis sangs rgyas mi mthong ste/ /sangs rgyas zhing dang sku dag dang / /'khor du chos bstan de bzhin no/ /gang rnams smon lam mthun ldan zhing / /sngon chad bsam pa yongs sbyangs pas/ /thams cad gzigs pa'i tshul gyi rnams/ /ji lta bzhin du

thams cad mthong / /sems can bsam pa ji bzhin dang / /las dang stobs kyang ji bzhin pa/ /de lta de ltar mthong gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam 'phrul lo/ /sangs rgyas zhing la rtog mi mnga'/ /de dag byams sdang yod pa min/ /bsam pa'i

tshul ni ji bzhin du/ /srog chags rnams kyis de bzhin mthong / /rnam pa tha dad 'jig rten khams/ /de ltar snang bar gyur pa ste/ /drang srong chen po kun gzigs pa'i/ /nyes pa'i skyon las gyur pa med/ /gang na 'dul ba yod pa yi/ 'jig

rten khams rnams thams cad du/ /skyes bu drang srong rnams kyang snang / /de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i

sras/ bdag cag gis rang rang gi spobs pa bstan pa rnams smras pa yin na/ da khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul las brtsams te spobs par gyis shig /sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi yul ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshogs ni gang /

sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gro ba ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud pa'i shes pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su 'gro ba ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul shin tu bstan pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi

yul shes par bya ba ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rtogs pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshul ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ci tsam du yangs/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la tshigs

su bcad de smras pa/ /nam mkha'i yul dang 'dra ba ste/ /kun tu 'od la 'dra ba med/ /sems can thams cad 'jug pa ste/ /chos nyid la ni 'jug pa med/ /tshogs rnams thams cad bstan par ni/ /bskal pa bye bar mi nus te/ /ji snyed rgyal ba'i

tshogs mnga' ba/ /de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no/ /blo gros sems kyang ji bzhin du/ /sems can thams cad rab tu 'jug /de la bstan pa thogs pa med/ /de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no/ /'jig rten thams cad 'jug pa dang / /'jig rten rgyu ba

gang yod pa/ /de dag kun la ye shes gnas/ /gzugs su snang ba ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas ye shes chags med pa/ /dus gsum kun la chags pa med/ /nam mkha' 'byung dang mtshungs pa yin/ /de ni ye shes yul yin no/ /chos kyi dbyings ni tha

mi dad/ /sems can khams rnams rtogs par mkhyen/ /dbyings rnams thams cad rab tu brnyes/ /de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no/ /sgrar gdags ji snyed yod pa dang / /sems can kun gyi sgra skad du/ /sgra la mkhyen pa thugs chud kyang / /rnam par

rtog pa gang yang med/ /rnam shes rnam par shes bya med/ /sems kyis brjod pa'ang ma yin te/ /ye shes rang bzhin shin tu dag /sems can rnams la'ang rab tu bshad/ /nyon mongs med cing las med do/ /dngos po med cing gnas pa med/ /snang
ba med cing rgyu ba med/ /'jig rten dag tu'ang mnyam par spyod/ /sems can kun gyi sems kyi rnams/ /dus gsum kun tu rab yangs pa/ /sems gcig la ni rab 'jug pas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes

'jug /de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can kun gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / chos kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / las kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / lus kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / dbang po'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / skye ba'i rgyud ji

snyed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / tshul khrims log pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur te/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rab

tu snang bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dpag tu med pa grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa gzhal du med pa brjod du pa/

chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad na yang sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar

gyur to/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang

gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dpag tu med pa grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pa/

sa mtshams med pa gzhal du med pa brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na/ sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du de dag thams cad

sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas dris pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di

skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar na kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam

par ma nyams pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ yid kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ lus kyi las ma smad pa yin/ ngag gi las ma smad pa yin/ yid kyi las ma smad pa yin/ lus kyi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/ ngag gi las

mi 'phrogs pa yin/ yid kyi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/ lus kyi las mi zlog pa yin/ ngag gi las mi zlog pa yin/ yid kyi las mi zlog pa yin/ lus kyi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ ngag gi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ yid kyi las mi 'khrugs

pa yin/ lus kyi las bsngags pa yin/ ngag gi las bsngags pa yin/ yid kyi las bsngags pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par dag pa yin/ yid kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/ lus kyi las nye bar nyon

mongs pa med pa yin/ ngag gi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ yid kyi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ ngag gi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro
ba yin/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rus phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ dran pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros

phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros mchog tu gyur pa yin/ blo gros dam par gyur pa yin/ blo gros rab tu gyur pa yin/ blo gros tshad med

pa yin/ blo gros grangs med pa yin/ blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ blo gros mtshungs pa med pa yin/ blo gros gzhal du med pa yin/ blo gros brjod du med pa yin/ rgyu'i stobs can yin/ bsam pa'i stobs can yin/ sbyor ba'i stobs

can yin/ rkyen gyi stobs can yin/ dmigs pa'i stobs can yin/ dbang po'i stobs can yin/ rnam par lta ba'i stobs can yin/ zhi gnas kyi stobs can yin/ lhag mthong gi stobs can yin/ nges par rtogs pa'i stobs can yin/

phung po la mkhas pa yin/ khams la mkhas pa yin/ skye mched la mkhas pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams la mkhas pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la mkhas pa yin/ 'das pa la mkhas

pa yin/ ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pa yin/ da ltar byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi

yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ rab tu byang ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ btang snyoms yang dag

byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ stong pa nyid yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ mtshan ma med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ smon pa med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin gnas dang gnas ma yin par shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa

dang / da ltar byung ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ dbang po dang brtson 'grus tha dad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa khong du chud pa yin/ khams sna tshogs dang khams du ma'i shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ mos pa sna

tshogs dang / mos pa du ma shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba

dang ldang ba shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i mig chags pa med par shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par gcad pa shes par

bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha yi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ klu'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ dri za'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos yongs su bzung

ba yin/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos
yongs su bzung ba yin/ lha yi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ klu yi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ dri za'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ nam

mkha' lding gi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ mi yi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa

yin/ skyabs su gyur pa yin/ dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin/ mgon du gyur pa yin/ sgron mar gyur pa yin/ snang bar gyur pa yin/ 'od du gyur pa yin/ 'dren par gyur pa yin/ rnam par 'dren par gyur pa yin/ yongs su 'dren par

gyur pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa yin/ gtso bor gyur pa yin/ thu bor gyur pa yin/ rab tu gyur pa yin/ dam par gyur pa yin/ phul du gyur pa yin/ bla na med par gyur pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ji

ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyam pa med pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod skye bo mang po la

phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang / bde ba dang bde bar rnam par gzud pa'i phyir zhugs shing / de ltar khyod rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas dag yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni/ kye

rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dag gi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur

ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi lam du 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong pa'i sems

kyang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba yang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / kun tu bzang zhing kun tu

mdzes pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing srog chags thams cad la ston pa gnyis par 'gyur ba'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba yod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi

las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas/ yon tan kyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi nang du 'dug

pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad rang bzhin shes pa dang ldan pas khyim gyi thibs pos zil gyis mi non par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /pha ma dang 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyab

pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /bu dang bu mo dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa dang shin tu bral bas dga' ba dang mi dga' ba dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /

'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'dod pa'i gsal shing rnam par sel bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /glu dang gar dang rol mo dang sil snyan dang 'grogs pa'i

tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gar mkhan gyis tshon lta bur mthong ba dang ldan zhing chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i brjod pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /chung ma'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/

byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i gsal shing dang bral zhing 'phags pa'i sar chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad srid par 'byung ba/ 'jig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas

khur bor bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /khang thog du phyin pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par khong du chud cing chos kyi khang stengs su phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems

can thams cad bdag gir bya ba med de/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems med cing bdag gi thams cad yongs su gtong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ma bral zhing 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi

mthar phyin te/ 'du ba dang shin tu bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /btson ra la kha na ma tho ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la spyod cing / gang du dga' bar 'dod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /

khyim nas khyim med par 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sems bcings pa dang grol ba med cing chags pa med de mi dgos pa dang bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /dge 'dun gyi ra ba'i mtshams 'da' ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas

sems can thams cad 'gal ba med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing 'thun par 'gro ba mang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi drung du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la rtsom zhing cho ga la mkhas

par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bar chad med cing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /gos dkar po 'dor ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad

sdig pa la brtson pa spangs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu sbyangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /skra dang kha spu 'breg pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing nyon mongs pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /gos ngur

smrig gyon pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad drang srong chen po'i sems dang ldan zhing rnyog pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rab tu 'byung ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can rnams skye bo thams cad yongs su skyong ba'i phyir/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung bar rab tu byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dge ba la mos pa mngon par skyes pas/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad pa'i don du brtson par

gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /chos la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos kyi gter rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can

thams cad chags pa'i gnas dang bral zhing dge 'dun yongs su sdud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /bslab pa'i tshig yang dag par len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad tshul bzang po la yang dag par spyod cing bslab pa thams

cad shin tu slob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad log pa ma yin pa'i las la spyod cing tshul dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mkhan pos

bstan pa'i tshe/ /byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing mi skye ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can

thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin ste thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /gtsug lag khang du 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'phrogs pa'i chos can du gyur te bla na med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod par gyur cig

ces sems bskyed do/ /stan gding ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing legs par bkod pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /'dug pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi gnas pa'i sems kyis

snying po byang chub la 'dug par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /skyil mo krung 'cha' ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi g.yo ba'i sa la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /zhi gnas yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i

tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa la brtson zhing zhi ba dang / /dul ba la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lhag mthong yongs su sbyong ba byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin

tu nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos can du gyur te/ /chos yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /skyil mo krung 'jig pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing 'du byed thams cad rang bzhin

gyis 'jig pa rnam par mthong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rkang mthil gzhog pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sems rnam par grol ba mi 'khrugs pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rkang mthil 'degs pa'i

tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan pa thob ste/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba las 'thon par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /smad g.yogs gyon pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang

ldan zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ska rags 'chings pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu 'brel par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /bla gos

gyon pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste/ gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /snam sbyar gyon pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi

'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te thabs dam pas mngon par bkab par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /so shing len pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dngos po 'thob pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems

bskyed do/ /so shing za ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa shin tu bcom ste/ sems dul zhing sems rnam par dag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /dben par 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can

thams cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs te/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad spangs par gyur cig /ces sems bskyed do/ /chu ngogs su 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten las

'das pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu 'byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /gtsang sbra'i las byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu dag pa'i dngos pos gtsang zhing des pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lag

pa 'khru ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gzung zhing bcang ba'i phyir bkra shis kyi lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ngo 'khru ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu nyon

mongs pa dang bral zhing chos thams cad kyi sgo rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /'khar ba len pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mchod sbyin byas shing lam ston par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lhung bzed len

pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis mchod par 'os shing snod du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /spyod yul du mngon par zhugs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med par gzhol zhing sangs rgyas kyi spyod

yul la mngon du phyogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lam du zhugs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad phyi na ma lus par 'gro zhing sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems

dpas sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos bsgribs pa med pa grub par gyur pas chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lam mtho ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu

zhum pa med de khams gsum las gyen du 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lam dma' ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan cing sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu 'dud par gyur cig ces

sems bskyed do/ /lam nyam nga ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lta ba yo zhing drang ba dang bral te lam nyam nga ba yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lam drang po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams

cad g.yo med cing sgyu med de sems drang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lam rdul chen po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu rdul med pa'i chos yang dag par thob ste 'dod chags par 'gyur ba'i chos las rnam par

grol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rdul med pa'i lam mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgom pa dang ldan zhing sems 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /g.yang sa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub

sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa rtogs par khong du chud cing sdig pa'i chos thams cad bstsal te dge ba'i chos la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /'khor mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dus gsum du gtogs

pa'i chos zab mo bstan pa dang 'thun par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ka ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad khro zhing mkhon du 'dzin pa dang bral te/ khengs pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig ces

sems bskyed do/ /nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ri mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thob par

dka' ba dang thibs po med pa rab tu thob cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /shing tsher ma can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug med cing tsher

ma dang bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /shing lo ma can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis rab tu g.yogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /

me tog mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa'i me tog rgyas pas me tog lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /me tog gi shing mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems

can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi me tog shin tu rgyas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /shing tog mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying po byang chub du gzhol zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba thams cad

'bras bu yod de/ 'bras bu'i dam pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /chu klung mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyams su myong ste/ chos kyi rgyud la mnyam par bzhag par gyur cig ces sems

bskyed do/ /lu ma mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rdzing bu mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams

cad kyi tshig shin tu bstan pa la mkhas shing chos thams cad kyis rgyas pa'i tshig gi las dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /khron pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad 'byor pa dang ldan zhing spobs pa mang bar

gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mtsho mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gong nas gong du dmigs pa la rab tu brtson zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /zam pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can

thams cad skye bo thams cad yongs su bsgral ba la zam par ded par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /yur ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi sems dang bsam pa la mkhas shing bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas 'khor ba

med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ra ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la sred pa rab tu byang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mya ngan med pa'i nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems

dpas sems can thams cad sred pa shin tu med cing mya ngan med pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /bza' shing gi ra ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su mi gtong ba la shin tu brtson par gyur cig ces

sems bskyed do/ /sems can rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rgyan med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub

sems dpas sems can thams cad sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas rgyan med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /dga' ba mang ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' zhing mos pa dang

spro bas dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mi dga' ba mang ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dus byas kyi dngos po thams cad la mi dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /sems

can bde ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad rab tu thob pas shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems

can thams cad ye shes kyi rtsa ba rab tu thob ste/ sdug bsngal zhi bar byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /nad med pa ma yin pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin du mya ngan med pa'i chos can du gyur te/ tha dad pa med par

khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /sems can sdu gu mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mos pa mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mi

sdug pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bya ba la mos pa chung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /drin gzo ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzad pa shes par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /drin gzo ba med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lta ba la drin du gzo ba med par gyur cig

ces sems bskyed do/ /dge sbyong mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson zhing zhi ba dang dul ba la gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /bram ze mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems

dpas sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dam par gyur te sdig pa spong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /dka' thub can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson zhing dka' thub la shin tu

gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /brtul zhugs la zhugs pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir brtul zhugs dam por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /go

gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad rang 'byung gi chos yongs su btsal ba la go cha bzang po shin tu bgos par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /go ma gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems

dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i las bya ba thams cad la go gyon pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rgol ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par gyur

cig ces sems bskyed do/ /'tsho ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad spyod lam bcos pa cing 'tsho ba dag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rgyal po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams

cad thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rgyal po'i bu mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sras chos las skyes pa'i chos kyi sprul par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /

khyim bdag mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad rnam par gdon mi za ba'i blo can du gyur te/ grong gi chos spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /blon po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos kyi spyod pa

thams cad la bzang po yid la byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /grong khyer mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gdul dka' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ mthu bo che'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rgyal

po'i gnas mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi rjes su 'brang bar 'thun pa la mos pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /nags tshal gyi 'dab mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang

bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bsngags par 'os par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /slong du 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings su chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /sgor phyin pa'i tshe byang chub

sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sgor phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /nang du phyin pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dus gsum du mnyam pa nyid kyi nang du phyin

par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mi sbyin no zhes ma byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob cing phyir spang ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mi sbyin no zhes byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas

sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten las phyir spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lhung bzed stong pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis stongs par

gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lhung bzed gang ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos dkar po thams cad kyis yongs su rgyas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rim gror byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs

rgyas kyi chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la/ rim gror byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rim gror ma byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos mchod pa thams cad la rag ma lus par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /

khrel yod pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dbang po ldan pa'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing khrel yod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ngo tsha med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can

thams cad byams pa la gnas shing / ngo tsha med pa yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /kha zas bsod par thob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing smon lam thams cad phun sum tshogs

par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /kha zas mi bsod pa thob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin nyams su bde ba thams cad thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /kha zas snum bag thob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems

can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sems 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /snum bag med pa'i kha zas thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi sred pa dang bral te snum bag med

pa'i sems su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /kha zas za ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' ba dang rab tu dga' bas yongs su rgyas shing bsam gtan gyi zas za bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ro myong ba'i tshe byang chub sems

dpas sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i ros ngoms par gyur cing / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /zan zos pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos

kyi pha rol tu phyin cing bya ba byas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /chos ston pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing spobs pa mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /

phyir 'byung ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyams su myong ste/ khams gsum thams cad nas byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /chu 'bog pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dus gsum

mnyam pa nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'bogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /khrus byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'od mtha' yas pa dang ldan zhing lus dang sems dri ma med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /

dro ba la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mu med par phyin pa ste yongs su gdung ba bsil bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /bsil ba la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu bsil bar

gyur te/ bla na med pa'i bsil ba'i dngos po khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /chos thob par byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gtam gyi rjes su 'gro zhing chos kyi dbyings dang 'dris par gyur cig ces sems bskyed

do/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob ste bsgribs pa med pa'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mig mi 'gebs par lta ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kun tu

mdzes pas kun tu bzang por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mchod rten mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os shing mchod rten lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lta ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can

thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /spyi bos 'thug pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi spyi gtsug bltar mi snang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byed

pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don dang 'thun par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lan gsum du bskor ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mos pa'i rab dang ldan par gyur cig ces

sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yon tan mi zad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mtshan rnams brjod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems

can thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la gzhol zhing yan lag dam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rkang pa 'khru ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dri ma med pa'i mthar phyin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas pha rol tu phyin par gyur

cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lus myong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsam pa la rnyog pa med cing lus kyi 'du byed shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /gnyid sad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad phyogs

bcu thams cad du mthu chen po thob par gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi las yid la byed

pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang gzhan thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur zhing / lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang skye dgur bcas pa dang / lha

dang dri za dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba rnams so/ /spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste/

bcu drug pa'o// //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po brgyad pa/ /yon tan yangs pa'i spyod yul yongs dag pa/ /de skad smras nas sems can dri med pa/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs

kyis byang chub yon tan rnams/ /sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal la dris/ /spyod yul yongs dag rgyal ba'i spyod pa'i rnams/ /bdag gis rgyal sras rnams la 'dir bshad do/ /yon tan spyod pa ji snyed gang yod pa/ /rgyal sras rnams la da ni

khyod kyis shod/ /bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras nyon/ /yon tan mtha' yas de dag yon tan las/ /mtsho las thigs pa ji bzhin nyung shas shig /mgo smos tsam du cung zad brjod par bya/ /byang chub don du rang byung

'gyur bya zhes/ /thog mar byang chub sems skyes gyur pa yi/ /yon tan brjod pa'ang mtha' yas dpag tu med/ /dpe zla med pas brjod kyang zad mi 'gyur/ /pha rol phyin dang sa yi yon tan la/ /bskal pa bzang por spyad pa ji bzhin smos/ /de dag

yon tan chu bo thams cad ni/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bstan kyang zad mi 'gyur/ /yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan las/ /dpe tsam cha shas cung tsam brjod par bya/ /mkha' las 'dab chags lam ltar shin tu chung / /sa chen lhun las rdul phran

gcig dang 'dra/ /byang chub yon tan bsam pa'i sems skye ba/ /rgyu med ma yin rkyen las 'byung ba yin/ /rgyal ba rnams dang bde gshegs chos rnams dang / /dge 'dun rnams la dad pa bskyed pas skye/ /de yang 'dod pa'i sred pa rgyal srid dang / /bdag

bde'i don dang grags dang snyan phyir / /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus gzhil ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten phan bskyed sems ni yongs su skye/ /de ni sems can rtag tu bde don btang / /zhing sbyangs sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa'i rgyur/ /yongs su

chos 'dzin byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing / /ye shes rnam par sbyong ba'i sems skye'o/ /rgyal ba kun dang chos dang dge 'dun dang / /de bzhin bla mar gyur pa thams cad la/ /dad dang mos dang dga' ba bskyed byas te/ /sri zhur mchod byas byang chub sems kyang

skye/ /rgyal ba bde gshegs chos la yid ches nas/ /rgyal sras spyod pa rnams la yid ches te/ /byang chub bla na med la yid ches shing / /skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi sems skye'o/ /dad pa sngon 'gro ma ltar bskyed pa ste/ /yon tan

thams cad yongs su skye zhing 'dren/ /nem nur rnam sel nad las rab tu sgrol/ /dad pa bde ba'i grong du phyin par byed/ /dad pa sems gsal rnyog pa med pa ste/ /nga rgyal rnam spangs sri zhu'i rtsa ba yin/ /dad pa spyod mchog nor dang gter yin te/ /lag

pa lta bu dge sdud rtsa ba yin/ /yongs su gtong la dad pa dga' bar byed/ /rgyal ba'i chos la dad pa spro ba skyed/ /yon tan ye shes khyad par dad pa byed/ /sangs rgyas lam la ston pa'ang rnyed par byed/ /dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal ba dang / /gzhan gyis

mi thub dngos la dad pa stobs/ /nyon mongs thub pa med la gnas yin te/ /dad pa rang byung yon tan tshol ba yin/ /dad pa chags pa'i sgo dang mi 'grogs te/ /mi khom spong zhing 'du 'dzi med par byed/ /dad pa bdud kyi lam las bzlog pa ste/ /thar lam

dam pa yongs su ston pa yin/ /yon tan rgyu yin sa bon ma rul bzhin/ /dad pa byang chub shing rab rnam par spyod/ /ye shes khyad par sgo rnams 'phel bar byed/ /dad pa rgyal ba rnams kyi ston pa yin/ /de bas dad mos khyad par dga' ba la/ /spyod pa rim

gyis rnam par brjod par bya/ /chos tshul 'di 'dra 'jig rten rnams na dkon/ /rin chen seng ge'i rgyal po ji bzhin no/ /dad pas sangs rgyas sri zhu gang byed pa/ /de dag tshul khrims slob pa mi gtong ngo / /tshul khrims slob pa gang rnams mi gtong ba/ /de

dag yon tan gnas pas yon tan ldan/ /tshul khrims byang chub shes rab ston pa ste/ /bslab pas sa yi yon tan legs la brtson/ /tshul khrims bslab pa yongs su ma btang na/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags par 'os/ /dad pas

sangs rgyas sri zhu gang byed pa/ /de dag rgyal ba'i mchod pa yangs pa byed/ /rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa su byed pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas mos pa bsam mi khyab/ /dad pas chos la phu dud gang byed pa/ /de dag rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms nyan/ /rgyal

ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms su nyan pa/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos la mos/ /dad pas dge 'dun phu dud su byed pa/ /de dag mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la mos/ /mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la su mos pa/ /de dag dad

pa'i stobs kyis phyir mi ldog /dad pa'i stobs kyis gang rnams mi ldog pa/ /de dag dbang po rab tu gsal zhing rno/ /gang rnams dbang po rab tu gsal rno ba/ /des ni sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs/ /gang gis sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pa/ /de

dag chos kyi bshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin/ /chos kyi bshes gnyen gang gis yongs bzung ba/ /de dag dge ba rgya chen yongs su / /dge ba rgya chen yongs su gang pa/ /bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyu mthun ldan/ /bdag nyid che ba rgyu 'thun gang ldan pa/ /de

dag mos pa'i khyad par yangs pa 'thob/ /mos pa yangs pa'i khyad par sus thob pa/ /de dag rtag tu rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs/ /rgyal ba'i byin gyis gang rnams brlabs gyur pa/ /de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye/ /byang chub don du gang gis sems skyes pa/ /de

bzhin drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson/ /drang srong chen po'i yon tan gang brtson pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan skyes/ /sangs rgyas rigs su rigs ldan gang skyes pa/ /de dag 'du dang 'bral ba rnam par spangs/ /'du dang

'bral ba gang gis rnam spangs pa/ /de dag bsam pa dang zhing rnam par dag /gang gis dang zhing bsam pa rnam dag pa/ /de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa'i mchog /lhag bsam dam pa'i mchog dang su ldan pa/ /de dag rtag tu pha rol

phyin la spyod/ /pha rol phyin la rtag tu sus spyod pa/ /de dag theg pa chen po 'di la spyod/ /theg pa chen po 'di la sus spyod pa/ /de dag nan tan dam pas sangs rgyas mchod/ /nan tan dam pas sangs rgyas su mchod pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas

rjes dran phyed pa med/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran gang la mi phyed pa/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong / /rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas sus mthong ba/ /de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mi 'grogs min/ rtag tu sangs rgyas mi 'grogs su ma

yin/ /de la chos ni nub pa nam yang med/ /gang la chos nub 'gyur ba med 'gyur ba/ /de dag spobs pa bsgribs pa med dang ldan/ /spobs pa bsgribs pa med dang su ldan pa/ /de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yang yas/ /gang gi chos rab bstan pa mtha'

yas pa/ /de dag 'gro la byams pas phan pa tshol/ /'gro la byams pas phan pa su tshol ba/ /de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan/ /snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba su brtan pa/ /de dag chos kyi dga' bas dbang po dga'/ /chos kyi dga' bas dbang po

gang dga' ba/ /de dag 'du byed nyes la btang snyoms so/ /'du byed nyes pa gang gis btang snyoms pa/ /de dag nga rgyal rloms sems bag med spangs/ /nga rgyal rloms sems bag med sus spangs pa/ /de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don

brtson/ /bdag dang gzhan don rtag tu su brtson pa/ /de dag 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med/ /gang la 'khor bas yongs su skyo med pa/ /de dag brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang ldan/ /brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa/ /de dag mngon

shes rnam dag mngon par skyes/ /gang gi mngon shes rnam dag mngon skyes pa/ /de dag spyod pa mchog gi dra bar zhugs/ /spyod mchog dra bar gang rnams zhugs gyur pa/ /de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin par mkhas/ /'gro ba yongs su smin par gang mkhas

pa/ /de dag 'gro sdud ye shes tshul la mkhas/ /'gro sdud ye shes tshul la su mkhas pa/ /de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson/ /bsdu dngos bzhi la gang rnams brtson 'grus pa/ /de dag 'gro ba'i don mang mtha' yas byed/ /'gro ba'i don mang

mtha' yas su byed pa/ /de dag shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog ldan/ /shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog su ldan pa/ /dpa' bo de dag bla med lam la gnas/ /bla med lam la dpa' bo gang gnas pa/ /de dag bdud kyi

dpung gis thub pa / /gang rnams bdud kyi dpung gis thub min pa/ /de dag bdud lam bzhi las yongs su 'das/ /bdud lam bzhi las yongs su su 'das pa/ /de dag phyir mi ldog gi sar yang phyin/ /mi ldog sar ni gang gis phyin gyur pa/ /de dag

mi skye'i bzod pa thob pa yin/ /mi skye'i bzod pa gang gis thob gyur pa/ /'jig rten sgron de rgyal bas lung yang bstan/ /'jig rten sgron ma rgyal bas lung bstan pa/ /de dag rgyal ba kun dang mngon du gnas/ /rgyal ba kun dang mngon du su gnas pa/ /de dag

rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul gsang la mkhas/ /rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul gsang la su mkhas pa/ /de dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs pa yin/ /gang rnams rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyis brgyan/ /sangs rgyas yon tan

yongs kyis su brgyan pa/ /de dag bsod nams dam pas lus kyang sbyangs/ /bsod nams dam pas gang gi lus sbyangs pa/ /de dag gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar/ /gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba/ /de dag mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan/ /

mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang su ldan pa/ /de dag dpe byad bzang pos lus kyang bris/ /dpe byad bzang pos gang gi lus bris pa/ /de dag lus 'od kun tu mtha' yas so/ /gang gi lus 'od kun tu mtha' yas pa/ /de dag 'od zer rgyan kyang

bsam mi khyab/ /gang la 'od gzer bsam yas rgyan yod pa/ /de dag 'od las pad+mo mang po 'byung / /gang gi 'od las pad+mo mang 'byung ba/ /de dag rgyal ba pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs te/ /ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu yang / /don yod

rnam par spyod cing sems can 'dul/ /gang rnams rgyal ba pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu yang / /don yod rnam spyod sems can 'dul byed pa/ /de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas/ /gang gi mngon

shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa/ /de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing / /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab dgar byed pas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab zhing ni rnam par spyod/ /gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing / /bsam yas sems can dga'

bar sus byed pa/ /de dag bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten na/ /tha dad yang dag shes mthus sems can 'dul/ /tha dad yang dag shes pa'i ye shes mthus/ /bsam pa ji bzhin sems can su 'dul ba/ /de dag lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su/ /

ye shes sngon du 'gro bar shin tu 'byung / /gang gi lus dang ngag yid rtag dus su/ /ye shes sngon du 'gro bar rab 'byung ba/ /de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci dga' bar/ /sems can rgyud du gzugs mang yongs su ston/ /smon lam stobs kyis

gang rnams ci dga' bar/ /sems can rgyud du gzugs mang ston byed pa/ /de dag tshig tu brjod cing ci smra yang / /sgra la dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam mi khyab/ /tshig tu brjod cing ci dang ci smra yang / /gang gi sgra dbyangs yan lag bsam yas pa/ /

de dag 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi/ /bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam par shes/ /gang gis ma lus 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam shes pa/ /de dag skye dang 'chi 'pho nam yang med/ /nyon mongs rgyu

ba'ang de bzhin skye ba med/ /skye dang 'chi 'pho gang la med gyur cing / /nyon mongs rgyud kyang de bzhin skye med pa/ /de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus/ /chos kyis smos par 'jig rten kun tu spyod/ /yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus ldan zhing / /

chos kyis smos par 'jig rten su spyod pa/ /de dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu yi/ /pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar la spyod/ /gang rnams sa bcu dbang rnams bcu po yi/ /pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar spyod pa/ /

de dag mngon shes rgyan gyis rnam par 'phrul/ /ting 'dzin dam pas rnam par spyod pa thob/ /mngon par shes pa'i rgyan gyis rnam 'phrul zhing / /ting 'dzin mchog gis rnam spyod sus thob pa/ /de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las/ /dbang

bskur rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su nod/ /gang rnams phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las/ /dbang bskur rgyan rnams thams cad nod byed pa/ /de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /phyag mthil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang yang bskur/ /

gang rnams spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /phyag mthil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang bskur ba/ /de dag ma lus nam mkha' rgyas byas shing / /phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brtan gnas pa byed/ /gang rnams nam mkha' ma lus rgyas bkang

zhing / /phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brtan gnas byed pa/ /dpe med de dag spyod yul shes par ni/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas pas mi nus so/ /dpe med gang gis spyod yul shes bya bar/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas pas mi nus pa/ /de dag brtson

'grus thams cad don kyang yod/ /mthong dang ming thos spobs pa'ang don yod do/ /gang rnams brtson 'grus thams cad don yod cing / /mthong dang ming thos spobs pa don yod pa/ /skyes chen de dag sbyin bdag gtong ba yi/ /sbyin pas gnas te

thams cad don kyang yod/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag byin mthu yis/ /dam chos tshul ni mi 'jig brten par gnas/ /dge ba'i las lam dam pa mchog rnams kyang / /rin chen 'dra mthus kun na rgyu shing gnas/ /rdo rje stug po'i rin chen tshogs yod

pas/ /de yi mthu yis rgya mtsho'i rin chen rnams/ /mi zad 'phel zhing 'grib pa gang yang med/ /de bzhin yon tan mtha' yas yon tan mtsho/ /sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing rnams gang yod pa/ /de dag kun tu byang chub sangs rgyas ston/ /

phyogs rnams gang na dam chos med gyur pa/ /de dag kun tu chos kyi gter ston to/ /de dag mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ /lhun gyis grub par phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /zla ba lta bur gzugs brnyan ston byed cing / /thabs mang stong gis sems can

'dul ba byed/ /de dag skad cig re re byang chub tu/ /rnam par sangs rgyas phyogs bcu kun tu ston/ /'khor lo bskor dang mya ngan 'das zhi dang / /sku gdung rgya chen de bzhin dpa' bo ston/ /mkhas pa de bzhin nyan thos rang sangs rgyas/ /sangs

rgyas rnam 'phrul rgyan rnams mtha' yas pa/ /yongs su ston cing bskal pa bsam yas su/ /theg pa gsum gyi sgo nas sems can 'dul/ /khye'u dang bu mo de bzhin bud med lus/ /skyes pa lha dang lha min klu rnams dang / /gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen

po'i gzugs/ /mos pa thams cad tshul mkhas yongs su ston/ /ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i brgya yi sgo dag nas/ /'gro ba'i gzugs mang rgyud ni ji snyed dang / /cha byad spyod pa sgra dbyangs tshul gyi rnams/ /thams cad ma lus dpa' bo ston

pa byed/ /de dag zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad mchod pa byed/ /de dag 'od zer mang po bsam mi khyab/ /sems can 'brel pa'i ye shes mtha' yang yas/ /de dag tshig gi rnam 'phrul ye shes rnam 'phrul
