kyi dbyings kyi sgo thams cad dang ldan pa khong du chud pas/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do/ /de dag de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su sbyong zhing pha rol tu phyin pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi phyogs

mi gtong bar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa rgya chen po'i rgyan dang ldan pa la gnas shing / sems can gyi khams ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du yang dag par sgrol lo/ /de dag dge ba'i las shin tu bstsags pa ston pas/ ngan song du 'gro ba'i sems can

sgrol lo/ /brtsam pa chen po la gzud pas sems can gyi khams mi khom par 'gro ba sgrol lo/ /lhag mthong nye bar bstabs pas gzugs kyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo/ /phra ba'i ye shes nye bar bstabs pas gzugs med pa'i khams su

skyes pa'i sems can rnams sgrol lo/ /zhi ba'i tshul nye bar bstabs pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo/ /stobs bcu'i rgyan chen po dang ldan pa bstabs pas/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can gyi

khams sgrol lo/ /de ltar na sngon las dang po pa'i sa la gnas pa'i tshe/ sems can g.yang sa chen po nas lhung ba rnam pa tha dad par gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes te/ sgo sna tshogs nas gzung bar bya'o/ /zhes seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa de bzhin du ye shes thob

pa rnam sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu la zhugs pa ni rtag tu rgyun mi gcod par sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang chos kyi rigs dang dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/

de dag byang chub kyi sems gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la gzhol bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/ chos kyi mdzod rnam par 'grel pas chos kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/ bstan pa'i tshul dang 'gal bar mi byed pas/ dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa

yin/ smon lam chen po yang dag par brjod pas sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul yang dag par ston pas chos kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/ snying po thob par byed pa'i chos la brtson pas dge 'dun gyi rigs

mi gcod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon sems can gyi zhing la 'debs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas chos kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/ tshogs chen po yongs su sdud pa la mi

skyo bas dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa dran pa'i phyir/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mi gtong bas/ sangs rgyas dang

chos dang dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/ de dag de ltar skyabs gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pas rtsom pa thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa yin te/ brtsams pa gang ci rtsom yang rung / de dag thams cad du thogs pa med par thams cad mkhyen

pa'i sgor 'byung ba thob par byed do/ /de dag de ltar lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsam pa don yod par rtsom pa yin te/ sems can gyi don sbyor ba

don yod par rtsom mo/ /sems can don yod par 'dul bar byed do/ /chos don yod par ston to/ /de'i chos ston pa thams cad kyang sems can gyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba la thogs pa med pas khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /de'i sems bskyed pa gcig

tsam yang log par mi 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa gzhan thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o/ /de de ltar chos dkar po bstsags pa don yod pa de lta bu la gnas pas rgyan rnam par phye ba bcus

sems bskyed pa thams cad yongs su bsngo ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar lus kyi rgyan sems can 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa dang / ngag gi rgyan the tsom thams cad gcod pa dang / sems kyi rgyan skad cig gcig gis ting nge 'dzin rjes su

rtogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'od kyi rgyan 'od zer gyi dra ba mtha' dang dbus med pa bkye bas 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sems can gyi rnam pa tshad med pa'i

tshogs yongs su mgu bar byed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bstan pa'i rgyan mkhas pa'i skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba dang / mya ngan las

'das pa'i rgyan mngon par sangs rgyas pa gcig gis phyogs bcu ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / chos byin gyis brlabs pa'i rgyan yul dang / dus dang snod ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dag ste/ de dag rgyan de lta bus sems bskyed pa

thams cad du mngon par bsgrub pas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las don yod pa dang / ye shes chen po don yod pa rab tu 'thob ste/ de dag mthong bas kyang 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba'i phyir

sems can rnams la don yod pa yin te/ thos pa dang bsnyen bkur ba dang / 'grogs pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / rjes su rab tu byung ba dang / chos ston pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yid rang ba dang / dad cing mos pa dang / chung ngu na

ming brjod pa tsam yang 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smyin pa'i phyir sems can rnams la don du 'gyur ba yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na rtsi'i ming mthong na bde ba zhes bya ba de mthong ma thag tu sems can

rnams kyi lus la zhen pa'am ltor zos pa'i dug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du chos de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/ chos dkar

po'i stobs kyi shugs kyang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nyid de lta bu dang ldan zhing chos de dag la gnas te/ shes rab kyi 'od chen pos ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal nas/

bdud kyi dkrugs ma'i 'khor thams cad byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis pham par byas te/ ye shes dang bsod nams kyi stobs kyi shugs kyis phas kyi rgol ba thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pas/ sems

kyi dri ma thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i phyogs thams cad bsal nas/ skyo ba med pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu bsgrubs te/ sngon cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par spyod pa'i stobs dang

shugs kyis mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog nas/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs te/ rim gyis thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs dang / shugs

kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrubs nas/ chos dkar po thams cad kyi stobs dang shugs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrub pa rab tu rgyas par byas te/ ye shes kyis shes par bya ba'i dbang dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du 'thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul yang smon lam gyi khyad par ji lta ba bzhin du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi byin

gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bstan te/ 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor cing / mtha' yas

pa'i sems can rnam par 'dul lo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i chos de lta bu dang ldan pa dag ni tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thob nas kyang / 'jig rten gyi

khams mtha' yas pa dag tu dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing / chos smra ba chen po yang byed do/ /de ltar chos smra ba byed pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa de dag chos kyi mdzod chen po

gzung zhing bsrung ba'i phyir/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu dbye ba'i rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas par bdag gi lus kyi rgyan byin gyis brlabs te bstan pa mngon par bsgrubs pas

rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i mkhas pa mtha' yas pa dang / ye shes mi zad pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / dbyangs gcig bsgrags pas

'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / shes pa'i sa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang / lus kyi byin gyi rlabs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nang du phyin

kyang zil gyis mi non pa dang / lus kyi rgyan sgo thams cad du rnam par bstan pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sems dang / bsam pa khong du chud pas rab tu rtogs pa dang / tshig grol ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan pa dang chos 'chad

pa'i byin gyi rlabs la/ mkhas pas chos kyi gtam chen po byed de/ stobs dang shugs kyi dbang thub pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i dbang zhum pa med pa dang / chos kyi dbang zil gyis mi non pa dang / ye shes kyi dbang

gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang chos kyi mtshan nyid 'khrugs pa med pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i dbang mtshams sbyor ba rgyun chad pa med par bsam pa shin tu rtogs pa dang / gzungs kyi dbang chos thams cad rnam par

gdon za ba la 'jug pa dang / smon lam gyi dbang dpe sna tshogs kyis bstan pa'i tshul nye bar bsgrub pa shin tu bstan pa dang / snying rje chen po'i dbang phyir mi ldog cing rgyun ma chad pa dang / byams pa chen po'i dbang sngon shin tu bskyed pas bsam pa thams cad tshim

par byed cing / 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po gtong bas chos kyi gtam chen po byed do/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing chos kyi gtam gsung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang smon lam gyi khyad par dang ldan pa ma gtogs

par sems can gyi ris na/ byang chub sems dpa' de la phyir brgal ba'am/ spyi gtsug blta ba'am/ zil gyis gnan pa'am/ dri ba'i tshogs yongs su dri bas thub par bya bar nus pa'i sems can gang yang med de/ de ni gnas med do/ /kye rgyal ba'i

sras gal te byang chub sems dpa' dbang de lta bu thob pa la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa tsam du yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gcig yod la 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de yang sems can stong gsum gyi bdag po'i gzi brjid thob pa sha stag gis gang ba zhig yin

na yang / de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'ongs ma thag tu lus bstan pa'i dbang gis zil gyis mnan te/ byams pa chen po'i dbang gis lus kyi gzhi tshim par byas nas ye shes chen po'i dbang gis sems dang bsam pa rnam

par shes par byas te/ mi 'jigs pa'i bsam pa chen pos chos ston par byed cing / spobs pa chen po'i dbang gis sems can tshim par byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med

pa dang ldan/ chos rnam par 'byed pa shin tu rnam par phye ba la mkhas pa dang ldan/ dran pa'i stobs dang shugs ma nyams shing rgya che ba dang ldan/ chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par gdon mi za bar bzung zhing blangs pas rtogs par mkhas pa dang ldan/

byang chub sems dpa'i mkhas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang ldan/ chos kyi mtshan nyid bsgribs pa med pa'i chos ston pa la mkhas pa dang ldan/ mos pa la mkhas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis blangs pa dang ldan/ dus gsum gyi

de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyi byin gyi brlab la mkhas pa dang ldan/ sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams dang / rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i

bsam pa bzang po rnam par dag pa la mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ chos smra ba chen po byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod kyang rnam par 'byed do/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

kyi ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi smon lam dang / ye shes 'byam klas pas dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis yang

dag par 'byung ba'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bsod nams tshogs bstsags byang chub sems la gnas pa rnams/ /rtag tu bag

yod blo brtan mthu chen bdog pa dag /dran dang ldan zhing byang chub sems rab mi gtong bas/ /phyogs rnams bcu por bde gshegs rnams ni mnyes par byed/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pa dran ldan mos pa brtan pa can/ /

'jig rten kun la rtag tu mi gnas mi ldog pa/ /zab pa'i chos zhugs mya ngan med pa'i tshul mkhas rnams/ /phyogs rnams bcu por bde gshegs rnams ni mnyes par byed/ /brtson 'grus brtan pas bde gshegs mnyes par byas nas kyang / /dus

gsum bsod nams tshogs dang ye shes ldan pa rnams/ /sa rnams gnon byed spyod mchog nyams pa med par byed/ /thub pa'i smon lam rdzogs byed ston pa'ang de bzhin byed/ /ye shes gcig la zhugs pa de dag thob bya ba/ /thob nas 'gro ba kun

la sbyin pa rab tu gtong / /bsam pa dag dang khams dang sbyor ba shes byas nas/ /dbang po ji bzhin mkhas pa de ltar chos kyang ston/ /pha rol phyin la brtson pa mthu chen ldan pa rnams/ /'gro ba rnams la chos ston bdag gi don mi gtong / /

pha rol phyin rdzogs grol ba mthu chen ldan pa rnams/ /khyu mchog mthu yis 'khor ba'i mtsho las sems can sgrol/ /de ltar nyin mtshan skyo ba med par brtson byed cing / /drang srong rgyal ba chos rigs mi gcod zhugs pa yis/ /dkar po'i spyod pa

gang yang rung ste spangs pa rnams/ /thams cad don yod rgyal ba rnams kyi sar 'gro'o/ /de dag ji spyod thams cad 'gro ba rnams la yang / /rnam smin don yod nyon mongs dri ma sbyong bar 'gyur/ /'di 'dra'i chos ldan de dag mun pa bsal byas

shing / /bdud 'khrugs 'khor lo pham byas byang chub thob par byed/ /de ltar brtson zhing ye shes thob pa'i bde gshegs sras/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi chos rab mdzod kyang rab tu ston/ /de dag chos smra'i bya ba kun kyang shin tu byed/ /bdud rtsi mchog

zhim sprin gyi char yang mngon par 'bebs/ /de dag snying rje byams pas 'gro ba kun bkang zhing / /brtan pa de rnams 'khor gyi bsam pa shes byas nas/ /gang gi bsam pa blo gros sems rgyud ci 'dra ba/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos ni stong phrag du ma ston/ /

glang po'i stabs sdug tshul bzang 'gros su 'gro ba rnams/ /seng ge'i rtsal ltar rtag tu sus kyang mi thub cing / /ye shes rgya mtsho lta bu ri rab bzhin gnas pa/ /sprin ltar 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs zhi bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis de skad

ces smras pa dang / de la ston pas rjes su dgyes par mdzad do/ /chos snang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams thams cad dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar thams cad na/ gling bzhi pa 'di la pa gling bzhi pa re re na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bzhugs par

snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston to/ /bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston to/ /bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod par shes

so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa ma bshig ma btang bar byang chub kyi shing drung yang ma spangs par ri rab kyi rtse mo nas/ mtshe ma'i gnas kyi lha'i bu rab mtshe ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs gang na ba der gshegs par snang ngo / /

ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das rab mtshe ma'i gnas su gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / rab mtshe ma'i gnas su gshegs par snang ste/ byin gyis brlabs snga ma rnams kyang de bzhin ma 'khrugs par snang ngo / /

de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas khang pa nor bu sna tshogs logs su mngon par gshegs pa mthong nas/ rings pa'i gzugs su khang pa nor bu sna tshogs kyi nang du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i

gdan rdzu 'phrul gyis bsgrubs pa'i seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che las byas pa pog re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas mngon par bres pa/ me tog gi bla re brgya stong

phrag bcus kun tu khyab par byas pa/ phreng ba'i bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu brgyus pa/ spos kyi bla re brgya stong phrag bcus spos thams cad kun tu 'thul bar bdugs pa/ rin po che'i bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu bres pa/ me tog gi gdugs

brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bzung ba/ phreng ba'i gdugs brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bzung ba/ rin po che'i gdugs brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bzung ba/ 'od zer brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas snang bar byas pa/ rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po

brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu gdud pa/ tshangs pa brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par phyag bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bstod pa/ rol mo brdung ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sgra phyung ba/ chos kyi glu'i dbyangs brgya stong phrag bcu'i glu'i dbyangs dang ldan

pa/ me tog gi sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa/ phreng ba'i sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa/ rgyan gyi sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa/ gos kyi sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pas kun nas g.yogs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i sprin brgya stong

phrag bcu'i char rab tu phab pas kun tu snang bar byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas byung ba/ sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag bcus byin gyis brlabs pa/ bsod nams brgya stong phrag bcus bstsags shing bsgrubs pa/ lhag pa'i

bsam pa brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu sbyangs pa/ smon lam brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par dag par byas pa/ spyod pa brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bslang ba/ chos brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu brtan pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa brgya stong phrag bcu dang ldan pa/ yon tan

brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'phags pa/ brjod pa brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu brjod pa bshams so/ /ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir rab mtshe ma'i gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bting ba/ de bzhin du 'jig

rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag gi /rab mtshe ma'i gnas su yang / khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan rgyan 'di 'dra ba dang / bsham pa'i tshul 'di 'dra ba dag kyang bting bar gyur to/ /

de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bting nas/ zhe sa dang rim gror bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs su

gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po rab mtshems spyan drangs pa bzhin du khang pa nor bu sna tshogs

su gshegs so/ /ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di rab mtshe ma'i gnas su lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su gshegs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang rab mtshe ma'i gnas su khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su gshegs par snang ngo / /

de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i lha'i dbang po'i gnas thams cad du sgra bsgrags te/ lha'i rgyal po rab mtshems bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab bo/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshems sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa de rjes su dran nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas grags pa'i

dam par mtshan btags mtshan gsol pa/ /nor bu'i gtsug tu gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten sgron ma blo zhes mtshan btags pa/ /sbyangs pa'i lam du gshegs

pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /bsgribs med gzigs pa 'dzum pa'i spyan du mtshan btags pa/ /rgyan gcig ldan par gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur

cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten sgron ma mar me mdzad ces mtshan btags pa/ /rnam par rgyal bar gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /bde

gshegs yang dag don gzigs pa zhes mtshan btags pa/ /dri med rtse mor gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rang 'byung mchog ces mtshan btags pa/ /

rin chen spos su gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten sgron ma dbyig gi lha zhes mtshan btags pa/ /dri sna tshogs gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang

bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /'gro ba med pa smra ba'i stag ces mtshan btags pa/ /thams cad tshul du gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang

zhig gis/ /yon tan kun mnga' dpal gyis rgyal bar mtshan btags pa/ /dga' ba'i rgyan du gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten phan brtson dka' thub drag po mtshan

btags pa/ /kun nas mdog du gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /ji ltar lha'i rgyal po rab mtshems sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ sngon gyi rgyal ba gshegs pa brjod de mngon par bstod pa de bzhin

du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyal po rab mtshe ma rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gshegs pa brjod cing / glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod do/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su gshegs nas gdan bting ba la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang gdan gting ba de dag la bzhugs

par snang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ma thag tu khang pa nor bu sna tshogs de 'di lta ste/ dper na rab mtshe ma'i lha'i ris thams cad tsam du che bar gyur pa snang ste/ 'di na ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang de bzhin no/ /

rab mtshe ma'i gnas na rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu bzhi pa// /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang

'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di

zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar yon tan dang ldan pa dang / blo gros dang ldan pa dang / dpal dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / khrel dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / rig pa dang

ldan pa dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / ye shes dang ldan pa dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa ste/ 'di ltar gnyen dang ldan pa dang / me tog dang ldan pa dang / nor dang ldan pa dang / dpal dang ldan

pa dang / sgron ma dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang ldan pa dang / nyi ma dang ldan pa dang / dge ba dang ldan pa dang / tshangs pa dang ldan pa dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi

zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar nyams pa med pa'i spyan dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i spyan dang / mi g.yo ba'i spyan dang / mi skyod pa'i spyan dang / chu'i spyan dang / bcings pa med pa'i spyan dang / kun tu spyod pa'i spyan dang / 'od kyi spyan

dang / dam pa'i spyan dang / mthon thing gi spyan dag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu rgyas par byas te/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brtan nas seng ge'i khri rin po che'i

snying po can dag bshams te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do/ /ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir rab mtshe ma'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa' 'ongs par gyur pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa kun tu yang rab mtshe ma'i gnas kyi khang pa

nor bu sna tshogs su yang lhags par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang de skad ces bya ba sha stag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan kyang de skad ces bya ba'i zham ring na/ tshangs par spyod pa sha stag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs

kyi bol gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba brgya stong bkye ste/ phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bstan te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa kun gyi rab mtshe ma'i gnas

thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yod pa mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas

'od zer 'od snang bas/ /phyogs rnams thams cad rnam par snang / /des ni rab tu gsal byas pas/ /mig la rab rib gang yang med/ /mtshe ma rab kyi gnas 'di na/ /gang zag dam pa sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /de bzhin kun na'ang gsal bar snang / /

de ni 'jig rten ngo mtshar to/ /sems can gtso bo bcu yi rnams/ /gshegs par gyur pa mngon par ston/ /de dag 'khor kyang ci 'dra ba/ /de bzhin kun na rab tu snang / /phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad na/ /chos kyi dam pa rab tu ston/ /de kun ming yang 'di bzhin te/ /bdag cag

rnams kyi kun rdzob bzhin/ /'jig rten khams kyi ming dag kyang / /de zhes bya ba kun nas 'ongs/ /gang zag dam pa de dag ni/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa de na spyod/ /bdag cag rnams la gang brtags pa/ /kun gyi ming yang de dang mthun/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams

phun ldan pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ba'o/ /mi yi 'jig rten kun na yang / /'di na rgyal ba bzhugs par shes/ /gzhan gyis de yi rgyal po yi/ /gnas na de bzhin bzhugs pa mthong / /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na/ /gang zag

dam pa de bzhugs kyang / /rgyal ba mtshe ma rab gnas na/ /bzhugs par bdag cag kun kyang sems/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na/ /sangs rgyas gzi brjid bsam mi khyab/ /de dag smon lam bskul ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten khams su rab tu
bkye/ /sems can gtso bo'i rnam 'phrul pa/ /'di dag de rnams kun gyis mthong / /sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/ /'jig rten zang zing thub pas spangs/ /phyogs rnams thams cad kun tu rgyu/ /chags

pa med pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /de ni gcig las shin tu 'das/ /mang po dag tu'ang mi dmigs so/ /mtha' yas legs mnga' sangs rgyas rnams/ /de dag shes par ji ltar rung / /gnas pa med cing len pa med/ /chos dbyings rtogs par

thugs su chud/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dang ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'jig rten mgon po 'phrul chen rnams/ /rdul med gang zag dam

pa dag /'dus shing tshogs pa bsam yas pa'i/ /bskal pa dag tu shin tu dkon/ /de dag thams cad kun gzigs pa/ /sems can gtso bo 'od mdzad de/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /'jig

rten mun nag 'di dag tu/ /'jig rten mgon po byung gyur pa/ /'jig rten sgron ma de dag ni/ /blta bar shin tu dka' ba yin/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa'i dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan bsgoms pa dang / /shes rab sngon chad spyad pas

na/ /'gro ba thams cad snang ba mdzad/ /sangs rgyas 'dra ba gang yang med/ /de phyir de yi mnyam pa med/ /chos rnams yod pa ma yin pas/ /skyes bu dam pa mthong ba med/ /sangs rgyas shes rab chen po rnams/ /mtshan gyi tshogs ni bsam

mi khyab/ /sku yi tshogs kyis shin tu 'phags/ /chos rnams kun gyis yang dag byung / /'jig rten grags chen dam pa'i rnams/ /dpa' bo chen po de dag snang / /de dag mtshan tsam thos pas kyang / /ngan song thams cad spangs par 'gyur/ /

bskal pa rnams ni brjod med par/ /byang chub don du 'khor byas kyang / /'di yi tshul ni ma shes na/ /byang chub don du zhugs pa / /sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /bskal pa bye bar bkur ba dang / /gang gis tshul 'di bsam pa gnyis/ /

'di ni de las khyad du 'phags/ /gang gis brjod byas zhing gi rnams/ /rin chen gang ste thub gsol kyang / /'di yi tshul ni ma shes na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub de la ring / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin

gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /nam mkha' dri ma med pa la/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa/ /dpyid kyi zla ba tha ma la/ /phyogs bcu dag tu rab tu snang / /de tshe smyig rgyu ci

'dra ba/ /de dag bgrang bar mi nus te/ /mig can rnams kyang de la rmongs/ /long ba rnams kyi spyod yul min/ /de bzhin sems can gtso bo yis/ /yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /bskal pa bsam gyis khyab par/ /sus kyang shes par mi nus

so/ /de dag gang nas blangs pa med/ /de bzhin sus kyang byas pa med/ /de ni ci las skyes pa med/ /rnam par bsgoms na yod pa / /'ong ba med pa'i chos rnams la/ /'gro ba de bzhin te/ /de phyir de dag rgyu yang / /de bzhin 'jig pa'ang yod

pa / /'jig pa pa'i chos rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin gang gis shes pas ni/ /gang la skye ba med pa yi/ /yang dag sangs rgyas mthong ba yin/ /skyes pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin dngos po mi dmigs te/ /de 'dra'i don du

shes pas ni/ /dmigs pa med pa shes pa yin/ /'di la shes byed gang yang med/ /chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med/ /chos nyid 'di ni shes gyur la/ /yongs su shes pa gang yang med/ /skye ba dag ni brjod pa ste/ /de phyir zhing rnams

rab tu brjod/ /zhing gi rang bzhin shes gyur pa/ /'khrug pa med pa rab tu shes/ /gang tshe 'jig rten zhing yin par/ /tshul bzhin du ni rtogs byed na/ /de tshe thams cad don bstan pa/ /byang chub sems dpas rab tu

shes/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gnas 'di shin tu rgya che ste/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa yin/ /rtag tu

kun tu song ba ste/ /yid du 'ong zhing gnas kyang med/ /de la yang dag brtags byas shing / /rim gro yod par dad byed na/ /sdug bsngal nam yang mi mthong ste/ /ngan song rnams kyang mi mthong ngo / /tshad med de bzhin grangs med pa'i/ /'jig rten

khams su su 'gro bas/ /gang rnams 'di na snang ba yis/ /sangs rgyas byin rlabs thos par 'gyur/ /drang srong chen po'i byin gyi rlabs/ /gang gis thos par gyur nas kyang / /'di 'dra sangs rgyas chos so zhes/ /rtog med bla med byang chub

bo/ /gang rnams 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos nyid la ni yid ches pa/ /de kun 'jig rten sgron ma ste/ /rkang gnyis ldan pa'i dam par gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa 'di/ /la la zhig gis thos gyur cing / /thos nas dad par

byed gyur na/ /de dag mi yi dam par 'gyur/ /brtan pa gang rnams da ltar yang / /sangs rgyas chos la dad byed pa/ /de dag don gzigs mi 'jigs pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par/ /'di 'dra

thos pa shin tu dkon/ /smon lam dbang ni ma gtogs par/ /blo gros 'di 'drar 'gyur ba / /sangs rgyas dam chos 'di las kyang / /legs par bshad pa gzung byas shing / /gzhan la ston pa su byed pa/ /de dag bsam gyis khyab 'gyur/ /de la

brtson 'grus bskyed byas shing / /yid la go ca bgo byas te/ /gang las sangs rgyas brjod pa yi/ /shes pa 'di 'dra mnyan par bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' khrel dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/

de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang zhig thos nas 'di 'dra ba'i/ /dga' ba yangs pa skye ba dang / /the tsom rnam par gcad pa ni/ /'jig rten na ni ngo mtshar che/ /'di ltar thams cad gzigs pa'i rnams/ /nyid kyis 'gro la bka' stsal na/ /sangs

rgyas mi mkhyen gang yang med/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /mi shes pa yi rgyu las ni/ /ye shes 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ /mun pa'i mthu dang snang ba gnyis/ /lhan cig 'byung bar mi 'gyur bstan/ /ji ltar gzugs dang gzugs med pa/ /

bskal pa mnyam pa med par bshad/ /de ltar shes dang mi shes pa/ /'grogs par shin tu mi 'gyur ro/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dag /ji ltar med las brtags pa ltar/ /de bzhin shes dang mi shes pa/ /mtshan nyid bzhin du dmigs pa med/ /

ji ltar 'jig rten 'jig pa dang / /'du bar 'gyur ba ring ba ste/ /phan tshun 'grogs par mi 'gyur ba/ /shes dang mi shes de bzhin no/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /thog ma'i sems dang tha ma'i sems/ /lhan cig gnas 'byung ba ltar/ /

shes dang mi shes de bzhin no/ /ji ltar lus dang rnam shes pa/ /gzhan dang gzhan las 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin shes dang mi shes gnyis/ /'grogs par 'gyur ba nam yang med/ /ji ltar dug la phan pa'i rtsi/ /'phral du dug ni dug byed/ /de ltar

shes pa mi shes pas/ /shin tu sol ba byed pa brjod/ /sangs rgyas bla na gang yang med/ de dang 'dra ba'ang yod pa min/ /de las gzhan du 'gyur ba med/ /de bas rgyal ba shin tu dkon/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/

sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /chos rnams 'di dag 'gal par/ /mkhyen nas sangs rgyas thugs su chud/ /des ni mi mkhyen gang yang / /ye shes kyi yang

pha rol phyin/ /ji ltar gser dang sa le sbram/ /ngo bo nyid kyis 'gal ba med/ /de ltar chos min de bzhin chos/ /de dag thams cad mtshan nyid gcig /sems can sems can ma yin pa/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/ /gdags su med las

'byung ba ltar/ /chos rnams rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /ma 'ongs dus ni ji lta bur/ /'das pas brjod par bya ba ste/ /de la mtshan nyid yod pa min/ /de bzhin chos la mtshan nyid med/ /'brel bar skye dang 'gog pa dang / /rang bzhin med dang rang bzhin dag /

rnam pa tha dad gyur pa ltar/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin de bzhin no/ /mya ngan 'das pa gzung pa/ /gnyis kyi dus na brjod par byas/ /de la bye brag gang yang med/ /de bzhin gzugs la rnam rtog pa'o/ /ji ltar ci zhig bgrang byas shing / /bgrang bar

byed ces brjod pa yang / /de la tha dad gang yang med/ /de bzhin gzugs kyi rang bzhin no/ /ji ltar gcig nas gcig gi blar/ /mang po'i tshul du bgrang ba yis/ /dngos po grangs med 'gyur ba yang / /blo yi rnam pa tha dad bstan/ /'jig rten

khams rnams la la dag /bsam gyis mi khyab tshig gyur kyang / /nam mkha' 'jig par 'gyur ba med/ /rang 'byung ye shes de bzhin no/ /ji ltar 'jig rten phyogs bcu yi/ /nam mkha' so sor brtags pa ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams

mthong ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams la rtog mi mnga'/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /ji ltar dus rnams gsum po yis/ /sems can

khams rnams brjod par 'gyur/ /sems can de dag thams cad kyang / /phung po lnga las shin tu brjod/ /de rnams las kyi phung chen yin/ /las kyi rtsa ba'ang sems yin te/ /sems ni sgyu ma bzhin du bshad/ /sgyu mar gyur pa'i 'gro 'di'o/ /gang

na 'jig rten 'di 'byung zhing / /yang na ldog par 'gyur ba yin/ /'jig rten 'jig rten byed de/ /gzhan gyi rgyus kyang byas pa / /'jig rten 'di ni 'byung ba 'byung / /'jig rten 'dir yang ldog par 'gyur/ /'byung zhes brjod par mi bya ste/ /

de ni 'jig rten shes pa yin/ /gang la 'jig rten snang ba zhes/ /'du shes rnam par brtags pa yi/ /'jig rten zhes bya gang zhig yin/ /snang ba zhes bya 'ang ci zhig yin/ /dus gsum dag tu rgyu ba yi/ /phung po 'di ni 'jig rten yin/ /de dag 'gog

pa snang ba zhes/ /'gro ba dag tu 'du shes 'gyur/ /phung po zhes bya 'di ni ci/ /phung po'i rang bzhin ji lta bu/ /phung po rnams ni mi 'jig phyir/ /dngos po med ces rab tu brjod/ /phung po 'di dag rnam brtags don/ /de dag rang bzhin stong pa yin/ /mi

'jig don ni stong pa ste/ /dngos po med ces bya ba'o/ /'jig rten ci bzhin sangs rgyas te/ /sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas rnams/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/ /ma nor yang dag ji bzhin pa'i/ /chos nyid 'di

ni rtogs gyur nas/ /kun gzigs thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /sangs rgyas kun na rab tu snang / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rig pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /rang bzhin

dngos po med pa yis/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi/ /sa yi khams rnams ci bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ngo mtshar che/ /de yi rang bzhin 'di yin la/ /brjod cing bsngags pa mtha' yas te/ /'das pa'i 'jig rten khams

rnams su/ /sus kyang brjod pa ma yin na/ /gzhan du sems can las kyis na/ /shin tu bstan par brjod pa ste/ /sems can rnams ni ma gtogs par/ /las shes bya ba ci mi dmigs/ /de bzhin stong pa'i las kyis kyang / /brjod

pa rnams ni tshad med par/ /sems can kun gyi las su 'gyur/ /de la ma 'ongs gang yang med/ /ji ltar kha dog dbyibs kyi rnams/ /las kyi rgyud ni bsam mi khyab/ /snang yang de dag de na med/ /rnam par rig pa'i dngos nyid 'dra/ /de bzhin sems

can gtso bo yi/ /sku ni bsam gyis khyab pa/ /brjod pa rnams kyang tshad med par/ /zhing rnams kun na rab tu snang / /sku ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas min/ /sangs rgyas rnams la sku mi mnga'/ /dpa' bo chen po chos sku ste/ /chos kun rtogs par

thugs su chud/ /gang gis rang byung rnams kyi sku/ /yang dag ci bzhin mthong ba ni/ /sangs rgyas chos ni rnam kun dang / /chos rnams la yang rmongs pa med/ /'das par gyur pa'i chos rnams kun/ /mya ngan 'das par shes gyur na/ /de dag

shin tu mi gnas pa'i/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba yin/ /yang dag sangs rgyas sus mthong zhing / /dran pa shin tu bsgoms byas te/ /mtshan med tha dad med pa rnams/ /de dag chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo dang ldan

pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar ri mo'i las rnams la/ /tshon rnams sna tshogs kun 'du ba/ /kun kyang 'byung ba chen por mnyam/ /sems kyis yongs su brtags

pa yin/ /khams la tshon rtsi de dag / /tshon rtsi la yang khams med de/ /khams rnams ma gtogs gzhan na yang / /tshon zhes bya ba gang yang med/ /sems la ri mo de med do/ /ri mo la yang sems med de/ /sems de ma gtogs

gzhan du yang / /ri mo gang yang mi dmigs so/ /sems de rtag pa ma yin pa/ /bsam gyis khyab tshad med cing / /phan tshun shes pa pa yi/ /gzugs rnams thams cad ston par byed/ /ji ltar ri mo mkhan gyi rnams/ /sems ni

gang gis ri mo de/ /bris pa'i sems kyang mi shes pa/ /de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin no/ /sems ni ri mo mkhan dang 'dra/ /sems ni phung po byed pa ste/ /'jig rten khams na ji snyed pa'i/ /'jig rten 'di dag sems kyis bris/ /sems dang

'dra ba sangs rgyas te/ /sangs rgyas ji bzhin 'gro ba'o/ /sems dang sangs rgyas dag la yang / /ngo bo nyid kyis zad pa med/ /sems kyi rgyud rnams ci 'dra ba/ /de dag sangs rgyas rab tu mkhyen/ /de phyir sangs rgyas rang bzhin gyis/ /'gro ba

sna tshogs gyur par snang / /lus kyi rnams la sems med de/ /sems la'ang lus rnams yod pa / /sangs rgyas mdzad pa'ang rab tu byed/ /de ltar spyod pa ngo mtshar che/ /gang zhig dus gsum thams cad kyi/ /rgyal ba thams cad shes 'dod

na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sems kyi dngos/ /chos kyi dbyings su blta bar gyis/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ /gzung du med

la 'dzin ces bya/ /snang ba med la snang ba ste/ /mnyan du med pa mnyan par byed/ /sems med pa yi sems dang ldan/ /tshad med pa la tshad ma yin/ /gang zhig 'dzin par mi 'dod pa/ /de ni tshad med tshad ma yin/ /nam yang 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/ /

brjod du med pa smra byed pa/ /bdag la shin tu bslu ba ste/ /de yi don kyang brjod mi byed/ /srog chags rnams kyang tshim mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin mtha' yas brjod ldan pa'i/ /brjod pa gang zhig smra 'dod pa/ /bskal pa grangs med zad byas kyang / /rang

'byung rnams kyis brjod mi zad/ /yid bzhin nor bu dag pa ni/ /kha dog kun tu rab tu snang / /de la kha dog yod pa / /sangs rgyas yon tan de bzhin no/ /ji ltar nam mkha' dri med cing / /gzugs med bstan du med yin yang / /gzugs

rnams thams cad ston par byed/ /nam mkha' snang ba gang yang med/ /de bzhin thams cad gzigs pa rnams/ /yon tan kun dang ldan ston kyang / /de ni sus kyang mthong ba med/ /sems la'ang de ni mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas sgra ni grag mod kyi/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa sgra ma yin/ /sgra ni ma gtogs gzhan du yang / /sangs rgyas shes par mi rung ngo / /ji ltar bdag gi mthong tshul du/ /'di ni shes bya'i gnas ma yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub blang du med/ /de la rnam par rtog pa med/ /sangs

rgyas chos rnams gang dag kyang / /su la'ang sangs rgyas gsung pa / /sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/ /de la de 'dra ston pa mdzad/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ rab mtshe ma'i gnas su byang chub sems

dpa' 'dus pas/ tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu lnga pa// //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po nyi shu lnga pa// /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' yon

tan dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag par gyur to/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin

rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu re rer yang / 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yon tan dang

ldan pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis zhal bstan pa mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yon tan dang ldan pa de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu rnam par

phye ba'i rnam par 'byed pa la mnyam par bzhag pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod la ni de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyang mtshan mthun pa sha stag gis/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu brtan pas na 'di ltar chos bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi

khams la 'jug par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams rnam par bsgom pa dang / chags pa med pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul dang / kun nas rab tu sbyor ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa rab tu bsgrub pa dang / chos thams cad

khong du chud par bya ba dang / dbang po thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / chos bstan pa thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu brtsam pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byin gyis brlab pa mdzad kyis/

rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ chos bstan pa la spobs par gyis shig /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pa la chags pa med pa nyid nye bar

bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /bsgrubs pa med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /byin gyis brlab pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /slob dpon med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /rmongs pa med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /tha dad pa med pa nyid nye

bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /tshad med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /zil gyis mi non pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /zhum pa med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pa'i mgo la byug pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag

gis de ltar reg ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa'i las ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings

kyis klas so/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod pa la yang slob po/ /ma byon

pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod pa la yang slob po/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod pa la yang slob po/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa gang la bsams te/ de skad du smras pa de dag gang

zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba ste/ bcu gang zhe

na 'di lta ste dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po dang / bde ba skyed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gnyis pa dang / mi mthun pa med pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsum pa dang / mi zad pa zhes bya ba byang chub

sems dpa'i spyod pa bzhi pa dang / rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lnga pa dang / lta ba bzang po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa drug pa dang / gnas med pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bdun pa dang / thub par dka' ba

zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brgyad pa dang / chos bzang po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dgu pa dang / bden pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub

sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po

dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi spyod pa'i rjes su slob cing rjes su dran par bya ba dang / yid zhum pa med pa dang / yid

dang bas kun tu 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / rjes su rgya che bar byed cing / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can bde bar bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /

'gyod pa med pa'i sems kyi sbyor ba dang / rnam par smyin pa la ye brngam pa med pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa med pa dang / gnyan 'dod pa med pa dang / khe 'dod pa med pa dang / gzhan rjes su bsrung ba dang / pha rol la phan gdags pa dang / sems

can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i sems kyis/ sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin pa byed pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po'o/ /spyod pa de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong ba yin te

de ni sems can dbul po gang dang gang na yod pa de dang der smon lam gyi dbang gis rab tu skyes te/ skyes nas kyang zad mi shes pa'i longs spyod dang ldan zhing shin tu phyug pa yin te/ de la gal te dus gcig du/ slong ba'i srog chags bye ba

khrag khrig brgya stong grangs pa zhig 'ongs te/ 'di skad du kye shes par gyis shig /bdag cag thams cad ni bkres pas 'chi'o/ /gal te bdag cag khyod kyi sha zos na ni 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes tshig tu smra bar gyur kyang / byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa phun

sum tshogs pa rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan te/ slong ba'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa de snyed cig nye bar lhags kyang / byang chub sems dpa' la de'i phyir sems bskyed pa gcig kyang zhum pa'i bsam pa mi 'gyur gyi/ sems can de dag

thams cad la snying rje chen po rab tu skye ste/ gzhan mang po zhig 'ongs kyang de bas ches dga' ba dang / spro ba 'byung zhing 'di ltar bdag gis gsol ba ma btab par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par stobs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdug bsngal zhing slong

ba sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa 'di lta bu dag dang 'grogs par gyur pa ni/ bdag gis thob pa legs par thob ste/ ji nas kyang sems can 'ga'i yid kyang mi nyams par bya ba de ltar bdag gis bya'o/ /bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba ci byas pa dang / ci byed pa dang /

ci byed par 'gyur ba des ji tsam gyis sems can de dag thams cad 'grangs shing dus byed par 'gyur ba de tsam du che ba'i lus su gyur cig /sems can de dag 'grangs shing tshim par ma gyur gyi bar du gcad cing skye bas mi zad pa de tsam gyi lus su gyur

cig /dge ba'i rtsa ba des kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bsgrubs te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams su mya ngan las 'das par bya'o/ /rnam grangs 'di bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams thams cad kyi sems can de dag thams cad las 'di 'dra ba dang ldan par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi sha zos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bsgrubs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ye

shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas nas/ phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig /bdag nyid kyang sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par ma byas kyi bar du/ bdag du 'du shes pa'am/

sems can du 'du shes pa'am/ srid par 'du shes pa'am/ srog tu 'du shes pa'am/ so so'i skye bor 'du shes pa'am/ gang zag du 'du shes pa'am/ shed can du 'du shes pa'am/ shed bdag du 'du shes pa'am/ byed pa por 'du shes pa'am/

tshor ba por 'du shes pas/ gzhan du chos kyi dbyings nye bar bzung ba dang / sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang / stong pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang /

mtshan nyid med pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang / gnas med pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang / gzhi med pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ba ma

gtogs par mngon par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig ces te/ de ni bdag kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / bdag gis lus kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / len to zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / len pa yang yang dag par rjes su

mi mthong / sbyin pa'i gnas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ni las kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam par smin pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'bras bu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'bras bu chen po'ang yang dag par rjes su

mi mthong / 'bras bu chung ngu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de 'das pa'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyi lus zhig par yid la byed do/ /ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi lus 'jig par yid la byed do/ /

de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma sems can 'di dag rang gi lus grangs med pa zhig ni 'gags te/ 'gag cing 'gag par 'gyur yang / snying po med pa'i lus las snying po mi len pa ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /de lta yin gyis bdag gis sems can thams cad

bde bas rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mngon par sangs rgyas te/ chos thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir/ chos nyid mi 'jig pa nye bar bzung ste/ dus gsum

mnyam pa nyid du mthun pa'i tshul gyis zhi bar byas pas sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o/ /snyam du sems te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po ste/ dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang

chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa gnyis pa bde bskyed pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te/ de ni mi gnas pa yin/ gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg la mi gnas pa ston pa

yin/ rigs kyi bdag nyid che ba la mi gnas pa yin/ rgyud kyi bdag nyid che ba la mi gnas pa yin/ zas kyi bdag nyid che ba la mi gnas pa yin/ gzugs kyi bdag nyid che ba la mi gnas pa yin/ longs spyod kyi bdag nyid che ba la mi gnas pa yin te/

de ltar de ni tshul khrims las yongs su nyams pa med cing / 'di ltar kun nas 'khor ba med pa dang / kun tu btsal ba med pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / bar chad med pa dang / gtse ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par bya'o/ /snad pa med

par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ngo snyam du sems te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i drung du/ gal te nyin gcig tu bdud bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zhig 'ongs te/ bdud re re

zhing yang lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'dod pa'i cho ga thams cad la mkhas pa/ bde bar rim gror bya ba thams cad thogs pa/ lus kyi rgyan gyis yongs su rgyas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong re re bsnyen kyang / byang chub sems dpas 'dod pa ni/ bla

na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bar du gcod pa yin par shes nas/ ston pa mngon du gyur pa'i phyir 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi 'byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral lo/ /

'dod pa'i don du sems can 'ga' la yang sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur ba mi byed de/ chung ngu na srog gi dbang po 'gags par gyur kyang gzhan la mi dga' ba mi bskyed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas/

chung ngu na sems kyi rgyud gcig tsam gyis 'dod pa la mi spyod na/ gnyis kyis gnyis sbyar ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te 'di ni gnas med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar sems skye ste/ sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas de ltar gzhol ba dang /

de ltar 'bab pa/ de ltar bab pa/ de ltar mos pa/ de lta bu'i spyod yul can/ de ltar nges pa/ de ltar bying ba/ de ltar non pa/ de ltar chags pa/ de ltar zhugs pa yin gyis/ bdag gis ni bdud 'di dag dang / bdud kyi bu mo 'di dag dang /

sems can thams cad ci nas kyang bla na med pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa la bkod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byas te/ phung po'i lhag ma

ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bslabs te/ mi bya ba thams cad yongs su spang ba dang /

lus kyis mi shes pa thams cad yongs su spang ba ma yin pa dang / sems kyis kyang ma yin pa de ni bdag cag gi las yin gyis/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i ye shes kyis sems can thams

cad kyi phyin ci log rab tu spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o/ /phyin ci log ni sems can rnams las gzhan na'ang med de/ phyin ci log rnams las kyang sems can rnams gud na med do/ /phyin ci log tu yang sems can 'dus pa ma yin/

sems can du yang phyin ci log 'dus pa ma yin no/ /phyin ci log rnams kyang sems can ma yin/ sems can rnams kyang phyin ci log ma yin no/ /phyin ci log rnams ni nang na yang med/ phyin ci log rnams ni phyi rol na yang med do/ /sems

can rnams kyang nang na yang med/ sems can rnams ni phyi rol na yang med de/ chos de dag thams cad ni gsog gsob pa bslu ba'i chos can te/ sgyu ma lta bu byis pa bslu ba dang / ngan pa chung ba snying po med pa/ rmi lam lta bu/ mig yor

lta bu ste/ de dag khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir 'du byed rjes su rtogs pa'o/ /'du byed rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya bar byed de/ rgal bas ni sgrol bar byed/ grol bas ni 'gro

bar byed/ zhi bas ni zhi bar byed/ dbugs phyin pas ni dbugs 'byin par byed/ bkrus pas ni 'khru bar byed/ dag pas ni dag par byed/ mya ngan las 'das pas ni mya ngan las 'da' bar byed/ bde bar gyur pas ni bde bar byed pa ste/

bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang skal ba mi mthun par gnas par mi bya ste/ bdag cag gis ni 'jig rten gyi spyod pa thams cad spang bar bya'o/ /bdag cag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ldan par bya'o/ /bdag cag gis

ni bla na med pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyis gnas par bya'o/ /bdag cag gis ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas yang dag par 'jug par bya'o/ /bdag cag gis ni yul thams cad yongs su shes pa dang ldan par bya'o/ /bdag cag

gis ni yongs su spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'i bag chags dang ldan par bya'o/ /bdag cag gis ni rtogs pa thams cad dang ldan par bya'o/ /bdag cag gis ni 'byung ba thams cad la mkhas pa dang ldan par bya'o/ /bdag cag gis ni bla na

med pa'i ye shes kun tu mtha' yas pa brjod du med pa/ mi gnas pa/ 'phos pa med pa/ mtha' dang dbus med pa/ mi zad pa gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa la rab tu mos par bya'o/ /zhes zer te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras

dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gnyis pa ste/ bde ba skyed pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsum pa mi mthun pa med pa zhes bya ba

gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid la brtson te/ bzod pa dang ldan zhing mngon par smra ba'i ngang tshul can yin te/ de yang bdag la gnod par ma yin/ pha rol la gnod par ma yin/ gnyis ka la gnod
par ma yin/ bdag bsdu bar ma yin/ gzhan bsdu bar ma yin/ gnyis ka bsdu bar ma yin/ bdag yongs su gzung bar ma yin/ gzhan yongs su gzung bar ma yin/ gnyis ka yongs su gzung bar ma yin/ yang dag

par blangs pa grags pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems 'di ltar skye ste/ bdag cag gis sems can la mi dge ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o/ /'dod chags spang ba dang /

zhe sdang spang ba dang / gti mug spang ba dang / nga rgyal spang ba dang / 'chab pa spang ba dang / phrag dog spang ba dang / ser sna spang ba dang / g.yo dang sgyu spang ba dang / bzod pa dang nges pa la gzhag pa'i phyir/ bdag cag gis sems can thams cad

la chos bstan par bya'o/ /zhes te kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bur bzod cing nges pa dang ldan pa yin pas/ de la gal te srog chags brgya stong bye ba grangs med pa zhig 'ongs la srog chags de dag re re zhing yang kha bye ba khrag khrig

brgya stong grangs med par sprul te/ drung du phyin la kha re re nas kyang mi snyan par brjod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pas mi snyan cing yid du mi 'ong ba dang / mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / mi tshul ba dang / 'phags pa ma

yin pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pas brjod pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pas bsnyen pa dang / yongs su spang bar bya ba sha stag du brjod de lag pa re re zhing yang 'thab cha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa thogs te/ byang chub sems

dpa'i lus la gnod par byas la nyin gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med par yang mtshams med cing ngal mi shes/ skyo mi shes/ rgyun mi 'chad/ gtong ba med/ sdod pa med/ gcugs su med/ dbugs 'byin pa med/ phyir

sri ba med par brtags kyang / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de lta bu'i 'jigs pa chen po mi zad pa/ ma rungs pa/ skyi g.ya' ba/ sdug bsngal ba nyams su 'bab pa/ tsha ba rtsub pas phog ste/ srog la bab par 'chi ma khad kyang de la byang chub sems

dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa 'di tsam dag gis phog pa la gal te bdag gis sems 'khrug pa zhig byas su zin na/ de ni ma dul ba dang / mi bden pa dang / mi mkhas pa dang / ma zhi ba dang / ma bsgoms pa dang / ma

bsdams pa dang / ma khugs pa dang / byas pa pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang / bdag gi lus la brten pas gzhan gyi sems mgu bar bya bar mi nus kyis zhes te/ de lus dang sems rang bzhin shes nas/ thog ma dang tha ma med

par skye ba dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su dran nas/ chos 'di dag ni tshul gyis de bzhin no zhes nas/ phyir zhing sems dang bar byed/ rab tu dang bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ rab tu dga' bar byed/ tshim par byed/ gzengs mtho bar byed

spro bar byed/ rab tu spro bar byed/ 'dul bar byed/ yongs su 'dems par byed de/ de ltar bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos la bzhag ste/ sems can thams cad la yang don 'di bstan par bya'o snyam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar

lus 'di ni bdag dang bdag gis stong pa/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid la bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ gnyis su brjod pa gang yang med do/ /gang stong pa de la ci yang med de/ chos thams cad ni ci yang ma yin pa yin

gyis/ de bdag gis kyang yang dag par shes par byas te/ sems can thams cad la dngos por 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir chos thams cad bstan par bya dgos kyis/ de ltar bdag gis 'di dag la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang /

bde ba'i sems dang / snying rje ba'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang / phan par dga' ba'i sems dang / yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems dang / 'tshang rgya ba'i sems dang / byang chub pa'i sems dang / mi 'phrogs pa'i sems

dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyi rjes su bsnyegs pa'i sems kyis bzod par bya'o snyam mo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsum pa ste/ mi mthun

pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa bzhi pa mi zad pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin te/ brtson 'grus

mchog dang ldan pa yin/ brtson 'grus rab dang ldan pa yin/ brtson 'grus dam pa dang ldan pa yin/ brtson 'grus phul dang ldan pa yin/ brtson 'grus 'phags pa dang ldan pa yin/ brtson 'grus gya nom pa dang ldan pa yin/ brtson 'grus bla na

med pa dang ldan pa yin/ brtson 'grus mnyam pa med pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de la 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin med/ zhe sdang gi rang bzhin med/ gti mug gi rang bzhin med/ nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin med/ 'chab pa'i rang bzhin med/ phrag dog

gi rang bzhin med/ 'jungs pa'i rang bzhin med/ sgyu'i rang bzhin med/ khrel med pa'i rang bzhin med do/ /de ni sems can gang la yang tho brtsam pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus mi rtsom ste/ gzhan du na nyon mongs pa thams

cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /bag la nyal ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /bag chags thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems can gyi khams yongs

su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /shi 'pho dang skye ba thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems can gyi

bsam pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad kyi spyod yul yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang / brtson 'grus rnam

pa tha dad pa mchog dang tha ma'i rgyu yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /chos kyi dbyings thams cad la 'jug pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i

phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang ngo bo nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /

dus gsum la mkhas pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i snang ba mnyam pa nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs par

'gyur ba'i ye shes yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad tshul gcig tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' dang dbus med

pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs pa'i ye shes chen po la mkhas pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sangs rgyas kyi

chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa dang bsgrub pa rab tu bstan pa'i rgyus yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa

yin no/ /de gal te 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par sems can rnams kyi don du sems can re re'i phyir yang bskal pa grangs med par mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por sdug bsngal du 'dug par yang spro zhing

mos te/ sems can de dag kyang de tsam gyi bar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur la/ de'i dus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa zhig byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sus mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang bde

ba'i yo byad kun dang ldan par gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya zhing / byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi

phyir/ sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa grangs med par sems can dmyal ba chen po na/ de snyed kyi sems can yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du 'dug par spro ste/ de la la la zhig gis 'di skad du rgya mtsho chen po grangs med pa skra'i rtse

mos gzhal te 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rdul du blags te/ bgrang ba de snyed kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / sems kyi skad cig tu yang mi 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa de lta bu dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes zer na yang / kye rgyal ba'i

sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' ni de la de'i phyir sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'gyod pa dang ldan pa mi 'byung gi de ni 'di snyam ste/ de ltar bdag gi mthus sems can 'di dag sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa de lta bu las yongs su grol bar gyur pa

ni bdag gi 'thob pa legs par 'thob po/ /gal te thabs 'di 'dra bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur na yang / byang chub sems dpas sbyor ba de la spro bar bya ba yin no/ /

zhes te/ de bas kyang ches dga' ba dang spro ba skye'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bzhi pa ste mi zad pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lnga pa rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/ dran pa'i dam pa 'khrug pa med pa/ rnam par 'khrug pa med

pa/ brtan pa sra ba/ mi shigs pa/ zil gyis mi non pa/ yongs su dag pa/ che ba tshad med pa/ rmongs pa med pa dang ldan pa yin te/ dran pa des 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa rnams kyang yongs su 'dzin pa yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i

tshig kyang yongs su 'dzin pa yin/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i tshig kyang yongs su 'dzin pa yin/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin la btags pa'i tshig kyang yongs su 'dzin pa yin te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam

par shes pa la btags pa'i tshig kyang yongs su 'dzin pa yin/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir tshig kyang yongs su 'dzin pa yin te/ de 'jig rten 'di nas kyang rmongs pa med par shi 'pho'o/ /'jig

rten pha rol tu yang rmongs pa med par skye ste/ ma'i mngal du yang rmongs pa med par 'gro/ /ma'i mngal nas kyang rmongs pa med par 'byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa rmongs pa med pas gnas so/ /rmongs pa med par

dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams mgu bar byed do/ /rmongs pa med par sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos par byed do/ /rmongs pa med par bdud kyi las rnams rab tu shes so/ /rmongs pa med par bdud kyi las rnams spang bar byed do/ /

rmongs pa med par bskal pa brjod du med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas so/ /de dran pa yongs su dag pa'i yan lag tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin te des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub

sems dpa' 'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams las bskal pa grangs med pa na chos thos par gyur pa zab mo zab mor snang ba'am/ yangs pa'i chos rgyan rnam par phye ba'am/ chos sna tshogs tshig dang yi ge sna tshogs kyis bstan

pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan gyi chos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs snang ba can nam/ bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos lhag pa'i bsam pa dge ba dang mos pas rnam par dag pa'am/ 'jig rten thams cad la mi gnas

pa'i chos 'jig rten gyi khong du chud pa dang 'thun pa'am/ chos yangs pa rgya chen po'i chos su bstan pa'am/ rab rib dang bral ba'i chos 'jig rten gyis shes par bya ba'am/ 'jig rten thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos

byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rjes su song ba'am/ bla na med pa'i chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyis rgya cher rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa de lta bu dag thos kyang bskal pa grangs med pas brjed par mi 'gyur/ nyams par mi 'gyur/

rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can su la yang dran pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed/ chos rig pa thogs par mi byed/ dge ba'i rtsa

ba'i blo gros 'jig par mi byed/ gzhan gyi blo la gnod par mi byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la 'di lta bu'i sgra chen po mtho ba dag dang phrad par gyur te/ drag po'i sgra dang / mi bzad

par bos pa'i sgra dang / skyi g.ya' ba'i sgra dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra rna ba'i spyod yul du 'ongs pa dang / yid du mi 'ongs pa'i sgra rna ba'i yul du 'ongs pa dang / sems 'khrug par byed pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'khrug par byed pa dang /

dbang po drug 'phrog par byed pa dag dang 'grogs par gyur kyang / sgra de lta bu dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sems skad cig kyang rnam par 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ dran pa rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro/ /spyod yul rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro/ /

mgo rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khor bar 'gyur ro/ /bslad par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'di ltar sgra de lta bu dag yid du 'ong zhing 'thun par byed pa dang / yid du mi 'ong zhing khong khro bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi

khams grangs med par grags par byed pa dag gis/ se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang ting nge 'dzin las ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /spyod yul las ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chos la 'jug pa las ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi spyod pa la

gcig tu 'dus pa las ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsgom pa las ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa las ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par brtags pa las ldang

bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can yongs su dag par bya ba'i gnas shes pa rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /don nges par shes pa rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang gis

las kyi sgrib par 'gyur ba'i sdig to'i las par mi byed do/ /gang gis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib par 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa bsdud par mi byed do/ /gang gis chos kyi sgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos la rim gror byed par mi byed do/ /gang gis chos

'jig par 'ong ba'i sgrib par 'gyur ba dam pa'i chos yongs su spong bar mi byed do/ /de la de lta bu'i sgra'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par grags pa/ mi snyan pa dang snyan pa bskal pa grangs med par mi sdod pa/ 'khrug par

byed pa/ sems 'khrug pa/ lus 'khrug pa/ dbang po 'khrug pa/ myos par byed pa/ 'khor bar byed pa/ rnyog par byed pa/ rnam par rnyog par byed pa/ kun tu rnyog par byed pas/ dkrugs par byas kyang / de la byang chub sems

dpa' 'di ltar sems skye ste/ bdag gis ni 'phags pa'i chos yongs su bsgoms pas nang du mnyam par gzhag par bya'o/ /snyam nas de sgra thams cad kyi skye ba la rab tu rtog go /gnas pa la rab tu rtogs go /'gog pa la rab tu rtog go /

skye ba'i rang bzhin la 'jug go /'gog pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug go /gang gis sgra de dag brjod pa de dag kyang de lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid du shes te/ sgras chags par mi 'gyur/ sgras khong khro bar mi 'gyur zhing / de'i dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur

ro/ /des sgra de dag thams cad kyi mtshan ma 'dzin cing mtshan ma bskyed de/ sgras bsgo ba la mngon par chags par mi 'gyur/ sgra la gnas par mi 'gyur/ sgra la mngon par chags par mi skyed do/ des sgra de dag brtags na mi dmigs te/

sgra de dag thams cad kyi rang bzhin rab tu shes so/ /rang bzhin de yang byas pa med par khong du chud do/ /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rgyas 'debs shing / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul du chags pa med pa'i mthar yang rab tu shes so/ /

'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar thug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa mtha' yas pa/ bsam gtan gyi tshul tha dad pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rgyud gcig gi tshul du zhugs pa/ chos

thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par rab tu chud pa'i lus kyi las dben pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi las dben pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi las dben pa dang ldan pas/ shes pa rtogs pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ming dang sgra med pa/ zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang ldan pa 'thob ste/ snying rje chen po yang yangs shing tshad med par byed do/ /gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phrag grangs med pa sems kyi skad cig gcig gis thob par byed kyang / byang chub

sems dpa' sems ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa de la de lta bu'i rnam par 'khrug pas dran pa rnam par 'khrug par mi nus kyi/ de'i phyir zhing 'di snyam du sems skye'o/ /de ltar bdag gis sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i rnam pa rnam par dag pa

la rab tu bkod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byas la/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o/ /snyam mo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lnga pa ste/ rmongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa drug pa lta ba bzang po zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/

kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su med cing bstan pa mi dmigs pa'i lus kyi las dben pa dang / ngag gi las dben pa dang / yid kyi las dben pa thob pa yin/ ma chags ma bcings pa'i
lus kyi las dang / ma chags ma bcings pa'i ngag gi las dang / ma chags ma bcings pa'i yid kyi las ma chags ma bcings par bstan pa/ gnas med pa/ mi gnas pa/ sems ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa/ sems kyi

rang bzhin tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'byam klas pa'i rjes su song ba/ mtshan nyid mi dmigs shing / mtshan nyid bstan du med pa zab pa gting dpag dka' ba/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang

bzhin gyi rjes su song ba/ rnam par smin pa dang / bral ba'i skyon med pa/ mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ 'gog pa dang / mthun par gnas pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi spyod yul can/ zhi ba'i rgyud rab tu thob pa/ dngos po med

pa'i tshul gyi gzhir gyur pa/ tshig gi lam chad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad las 'phags pa/ gnas med pa'i spyod pa rab tu thob pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i mtshan ma la mkhas pa/ rtogs pa bcings pa med pa la gnas pa/ de kho na nyid kyi

chos gnas kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi brjod pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gnas dang ldan pa thob pa yin te/ de 'di snyam du sems so/ /kye sems can 'di dag thams cad ni rang bzhin 'di lta bu ste/ 'di ltar

sems can med pa'i rang bzhin no/ /kye chos 'di dag thams cad rang bzhin 'di lta bu ste/ 'di ltar 'dus byas pa med pa'i rang bzhin no/ /kye zhing 'di dag thams cad ni 'di lta bu'i mtshan nyid de/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /kye dus 'di

dag thams cad ni 'di ltar byung ba ste/ 'di ltar tshig gi lam la gzhol zhing chos kun gyi rnam par tshig gi lam la shin tu gnas kyang / chos thams cad ni tshig gi lam la mi gnas pa'o zhes/ de de ltar chos thams cad zab pa yang rab tu shes so/ /

'jig rten thams cad dben pa la yang rab tu 'jug go /de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma bskyed pa la yang rab tu 'jug go /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang 'jig rten gyi chos su rab tu 'jug go /'jig rten gyi chos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos su rab tu 'jug

go /sangs rgyas kyi chos dang 'jig rten gyi chos 'dres par mi byed do/ /'jig rten gyi chos dang sangs rgyas kyi chos tha dad par yang mi byed do/ /'di ltar dus gsum la gnas pa'i chos kyi dbyings tha dad pa med pa la yang rab tu 'jug go /byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyang nyams par mi byed de/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba las kyang mi ldog ste/ sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po yang phyir zhing rab tu 'dzin par

byed do/ /sems can gyi khams bdag gis smin par ma byas pa ni su zhig smin par byed/ sems can gyi khams bdag gis dul bar ma byas pa ni su zhig dul bar byed/ sems can gyi khams bdag gis zhi bar ma byas pa ni su zhig zhi bar byed/

sems can gyi khams bdag gis shes par ma byas pa ni su zhig shes par byed/ sems can gyi khams bdag gis dag par ma byas pa ni su zhig dag par byed de/ de ltar bdag gis de lta bur zab pa'i chos yang dag par mthong la/ gcig

pu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par grol bar bya ba 'di ni bdag la tshul dang mi 'dra ba ste/ sems can gyi khams 'di yang mya ngam chen po'i lam du zhugs pa/ nyon mongs pas kun nas bzung bas mdongs par

gyur pa/ tshor ba nyams su bab pa mi zad pas nad par gyur pa/ sred pas bskor ba'i btson rar zhugs pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas ma g.yos pa/ sdug bsngal

gyi phung pos mi skyo ba/ sdom pa gsum gyis bcugs su ma rung ba/ mun nag gi nang du rab tu zhugs pa/ ma rig pa'i mngal du skye ba dang / 'chi bas mnar ba 'byung ba ma mthong bar/ mi khom par gyur pa/ mi khom pa brgyad thob pa/

sems kyi rab rib kyis dri ma can du gyur pa/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi nad kyi yan lag gis btab pa/ mya ngam chen por 'khyams pa/ lta ba'i mya ngam gyis bskor ba'o/ /zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa'

sems can gyi khams la rtog pa'i tshe/ sems 'di ltar skye ste/ de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs te/ ye shes kyi snang ba bla na med pa la zhugs nas/ sems can 'di dag ni yongs su ma smin cing

rnam par ma dul bar bor te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ dus ma yin gyi bdag gis ni bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'i

spyod pa la yongs su smin par bya'o/ /dus de lta bus sems can byang chub tu yongs su ma smin pa rnams yongs su smin par bya'o/ /ma dul ba rnams gdul bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa drug pa lta ba bzang po zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyod pa de dag la gnas pas/ lha dang bdud dang / tshangs par bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /

dge sbyong dang / bram ze'i skye dgur bcas pa dang / lha dang dri za dang mi dang mi ma yin dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis blta na mdzes shing / byang chub sems dpa' de mthong bas kyang / sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu don yod par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa dang bsnyen bkur bas kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu don yod par 'gyur ro/ /dmigs pa gang gis kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dang 'grogs

pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu don yod par 'gyur ro// //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po nyi shu drug pa/ // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bdun pa gnas med pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' gnas med pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa la 'jug pa yin/

sems bskyed pa re res zhing grangs med pa yongs su sbyong ste/ zhing la gnas mi skyed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa blta ba'i phyir 'gro zhing / me tog grangs med pa dang / spos grangs med pa dang / phreng ba grangs med

pa dang / byug pa grangs med pa dang / phye ma grangs med pa dang / na bza' grangs med pa dang / rin po che grangs med pa dang / rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang / ba dan grangs med pa dang / rgyan grangs med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba grangs

med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mthar phyin pa dang / grangs med pa'i bsam pas bsam du med pa'i chos la gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang

bsnyen bkur ba'i don du 'gro zhing sems bskyed pa re re la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa mthong yang / sangs rgyas de dag la gnas mi skyed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams la gnas mi skyed pa yin/ mtshan rnams la gnas mi skyed

pa yin/ dpe byad bzang po rnams la gnas mi skyed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od la gnas mi skyed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa la gnas mi skyed pa yin/ phyogs la gnas mi skyed pa yin/ phyogs mtshams la gnas mi skyed pa

yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas mi skyed pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun 'dus pa la gnas mi skyed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nyan cing dga' ba skyed de/ bsam pa
