pa'i sems kyis gnas par mi byed/ rmi lam gyi chos de lta bu thob par byed kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la snying po med pa'i 'du shes mi bskyed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rten pa'i 'du shes su mi byed do/ /'on kyang rten pa'i sems can

rnams gzud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brjod do/ /'chad do/ /ston to/ /'das pa'i chos nyid la brtags na shar phyogs su rjes su mi mthong ngo / /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs

su rjes su mi mthong ngo / /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su rjes su mi mthong ste/

de 'di snyam du gang ci yang rung ma btang ba de ni btang ba'o snyam du sems te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'das pa gtong ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'ongs pa gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams kyi spyod pa nyan na/ mtshan ma'i tshul dang / dngos por 'dzin pas mi 'dzin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan la brtson par mi byed pa yin/ tshol ba mi mnga' ba yin/ 'dod chags pa'i sems kyis mi

smon pa yin/ de la sems mi sdud pa yin te/ myong bar mi byed do/ /smon par mi byed do/ /de dag tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi gtong ngo / /de dag tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'jug par mi byed de/ spyod pa yang rgyun gcod par mi byed do/ /

'on kyang dmigs pa des sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / tshogs sdud pa byed cing chos nyid kyang rab tu sdud do/ /chos de ni yul na yang mi gnas/ phyogs na yang mi gnas/ nang na yang

ma yin/ phyi rol na yang ma yin/ rgyang ring po na'ang ma yin no/ /drung na 'ang ma yin no zhes de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang du yang nam yang spyad pa med par bya'o/ /snyam pa 'di ni ma 'ongs pa gtong ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la

byang chub sems dpa'i da ltar byung ba'i gtong ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'

dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med snang ba dang / shin tu snang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung

dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams nas/ nyan thos kyi

phun sum tshogs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa dag kyang nyan te/ des de dag thos nas kyang rmongs par mi 'gyur/ shin tu rmongs par mi 'gyur/ rab tu rmongs par 'gyur/ zhum par mi 'gyur/ kun nas zhum par mi 'gyur/

rnam par zhum par mi 'gyur/ shin tu zhum par mi 'gyur/ dma' bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar de ni shes pas 'du byed du gtogs pa thams cad rmi lam lta bur mngon du byed do/ /de 'di snyam du gang sbyin par bya ba 'di ni su'i yang ma yin no snyam

ste/ ngan song gi lam nye bar gnas pa bzlog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam mngon du gyur pa'i phyir de la sems rgyu ba med de/ 'di ni da ltar byung ba'i gtong ba zhes

bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' shin tu gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can mig dang mi ldan pa dang / rna ba dang mi ldan pa dang / sna dang mi ldan pa dang / lce dang mi ldan pa dang / lus dang mi ldan pa grangs med pa zhig

gis 'di skad du bdag cag la ci med pa de khyod kyis byin la/ nged mi ldan pa med par gyis shig /khyod ni bskal pa grangs med par mi ldan par 'dug cig ces zer na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de thos ma thag tu sems can de dag mi ldan pa med

par bsgrub ste/ bskal pa grangs med par dbang po dang mi ldan pa de yang nyams su len to/ /de ma'i lto na 'dug pa'i tshe ji lta bur spyod pa dang / mer mer por 'dug pa ji lta bu yin pa dang rdos par gyur pa ji lta bu yin pa

dang / 'khregs par gyur pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / dbang po grub pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / skyes pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / rgas pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / na ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / shi ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / lus kyi rang bzhin thog ma dang /

bar ma dang / tha ma ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rab tu shes so/ ngom du mi rung ba dang / ngo tsha skye ba 'phags pa ma yin pa/ dri mi zhim pa/ rjen pa'i dri can ror 'gyur ba/ rus pa pa sha dang khrag gis g.yogs pa/ rma dgu nas rtag

tu zag pa'o/ /zhes de ni sems bskyed pa gcig tsam gyis kyang / de don du gnyer bar mi sems te/ sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang chags pa mi bskyed do/ /de shin tu gtong ba des 'dzin pa med pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin te/ lus 'di ni de

ltar snying po med pa yin na/ bdag gis lus 'di snying po med par mthong ba bzhin du lus la chags pa ji ltar bya/ sems can 'di dag gi bsam pa de bzhin du yongs su tshim par bya'o/ /lus snying po med pa 'dis 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam

pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang shes par bya'o/ /ye shes kyi tshogs gang yang rung ba la yang mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gzhag par bya'o zhes nas lus kyi 'du shes kyang med/ sems kyi 'du shes kyang med de/

kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba'i gter te drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi gter gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rab tu shes so/ /

gzugs kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/ /gzugs kyi 'gog pa rab tu shes so/ /gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa

yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rnam par shes pa 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji

lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /ma rig pa rab tu shes so/ /ma rig pa kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/ /ma rig pa 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /ma rig pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji

lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sred pa rab tu shes so/ /sred pa kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/ /sred pa 'gog pa rab tu shes so/ /sred pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos rab tu shes so/ /

nyan thos kyi chos rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos kyi kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes so/ /

rang sangs rgyas kyi kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i kun

'byung ba rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /ji ltar shes she na las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / bya ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang /

gso ba dang / gsog dang / snying po med pa dang / bdag med par rab tu shes te/ chos gang yang snying po can du shes pa med do/ /chos gang la yang rang bzhin du 'dogs pa med de/ ngo bo nyid mthas gtugs

pa thams cad rab tu shes so/ /sems can rnams la yang de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos ston te de ci ston ce na/ 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos ston te/ gang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ tshor ba 'jig pa

med pa'i phyir/ 'du shes 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ 'du byed 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /ma rig pa 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos

dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni ma skyes pa/ 'du ma byas pa/ byed pa po med pa/ rtsod pa med pa/ gnas med pa/ ma skyes pa/ mi 'byung ba/ ma blangs pa

nye bar ma blangs pa/ byed pa med pa ste/ de shes rab kyi gter de lta bu dang ldan pas las gron chung ngus chos thams cad la mkhas pa/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /shes rab kyi gter de yang mi zad

pa yin te/ de yang shin tu bstan pa bcus mi zad pa yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ thos pa la mkhas pas mi zad do/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pas mi zad do/ /tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas mi zad do/ /chos kyi dbyings la

'jug pa mngon par bsgrubs pas mi zad do/ /rgyan gcig pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su zhugs pas mi zad do/ /bsod nams thams cad shin tu bstsags pas mi zad do/ /skyo ba med par mngon par bsgrubs pas mi zad do/ /gzungs thams cad kyi

sgor zhugs pas mi zad do/ /sems can thams cad kyi skad dang sgra dang brjod pa sna tshogs kyi phyir mi zad do/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi yid gnyis dang / nem nur dang the tsom yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir mi zad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul

pa thams cad yongs su bstan pas/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba dang / yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i spyod pa shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir mi zad de/ mi zad pa shin tu bstan pa bcu po de dag gis shes rab kyi gter te

mi zad pa yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi gter yin te/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab dang ye shes bla na med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /

de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de yang rgyud rmongs pa med pa'i dran pas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ 'di ltar tshe gcig

kyang rjes su dran no/ /tshe gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / tshe brgya dang stong dang / che brgya phrag du ma dang / tshe stong phrag du ma dang / tshe brgya stong phrag du ma dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa'am/ 'du ba'i bskal pa'am/

'jig pa dang 'du ba'i bskal pa'am/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang / 'du ba'i bskal pa du ma dang / 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa brgya stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / bskal pa

bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad pa dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ gnyis

dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / gzhung de bzhin du brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / sangs rgyas skye bar lung bstan pa shin tu brjod pa gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang /

lnga nas/ sangs rgyas skye bar lung bstan pa shin tu brjod du med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / sangs rgyas skye ba gcig bstan te/ de dang mtshams sbyor ba'i lung bstan pa gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga nas/

sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu bstan te/ de dang mtshams sbyor ba lung bstan pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / mdo sde gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang

dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / 'di ltar 'das pa'i sde dang / skyes ba rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / chos rmad

du byung ba bstan pa'i sde dang / man ngag bstan pa'i sde gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / 'khor 'dus pa gcig dang / chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba gcig

nas/ chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / dbang po sna tshogs gcig nas dbang po sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs gcig nas/ dbang po rnam pa

tha dad pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / nyon mongs pa sna tshogs gcig nas nyon mongs pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs gcig nas/ ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs brjod du med

pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag kyang dran pa dag pa/ dang ba rnyog pa med pa dang / rnam par gsal ba rdul med pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ dri ma med pa/ 'od gsal ba/ sang sang po/ bsgribs pa med pas rjes su dran no/ /byang chub sems

dpa'i dran pa de ni 'jig rten gyi 'khrug pas mi 'phrogs pa yin/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis nye bar nyon mongs par mi nus pa yin/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa yin/ bdud

dang mu stegs can dmigs pa la gnas pa gzhan gyis mi chod pa yin/ tshe rabs kun tu 'pho ba'i lus shin tu bstan pa thams cad kyis brjod par mi nus pa yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i mthas rnam

par mi chod pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba dang / gnas pa thams cad kyis skyon du ma gyur pa yin/ sangs rgyas skyes pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa shin tu bstan pa thams cad kyis thogs pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas

kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i gter te brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i gter gang zhe na/

kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de yang yi ge de bzhin gzhan ma yin pas/ mdo'i tshul gyi chos ston to/ /de ni tshe'i rgyud gcig pa yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /tshe'i rgyud brjod du med

pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /bskal pa grangs med

pa bstan pa gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /bskal pa grangs med pa bstan pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan pa brjod pa gcig kyang yongs

su 'dzin no/ /de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan par brjod pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /mdo gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /mdo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su

'dzin to/ /'dus pa gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /'dus pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba brjod du med pa'i

yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /nyon

mongs pa sna tshogs gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /nyon mongs pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs brjod du

med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rtogs pa'i gter te mi zad pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa dgang dka' ba/ gting rnyed par dka' ba/ bsgrub

par dka' ba/ mi 'phrog pa/ thub pa med pa/ bdag nyid che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su song ba ste/ 'di ni gter dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /

'di la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rtogs par byed pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan zhing blo gros dang ldan pa yin te/ mdo sde thams cad dang mi 'gal bas de chos ston pa'i tshe/ dngos po yongs su ldog pa gcig kyang brtsams te/ chos ston pa nas dngos

po yongs su ldog pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig nas tshul de bzhin du brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig dang / sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa

gcig dang / mdo gcig dang / 'khor 'dus pa gcig dang / chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba gcig dang / dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs gcig dang / nyon mongs pa sna tshogs gcig dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs gcig kyang brtsams te/

chos ston pa nas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du brtsams te chos ston to/ /nyi ma gcig kyang zad par byed cing chos ston pa nas/ zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig dang / lo gcig dang / lo brgya dang / lo stong

dang / lo brgya phrag stong dang / bskal pa dang / bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa brgya phrag stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / bskal pa tshad med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bskal

pa dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / mu med pa dang / sa mtshams med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / brjod du med pa dag kyang zad par byed cing chos ston na/

tshig dang yi ge gcig brtsams kyang don dang tshig dang yi ge'i mthar thug pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i gter bcu rab tu thob pa'i phyir te/ gter de dag thob pas gzungs kyi snying po'i sgo chos

thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba/ gzungs brgya stong grangs med pa'i 'khor can mngon du gyur te/ de gzungs kyi 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa ston par byed do/ /chos snang ba shin tu bstan pa thob

pas sems can thams cad la chos ston to/ /chos kyi sgo snang ba'i chos can lce yangs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par go bar byed pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag la mkhas pas 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / dbang

po ji lta ba bzhin du mgu bar byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang kun nas 'khor ba thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sgra dang tshig rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa dang / yi ge thams cad kyi spobs pas ston pa'i rjes su song ba dang /

sems can thams cad kyi sa bon gang po yongs su shes pa'i bsam pa can du byed pas chos ston te thogs par mi byed do/ /skyo bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi

dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par rgyas par byed pa'i lus rab tu thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gter bcus blo gros mi zad pa/ thub pa med pa 'dres pa med pa rnam par mi chod pa/ rgyun gcad par mi nus pa phyir mi

ldog pa/ gting rnyed par dka' ba/ ring du gyur pa/ sgo kun dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la zhugs pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter te/ mi zad pa'i rnam

pa bcus mi zad pa yin no/ /bla na med pa yin no/ /mthar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam legs par yongs su bsngos pa dang / bskal pa

thams cad kyi grangs gcad du med pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa'i phyir/ sems tshad med pa dang / 'dus byas kyis ma gos pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas la yongs su bsngos pa dang / de ma thag pa'i yul du gyur

pas chos thams cad zad mi shes pa dang / smon lam chen po tha dad pa med pa dang / spyod pa la gnas pa'i stobs shin tu 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa mtha' dang

dbus med pa la zhugs pa ste/ mi zad pa'i rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gis/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa zad mi shes pa'i gter chen por 'gyur ro/ /gter mi zad pa bcu bstan pa'i le'u ste/

nyi shu bdun pa'o// //de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs

mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang gling bzhi pa 'di la pa gling re re na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs

par snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na'ang 'khod par shes so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa

de'i phyir ma brtul/ byang chub kyi shing drung yang phyir ma brtul/ ri rab kyi rtse mo yang phyir ma brtul bar rab mtshe ma'i gnas nas dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba gang na ba der gshegs par snang

ngo / /ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas su gshegs par snang ba/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag na yang bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas su gshegs par snang ste

byin gyi rlabs snga ma de dag kyang ma 'khrugs par snang ngo / /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis/ rgyang ma nas bcom ldan 'das khang pa rin po che thams cad kyi brgyan par gshegs pa mthong nas/ rings pa'i gzugs su khang pa rin po che thams cad kyis

brgyan pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i gdan nor bu rin po che las byas pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyu las grub pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rgyu las yongs su grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ba/ dge

ba'i rtsa ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang pos byung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad las byung ba'i chos dkar po las byung ba/ bsod nams kyi stobs mtha' yas pa sna tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i rnam par smyin

pa thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa/ mi mthun pa med pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis byung ba/ /gos pa med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du byung ba/ thub pa med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa/ pog re bye ba brgya stong

phrag bcus brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu bres pa/ me tog gi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bres pa/ phreng ba'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas lding ba/ spos kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos

kun tu 'thul bar sbyar ba/ rin po che'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus steng nas bkab pa/ me tog gi gdugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bsgreng ba/ rin po che'i gdugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bkab pa/ gdan bye ba

khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par bting ba/ rin po che'i pu shu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rgyan du bsgrubs pa/ nor bu'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu rnam par phye bas yog par byas pa/ rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus

'khor kun tu yog pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba 'phyang ba'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu spyangs pas bkab pa/ lhab lhub kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu klubs shing brgyan pa/ gdugs kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs

par bkab pa/ gos sna tshogs kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs su yog pa/ rin po che'i pad mo'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu rgyas par bkram pa/ spos rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'thul zhing yid du 'ong bar dri zhim pa/

rin po che'i bla re chen po'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i rgyan chen po brgyan par bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu'i rgyan gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ba/ tsan dan rin po che'i mdog lta bu'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar

bkab pa/ rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu me tog shin tu rgyas pa/ gos kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs su snang bar bkab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs

su kun nas bkab pa/ gdugs kyi bla re kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu g.yogs shing rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba/ gser gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar bkab cing rnam par dag par byas pa/ bai DUr+ya'i

bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas dri ma med cing shin tu dag par byas pa/ snying po sna tshogs can gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bla re bkab pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i nor bu rin po che bzang pos shin tu

mdzes shing khebs par bkab pa/ rin po che'i rgyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyogs thams cad bkang ba/ rin po che'i gzugs brnyan gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu rnam par phye zhing mdzes par brgyan pa/ rin

po che'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phreng ba kun tu 'brel par brgyan pa/ spos kyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mchod pa la tshul dang mthun pa'i spos kyi dri zhim par byas pa/ lha la mchog tu bya ba'i spos dang / bdug spos bye ba khrag khrig

brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / dri zhim por gtul ba'i mchod pa can/ lha la mchog tu bya ba'i lhab lhub kyi rgyud bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par klubs shing dag par byas pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong

phrag bcus rin po che thams cad kyi rgyud du mdzes par byas pa/ dpal gyi snying po'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan du rnam par

dag pa/ nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gdan gyi snying po shin tu brgyan pa/ dbang po'i rdo rje bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu spras pa/ rin po che'i snam bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu spyangs pa/ 'jig rten

mtha' yas pa'i dbang po'i nor bu rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bzang bar brgyan pa/ gser gyi snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bsgrubs shing dag par byas pa/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus

rdul med par snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par chags pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po mtha' yas pa snang bar brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'bar bar bsgrubs pa/

nor bu rin po che snang ba'i 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'od zer snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che lha la mchog tu bya ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus skar khung gi shar bu mdzes par bres pa/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa bye ba brgya stong phrag

bcus kha dog gsal bar gyur pa/ dngul gyi rta babs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bres pas snying po dkar po rab tu rnam par phye ba/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i zla gam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sbubs shin tu bsgrubs pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa bye ba

brgya stong phrag bcus blta na mdzes par shin tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sems kyi rgyal po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'dab chags yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar kun tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong bye ba brgya stong

phrag bcus shin tu spras pa'i mchod pa dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mthu brtan par shin tu brtan pa/ nor bu rin po che snying po dag pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par snang zhing mdzes par

byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snang ba'i gdugs su bris pa/ nor bu rin po che dngul gyi snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nang rnam pa sna tshogs su bkram pa/ nor bu rin po che ri rab kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba

brgya stong phrag bcus snying po shin tu brgyan pa/ mu tig gi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog mdzes par bres pa/ bai DUr+ya'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dra bar bres pa/ mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam pa sna

tshogs su rnam par phye ba/ nor bu yid du 'ong ba'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam pa sna tshogs su bkod pa/ rin po che shin tu snang ba'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu rnam par phye zhing rab tu bzung ba/ rin po che'i 'bru

sna tshogs kyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lus shin tu brgyan pa/ mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar snang ba/ nor bu rin po che'i kha dog du ma'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying

po kha dog sna tshogs shing kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mthar phyin pa/ dga' bar byed pa'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dag par sbyangs pa/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen po rab tu 'thob

pa thob par gyur pa/ nor bu'i gzugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyogs shin tu spa bar brgyan pa/ rin po che dbang po'i kha dog bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu la gnas yongs su 'dzin pa/ dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus

'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dri zhim pos rgyas par byas pa/ rim gro byed pa'i mi'i tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su song ba/ spos kyi thum po shin tu che ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu rgyas pa/ gzhan gyis pham pa med

pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri kun tu rgyas pa/ spos kyi gzugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri kun tu 'byung ba/ yid du 'ong ba'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri rab tu 'byung ba/ snang ba ston pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dris 'gro ba

kun tu gang ba/ dri sna tshogs kha dog mtha' yas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyir mi ldog par zhim pa byug pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu byugs pa/ tsan dan rnam pa tha dad pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag

bcus tshon du bskus shing mdzes pa/ spos rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dri zhim por shin tu bsgos pa/ a ga ru nag po pad mo'i snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin gyi snying por byas pa/ bdug spos bye ba brgya stong

phrag bcus shin tu bdugs shing yog pa/ bdug spos kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dbang po zhi bar zhim pa/ spos kun tu rgyu ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yid du 'ong bar zhim pa/ spos kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus ro thams cad du bdugs/

shing dri zhim pa/ spos rnam par tshor bar byed pa'i dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dbang po mi 'khrugs par spos thams cad kyis mchod par byas pa/ spos kyi rgyal po gzhal du med pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs su shin tu brgyan

pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi pad

mo'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog gi sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi uta pa la'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu yog par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas

kyi rin po che'i me tog gi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog pun da ri ka'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog man+dA ra ba'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshogs chen po rab tu 'bab pa/

lha rdzas kyi me tog thams cad kyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i rgyun tu 'bab pa/ na bza'i sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bar snang kha dog sna tshogs su gyur pa/ nor bu rin po che'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu snang bar 'bab pa/

gdugs kyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas yog par 'bab pa/ ba dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog sna tshogs du mar 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi cod pan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sna tshogs su 'bab pa/ lhab lhub

kyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu klub par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog sna tshogs su 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i se mo do'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan chen por 'bab

pa/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tsan dan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi kha dog du mar 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi a ka ru dang / tsan dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu yog par 'thul zhing 'bab pa/ rin po che'i

rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu bsgreng ba/ rin po che'i ba dan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu spyangs pa/ snam bu rin po che'i lda ldi bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu bres pa/ spos kyi snod bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu nas shin tu 'thul ba/

rin po che'i phreng ba'i chun po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu spyangs pa/ rin po che'i sil snyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu 'khrol zhing 'dzin pa/ lha rdzas kyi rdul yab bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par rlob cing 'dzin pa/ rin po che'i dril

bu'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu 'khrol ba/ /rin po che'i stegs bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i shing ta la'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas 'greng ba/ rin po che'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong

phrag bcus lda ldir brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog cing 'khor ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyan can bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nang gi rgyan du dkrigs pa/ rin po che'i khang bu bye ba brgya stong gi sgo la

rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba bkye ba/ gser gyi dril bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong bar 'byung ba/ dpal gyi be'u bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i phreng ba rab tu spyangs pas yongs su dag pa/ rin po che'i bkra shis bye ba brgya stong phrag

bcu'i mtshan bzang po byung ba/ gser gyi dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i gser gyi lcag phod kyis kun tu bltas pa/ rin po che'i gdugs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad kyi yu bas bzung ba/ rin po che'i rgyan bye ba

brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che'i rgyan gyi dra ba thams cad du rnam par bres pa/ rin po che'i 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'od zer sna tshogs su rab tu 'phro ba snang ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu snang bar byed pa/ 'od bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab

tu 'tsher ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gzugs rab tu mdzes shing lus shin tu 'phags pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog du mar bsgrubs pa/ spos kyi 'od gzer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab rib

med par snang ba/ lha rdzas kyi pad mo'i dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu bsgrubs shing snying po shin tu 'phags pa/ rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po kun nas yog par byas pa/ me tog gi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas

rgyas par bkram pa/ spos kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri sna tshogs kyis kun nas yog pa/ lha rdzas kyi gdan rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mdzes par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mdzes par

bkram pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sngon po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brgyan par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog ser po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan chen por bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog dmar po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu lha'i dga' bar

bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gos kyi rgyan du bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi gos rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog legs par bting ba/ spos sna tshogs kyis yongs su

bsgos pa'i gos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gos bzang por bting ba/ rin po che rmad du byung ba thams cad kyi gos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan du bting ba/ gos dkar po sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag

bcus bla gab tu bkab pa/ lha rdzas kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ba/ gser gyi dra ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sgra shin tu 'byin cing yongs su bzung ba/ lha rdzas kyi snam bu rin po che'i

rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rgyal mtshan gyi dra ba'i rgyan du brgyan pa/ spos kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi dra ba thams cad kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu me tog thams

cad kyi char du 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gos thams cad du bskyod pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mdzes pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan par byas pa/ lha

rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhab lhub thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa/ lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu phyogs kun nas 'greng ba/ lha rdzas kyi

gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dril bu thams cad 'khrol bas yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba'i sgra phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi dung bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sgra snyan pa phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi rnga bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnga chen po'i sgra shin

tu phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi pi wang bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong zhing 'brel pa'i sgra phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi kha sbyar bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dbyangs chen por sgra bsgrags pa/ lha rdzas kyi sil snyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu glu dang rol

mor sbyar ba dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo dbyangs kyi dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sgra yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par grags par byas pa/ sprul pa'i rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'jig rten gyi khams

thams cad sgra brnyan gyi tshogs lta bur shes par byas pa/ lha rdzas kyi rnga bo che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brdungs pa'i sgra phyung ba/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lha rdzas kyi rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / glu'i

dbyangs snyan pa phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi rol mor gtogs pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid dga' ba dang zhi ba'i sgra phyung ba/ tshig gi rim pa yid du 'ong ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bstod cing mchod pa/ bstod pa rgya chen po bye ba brgya

stong phrag bcus dga' bar bstod cing mchod pa/ zab mor bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bsgoms shing bstod pa/ bstod pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus las thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa las yongs su byung bar bstod pa/

phra bar bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du bstod pa/ sngon gyi spyod pas bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par brjod de 'das pas bstod pa/ dge ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bstan cing bstod pa/ sngon

gyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par dag par bstod pa/ chos kyi sgo'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par 'byung bar bstod cing 'jigs pa med par bstod pa/ bstod pa rnam pa tha dad

pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi zad par brjod cing bsngags te bstod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad glur brjod cing sbyar ba

sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med par bstod pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i glu'i dbyangs su blangs pa/ chos zab mo'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med

par chos kyi snang ba thams cad glur blangs te sbyar ba/ dbyangs rgya chen po'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgrar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bsgrags pa/ sems dang bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thogs pa med par glur blangs shing

rna ba dang bar byas pa/ khams gsum du gtogs pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par bstan pa/ dga' bar byed pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thogs pa med pas dad pa dang / rim gro rab tu bskyed pa/

sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos kyi don thams cad gsal bar brjod cing sgra phyung ba/ gzungs kyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi

ldem po dag rab tu rtogs par rnam par bstod pa/ chos thams cad kyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi glu dang / rol mo dang sil snyan gyi sgra phyung ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu la

thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs dang shugs mthong ma thag tu skye bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sems dga' zhing mos par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa bye ba brgya

stong phrag bcu'i mos pa rnam par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa'i bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i theg pa chen po brtsams pa rgya cher byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba dang ldan pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i theg pa chen po brtsams

pa yongs su rgyas par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang ldan pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad shin tu sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub

sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag

bcu sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis khyab pa la 'jug par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gzhal du med pa ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul bye ba khrag khrig

brgya stong phrag bcu 'thob par rnam par 'phrul pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sgrub cing sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa bye ba brgya stong

phrag bcu mi shigs par rab tu gzhog pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i shugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dga' ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi grags pa rnam par 'phel bar

byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi don bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i ye shes gdon mi za bar nges par ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'khrug pa med par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros bye ba brgya stong

phrag bcu'i ye shes gdon mi za ba bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dzin par byin gyis rlobs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i blo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yangs pa'i blo tshad

par ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rtsa ba brtan par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gtong ba thams cad sbyin pas rnam par sbyong ba/ byang

chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tshad pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sems 'khrug pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bzod par 'jug pa/

byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mtha' yas pa'i brtson 'grus su 'byung bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tshad med pa'i bsam gtan rtogs pa'i snang bar byed pa/ byang chub

sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu snang zhing shes par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'byung ba rnam par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i

chos kyi sgo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i ye shes snang ba gsal bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'byam klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi sgo snang bar byin gyis rlob pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'byam klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos

kyi tshul rmongs pa cing gti mug par ston pa/ chos kyi 'byung gnas bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu 'thob par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'byam klas pa la 'jug par byed pa/ chos kyi lus bye ba brgya stong phrag

bcu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par bsgrubs pa rab tu shes par byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par bsgrub pa'i

'byung gnas su gyur pa/ chos 'byam klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshogs rab tu bsgrub pa/ chos kyi ye shes bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mthong ba la rgyal tshab du gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bye

ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i yang dag par ston pa'i spyod yul can/ lha'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par dga' ba'i lus can/ klu'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mi skyo bar lta ba/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag

bcu thal mo sbyar zhing spyi bo la gzhog pa/ dri za'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mi ngoms par mos pas ldang ba/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu nga rgyal gyi yid yongs su chad pa/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bye ba

brgya stong phrag bcu'i kha nas dar shin tu spyangs pa/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sems rab tu dga' ba/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dga' ba'i yid du blta ba/ tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag

bcu zhe sas phu dud du gnas pa/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i spyi bo dang / lus kyis btud pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin las pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu blta ba/ rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal

po las pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' ba chen po'i sgra phyung ba/ rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po las pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu btud pa/ rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po las pa bye ba brgya stong

phrag bcus phyag bya ba/ dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po las pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar ba/ tshangs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus blta ba/ dbang phyug chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par brjod pa/ /

byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bstod pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu mchod pa/ smon lam gyi lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par dga' ba/ sngon

'grogs pa'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sgra phyung ba/ tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lus thams cad kyis phyag bya ba/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos btud pa/ tshangs pa kun ris kyi lha

bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bskor ba byas pa/ tshangs pa chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yon tan mtha' yas pa'i mthar phyin pa brgya phrag stong gis shin tu bstod pa'i sgra phyung ba/ kun snang dang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag

bcus 'khor lngas phyag bya ba/ 'od chung gi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon pa'i sgra bsgrags pa/ tshad med 'od kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas legs par gshegs so zhes phyag bya ba/

kun snang dang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bstod cing mthong bar dka' ba'i sgra phyung ba/ dge ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gzhal khang dang ba can du 'phags pa/ 'od chung gi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sems dang ba'i lus

kyis mngon par btud pa/ tshad dge ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas mthong bar mos shing rang gi lus kyis btud pa/ dge rgyas kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mchod pa dang rim gror bya ba/ che ba'i lha bye ba brgya

stong phrag bcus dge ba'i rtsa ba rjes su dran par bya ba/ chung che'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i 'du shes rab tu skyes shing lta ba/ tshad med che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dge ba'i chos rtogs shing

rim gro cher bya ba/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lus shin tu btud pa/ mi che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan par byas te/ mngon par brjod cing lus btud pa/ mi gdung ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong

phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga nas thal mo sbyar zhing ngoms mi shes par blta ba/ gya nom snang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bltas te lus btud pa/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas

kyis bstan pa ngoms mi shes par lus dbul ba/ 'og min gyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos btud cing mchod pa/ lha sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' ba chen pos snang ba'i sgra phyung ba/ lha bye ba brgya stong phrag

bcus shin tu bsams shing bsgrubs te brgyan pa/ lha'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi gdan bsgrub pa la byin gyis brlab rgyun mi gcad pa/ lha'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po bye ba brgya stong

phrag bcu me tog thogs pa dang / spos thogs pa dang / phreng ba thogs pa dang / phye ma thogs pa dang / byug pa thogs pa dang / na bza' thogs pa dang / gdugs thogs pa dang / rgyal mtshan thogs pa dang / ba dan

thogs pa dang / rin po che thogs pa dang / phyang 'phrul thogs pa dang / lhab lhub thogs pas mngon par gtor zhing char du phab ste rab tu dgye ba/ lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lha'i khyim mngon par 'phags pa gcig nas

gcig tu brgyud pa'i pha rol tu phyin par bya ba/ lha'i gzhal med khang bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bus dad par bsu ba/ lha'i bu btsun pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhun shin tu bzung ba/ dbang bskur ba'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong

phrag bcus lhun kun nas bzung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu legs par sems shing spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i btsun pa'i sems bskyed pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i yid

dga' bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu sim par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yongs su dag par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa bye

ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par dag par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yang dag par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu ston par byed pa/ byang chub sems

dpa'i chos kyi sgo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu snang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ris bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yongs su smin par 'dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bye

ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag par byung ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byin gyis brlabs pa/ bsod nams bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su grub pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su sbyangs

pa/ smon lam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu dag par byas pa/ spyod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag par skyes pa/ chos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nye bar bstan pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rjes su
song ba/ yon tan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'phags pa bshams so// //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po nyi shu dgu pa/ ji ltar gling bzhi pa chen po

'di'i dga' ldan gyi gnas su lha'i dbang po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan can du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bting bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa chen po dag na yang dga'

ldan gyi gnas dag tu lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan can dag tu rgyan 'di lta bu dang / tshul 'di lta bu dang / dad pa 'di lta bu dang / mos pa 'di lta bu dang / dga' ba 'di lta bu dang / rab tu dga' ba 'di lta

bu dang / zhe sa 'di lta bu dang / rim gro 'di lta bu dang / spro ba 'di lta bu dang / nye bar sems pa 'di lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bting bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis stan bting nas/ zhe sa

can gyi rim gro dang bcas par dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig du dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsu nas me tog yon tan grangs pa'i sprin gyi char ni rab tu phab/ spos yon tan bsam gyis

khyab pa'i char ni rab tu phab/ phreng ba yon tan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin ni rab tu bkye/ gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char ni rab tu phab/ lha rdzas kyi gos rab tu phra ba'i sprin rab tu bkye/ rin po che yid du 'ong

ba mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi sprin gyi char ni rab tu phab/ sems shin tu dang bas lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub dang / phyang 'phrul gyi sprin gyi char ni kun tu phab/ bdug spos rnam pa du ma'i sprin gyis ni kun tu bdug /lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi

phye ma dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / spos dam pa thams cad kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char ni rab tu phab/ lha'i bu mtha' yas pas kyang rang rang gi lus kyi sprin ni shin tu bkye/ dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcu dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i ris nas 'dus pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang sems shin tu dang bas zhe sa rab tu bskyed nas/ shin tu btud de phyag 'tshal to/ /lha'i bu mo grangs med pa dag

kyang dga' zhing mos pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la rab tu sems so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na spyod pa grangs pa rnams kyang bar snang la gnas te/ sangs rgyas la mchod par brtson pa'i sems

kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /rim gro byed do phyag 'tshal lo/ /de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyu mthun pa dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa'i cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rol mo bkrol ba dang / brdung ba'i tshogs grangs med pa yang sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /lha'i bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'khod pa rnams dang / lha'i bu mo rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la ni lta/

de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba/ shin tu dkon par ni rjes su sems shing / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa bsgribs pa med pa'i chos can no/ /zhes yang dag par lta zhing de logs su

mngon par lta bar gyur to/ /dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'khod pa'i 'khor thams cad dang / lha bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir rin po che thams cad kyi tog gi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / spos thams cad kyi

phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi a ka ru

thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi me tog thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog man dA

ra ba'i phur ma thogs thogs pa rnams kyang dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /lha'i bu dga' ldan gyi gnas su gtogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa rnams kyang bar snang

la 'khod de/ ye shes kyi spyod yul la gzhol ba'i sems kyis spos dang bdug pa'i sprin gyis bdug pas bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /sangs rgyas la dga' zhing gzhol ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi me tog thams cad kyi sprin gyi char

gyis rab tu brgyan pas bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la zhe sa cher bya ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi gdugs sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis bar snang yog par byas te brgyan par byas so/ /sangs rgyas la mchod par gzhol ba'i sems

kyis lha rdzas kyi phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu dgye bas bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /sangs rgyas las thos par mos pa'i sems kyis gser gyi dra ba grangs med pa las dril bu sna tshogs kyi dra ba 'khrol zhing sgra 'byin pas g.yog par byas te

bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yon gyi gnas dam pa yin par 'dzin pa'i sems kyis bla re grangs med pa las rin po che thams cad kyi se mo do'i sprin lding zhing / 'brul ba'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /

sangs rgyas la dge bar 'dun pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang grangs med par lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba thams cad kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba phyung bas bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu

dkon par dogs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi na bza' kha dog sna tshogs pa'i sprin dang / na bza' mtshungs pa med pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /sangs rgyas la mos pa mtha'

yas pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi cod pan grangs med pa'i sprin las cod pan gyi char chen po 'khor zhing 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/ sangs rgyas yid la bde ba skyes pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rin po che kha dog sna tshogs

grangs med pa'i sprin las phreng ba sna tshogs kyi char rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa yang lha rdzas kyi me tog kha dog tha dad pa grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ me tog zad mi shes pa'i

mdzod rab tu bkye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/ /mos pa'i spos zhim po rnyed cing sangs rgyas la dad par gnas pas lha rdzas kyi spos dang / bdug pa kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te bcom ldan 'das la

phul lo/ /rgyan chen po sprul pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brang

zhing rin po che'i gdugs kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'gebs so/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa la mos pa'i sems rnam par 'phel bas/ gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs grangs

med pa lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i lam gos kyis yog par byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya bar mos pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can lag na thogs shing / bcom

ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'dong ngo / /sangs rgyas la dga' ba mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phel ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub dang / phyang 'phrul kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ de bzhin

gshegs pa la phul lo/ /dad pa mi 'phrogs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi phreng ba grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gsol to/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i dga' ba rnam par 'phel bas/ lha rdzas

gyi ba dan rin po che kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung na 'dzin to/ /lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa yang zhi ba la rab tu gzhol zhing bag yod pa tshad med

pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med
pa/ dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'ongs pa'i rnams kyang lha rdzas las 'das pa'i mchod pa khams gsum las rnam par 'das pa/ pa'i chos las byung ba/ rjen pa'i dri med pa/ chags pa med pa'i

sems tshim par byed pa/ chos kyi tshul zab mos mngon par grub pa/ blo tshad med pa'i yangs pa las byung ba/ dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan pas rnam par spel ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang

'phrul ba grangs med pas mngon par bsgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa yid kyi rang bzhin las byung ba/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyas btab pas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun nas yog par byas so/ /

lha rdzas las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i me tog gi bla re sna tshogs kyis chos kyi dbyings kun nas khebs par byas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa mos pa rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

yul rgyas par 'gengs pa'i na bza' sna tshogs mngon par dgab pas chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ /chags pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin rdo rje la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i mi skye ba'i chos

las byung ba'i dril bu tshom bur bcad pa'i dra bas chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ /chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos thams cad kyi mchog gis bdug pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings

brgyan par byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi khri sangs rgyas kyi gdan du bting ba'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ /

sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa rang bzhin 'gag pa med pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par bsgreng ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ /rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid

kyis bsam pa tshim pas lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho brang brgyan pas chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ /mi gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba blang ba med pa las byung bas/ lha rdzas las

'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad mos kun nas yog pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos thams cad kyi mchog gi sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bya ba

dang / me tog kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / na bza' kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sprin dang / tsan dan gyi dri zhim po mtha' yas par 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i

rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi ngad kun tu ldang ba'i sprin dang / phreng ba yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i lhab lhub rnam par dag pa thams cad

kyi sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa rang gi lus gtong ba'i sprin dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa las 'das pas bstod cing bsngags pa'i brjod pa zad mi shes pa'i sprin dang /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstod pas brjod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bsngags pa'i chos ma log pa las byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs mtha' dang dbus med pa las rgyu bas 'gro ba thams cad bde ba'i lam bstan pa dang / tshig rnam

par 'byed pa brjod du med pa smos pas chos tshad med pa la gzhol ba'i gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad las byung ba'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa la mkhas pa mi zad pa dang mi 'jigs pas yid dga' bar gyur pa'i rim gro ngoms mi shes pas/

de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa/ tshig rnam par dbye zhing brjod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos kyi dbyings kyi lus nam mkha'i khams rgyas par byed pa byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas 'das pa dang /

ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba'i yid kyi dbang pos mngon par bstod do/ /lha'i ris gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa'i lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa

nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston cing /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag par 'byung ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul yang dag par ston pa dang / sems can grangs med pa'i rgyud tshim par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rnam par phye bas nam mkha'i

khams thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par mdzad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa brtan par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul gzhal du med pa las byung ba/ tshig gi lam thams cad las

yang dag par 'das pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigs dang ldan pa thams cad kyis mngon par mos par bya ba/ sems can 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku yangs pa rjes su khyab par gyur pa/

dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa thams cad rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa yang dag par ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin las 'byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa'i

lus kyi rjes su 'dal ba/ sku'i byin gyis rlabs las mtshams med pa/ yid tshad med pa yongs su mgu bar mdzad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa

'byung ba brnyes pa/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs su byung ba/ khams dang mos pa bgrang du med pa thams cad sbyong bar mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes mngon par

bsgrub pa la 'jug par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa/ chos kyi sprin gyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad du yog par mdzad pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par de bzhin

gshegs pas 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rlob pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rtog pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa/ mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyud kyis 'gro ba thams cad las 'phags pa/ ye shes kyi rnam pa

thams cad brnyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs snang ba gzigs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du yang dag par gzigs pa/ sems bskyed pa rgya chen po skye bar mdzad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du kun tu bzang

po thub pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag par rgyu bas byung ba 'gro ba dang zhing thams cad du khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du mi ldog par gshegs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyud brjod du med pa yang dag par ston pa/ bsam

pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khrul pa mi mnga' bar byin gyis rlob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gi rnam pas yon tan mi zad pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams

mtha' dang dbus pa khyab par mdzad pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyi ji ltar dam bcas pa'i sems can la rim gror mdzad pa/ ji ltar brnyes pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/ sems can ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du 'dul ba mdzad pa/

mos pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dag par mdzad pa/ gzugs kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis rlob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la gnas pa mi mnga' zhing mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su bzhud pa/ spyod pa tha dad pa las

byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgribs pa med pa mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ thugs la chags pa mi mnga' bas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag cing ma 'dres pa/ ye shes thams cad la rnam par spyod pa/ don

dang tshig dang yi ge tha dad pa yang dag par ston pa/ ye shes rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa/ yon tan gyi mchog ye shes snying pos byung bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi nyi ma shar ba/ 'gro ba thams cad du sngon

gyi smon lam zad pa mi mnga' bar chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mnyams pa brnyes pa/ bdag gi dang yongs su gzung ba med pas gnas par mi mnga' ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos

thams cad 'byung zhing 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis mi shes pa'i rgyal mtshan yang dag par bcad pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi mi shes pa chen po yongs su bsal ba'i gnas su gyur pa 'gro ba thams

cad snang bar mngon par 'don pa/ 'jig rten thams cad ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa la rab tu gzhog pa/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i bsod nams yongs su mi zad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi shes pa

thugs su chud pa/ dad par bya bar 'os pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gzhol ba'i byams pa chen po las byung ba thugs rje chen po yang dag par ston pas spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku brjod du med pa'i chos dang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gsung dang dbyangs kyi char 'bebs pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par tshim par mdzad pa/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba'i
mtha'i pa'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu dag cing bsam gyis khyab pas sems can dag par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lung bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs su dbang bskur bas/ de

bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud du byung ba/ 'jig rten thams cad du 'khor lo mi ldog par 'khor ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon par zhen pa thams cad las 'phags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi mthas

klas pa la mi gnas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyis rnam par dag pa/ 'khor ba la mi bzhugs par 'jig rten thams cad du snang bar gyur pa/ btsal

ba mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rang bzhin ye shes kyi zla ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa'i rjes su bzhud pa/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi byin gyis rlob pa/ mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyis rnam

par ston pa/ rmi lam lta bur rjes su dran pa/ sprul pa dang mnyam par byung ba/ sems kyi rang bzhin lta bur 'jig rten sna tshogs thams cad byin gyis rlob pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa'i tshul dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du

sems can gyi skye mched rnam par phye ba yang dag par ston pa/ sems can gyi dbang po dang mthun par sangs rgyas kyi sku byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dmigs pa la sems can grangs med pa'i sems yang dag par gnas

pa/ 'jig rten thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ rnam par bstan pa'i rang bzhin du chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis yang dag par spyod pa/ ye shes kyi rgyud mtshan nyid med pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur pa/

'jig rten thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid snang ba/ mngon par bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing 'gro ba thams cad gdon par brtson pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bla na med pa yang dag par ston pa/ 'jig

rten dang zhing thams cad yongs su skyob pas sangs rgyas kyi mtshan ma bzung bar 'jig rten du mngon par byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi nyon mongs pa'i mtshan ma thams cad rnam par bstsal ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa dang /

dmigs par 'byor par gyur pa/ 'khrug pa med par khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i rgyu theg pa chen pos zhal yongs su rgyas pas/ chos thams cad kyi don grub pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par phye ba nyams pa med pa'i

phrin las rnam par smin pas rnam par dag pa/ ye shes kyi 'byung gnas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pa yongs su mi rtog pas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams

cad du 'od gzer gyi dra bas gsal bar gyur pa/ phyogs bcu 'byam klas pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis snang bar mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bzhud pa blta bas mi ngoms shing btang mi bra ba/

yon tan chen po dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'byung ba dang / dbang po mngon par mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa

rgyas par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las shin tu sgrub pa/ nub cing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs mtha' yas pa'i char

'bebs pa/ bsam pa yangs pa'i bsgom pa yongs su 'dzin par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dpal thams cad kyis rab tu 'bar ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su 'jig rten thams cad la mngon

par ston pa/ sgrib pa'i chos thams cad du ma lhung ba/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi don gyis dag pa yon tan gyi chos thams cad la mnga' bas mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor can yon tan gyi 'od gzer mnga' ba'i nyi mar gyur pa/ bsod

nams kyi zhing du shar ba/ gzi brjid thams cad kyi dra bas mngon par skyes pa/ 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa yang dag par 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten thams cad sprul par thugs su chud pa'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/

de bzhin gshegs pa'i go 'phang chags pa pa mnga' ba/ phyi ma'i mtha'i yon tan 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa/ 'gro ba thams cad dang mthun par ston pa'i ye shes kyi phyag mnga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sman pa

sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa/ 'jig rten tshad med pa thams cad du shin tu rnam par dag pas rjes su 'brang ba/ 'gro ba dang zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du phyir mi ldog pa ye shes kyi spyan phugs rab rib cing rnam par

dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi lo legs pa yang dag par ston pa/ 'khu ba'i sems can gyi khams las su rung bar mdzad pa/ 'dul ba sna tshogs du ma la 'jug pa/ dus bzhin du 'dul ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la

mnyam pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par spyod pa/ las skyon med pa'i rnam par smin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par ston pa/ bsam pa dang las dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par ston pa/

sangs rgyas kyi sku ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyis chos shes pa 'byung bar mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la rnam par gzigs pa'i ye shes mnga' ba/

dga' ba chen po dang lhag pa'i bsam pas dga' bar mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dad pa'i shugs mtha' yas pas byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba phyir mi ldog par mdzad pa/ sems can gyi las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su

'brang bar mdzad pa/ 'gro ba gnyid kyis log pa thams cad sad par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas skye bas dge ba yang dag par 'phel bar mdzad pa/ sems can la sangs rgyas kyi bag dbab pa chen po stob pa mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi lta ba

thams cad la mi gnas pa/ ye shes kyi don la rab tu gzhog pa/ rab tu gzhag pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyi spyod yul thugs su chud pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gzigs pa'i zil gyis gnon pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ chos kyi rgyud thugs su chud

pa'i ri bo rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas 'byam klas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dang gzhan du ston pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sa la sems can rab tu 'god pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan grangs med pas rnam par bris pa/ las

kyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'byung gnas rnam par sbyong ba/ ye shes thams cad yongs su 'thob par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi smon lam rjes su

srung ba mi shigs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston pa/ snang ba dri ma med cing mchog tu dag par mdzad pa/ 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyis ji tsam du mngon sum du mthong ba de tsam du brjod du pa/ sems can thams

cad kyi 'gro ba'i rjes su song ba'i byin gyi rlabs mnga' ba/ grogs sngon du 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can rnam par dag par mdzad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam gyi rjes su song ba nyams pa med pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i

rtsa ba yongs su bzung bas dag par mdzad pa la pa'i tshul gyis yongs su byung ba/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par 'joms par byung ba/ chags pa med pa'i mtha'i stobs kyis byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na 'od shin tu

dad par snang ba/ ye shes kyi dbyings chags pa med pa'i snying po'i nyi ma sems can gang yang rung ba la chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/ 'od gzer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod mtha' dang dbus med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor

mnga' ba/ 'gro ba thams cad la snang bar gyur pa/ bsam pa dang yang dag par rtog pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ phyir rgol ba shin tu bcom pa/ yon gyi gnas dam pa mchog du gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa/ yon

tan tshad med par 'gyur ba/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par mdzad pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu tshad med par yongs su 'dzin pa/ zad mi shes pa'i ye shes kyi sar 'dzud cing rab tu gzhog pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi dge ba'i

rtsa ba sems la rag las par yid ches pas tshad med pa'i bsod nams dang / yon tan dag par mdzad pa/ ye shes kyi tshul gyis ngan song gsum gyi 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'o/ /zhes rnam pa de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pa rnam pa de lta

bur/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yang dag par lta ba/ rnam pa de lta bur ye shes kyi mu stegs las 'bab pa/ rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i gang chen mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa/ rnam pa de lta bu'i ye shes kyi nam

mkha'i rjes su 'gro ba rnam pa de lta bur 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du yang dag pa ji lta bur shes pa/ rnam pa de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i sgos lta ba/ rnam pa de lta bur dge ba'i 'phrin las rnam

par dag pa'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la rtog pa/ rnam pa de lta bu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku chen po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byed pa/ rnam pa de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i

sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par bstan par rjes su sems pa de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa 'byung ba/ grangs pa

rnam par dag pa/ grangs med par shin tu snang ba/ grangs par bltar yod pa/ grangs med pa'i sems can gyi dga' bskyed pa/ grangs med pa'i spro ba skyed pa/ grangs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'dun pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ grangs med pa'i lhag pa'i

bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba/ grangs med pa'i dbang po sim par byed pa/ grangs med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul thob par byed pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/ /'od kyi 'khor lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang de

bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis 'phrul zhing 'byung ba/ kha dog bsam gyis khyab pa/ mdog bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad

rgyas par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can rnam par dag pas/ dri zhim por rab tu byung ba/ tshigs su bcad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten thams cad

las rnam par 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su byung ba/ rgyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par ston pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab par yon tan mi zad pa/

sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zad mi shes pa las byung ba/ sangs rgyas skye ba brjod du med pa yang dag par ston pa/ ye shes kyi sgo la rab tu yog pa/ don yangs pa shin tu ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa/ brjod du med pa'i tshul yang

dag par ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dang dbus med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ba 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag pa/

mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa chags pa med pa/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa'i dpal yod pa/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro

ba bye ba brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ltar byung ba mthong bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan smon lam chen po las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bya ba'i spyod

pas rnam par dag pa dang / sngon gyi bag yod pa las yang dag par byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems chags pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byam klas pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa dang /

de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba la sems can tshad med pa rab tu dgod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo dang sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul zil gyis non pa med pa la rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can gzud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
bka' bzhin byed pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas 'dus pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin

gshegs pa'i 'khor du ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du pa grangs pa dag na/ sems ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang / sems dad pa rnams rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems rnam par 'phel ba

rnams rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems rnam par dag pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sems yongs su smin pa rnams 'dul bar bya ba dang / chos zab mo khong du chud par bya ba dang / ye shes snang ba mtha' dang

dbus med pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems tshad med pa'i rnams rgya che bar bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / chos nyid dang mi 'gal bar bya ba dang / yang dag pa'i mthas mi skrag

par bya ba dang / de bzhin nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnams kyang rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang / pa thams cad la brtson pa'i sangs

rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang kun tu bzang po'i tshul du mos par bya ba dang / bdud kyi yul las rnam par ldog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul 'thob par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid shes par bya ba dang / ye shes bsam

gyis mi khyab pa skye bar bya ba dang / theg pa chen po'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas blta ba las mi 'phang bar bya ba dang / ye shes khong du chud par bya ba tshad med pa rtogs par bya ba dang / sa mtshams med pa'i

bsod nams kyi stobs yang dag par yongs su bsgrub par bya ba dang / shin tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed par bya ba dang / the tsom med pa'i sa la 'jug par bya ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med cing yongs su dag pa 'thob par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la

brten pa so sor 'thob par bya ba dang / chos mthong ba las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs grub par bya ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan
