'das kyis thugs rje chen po kun tu khyab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po chen pos byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa mang po yang dag par bstan to/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang du sangs rgyas kyi

bdag nyid che ba brjod pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snying po rab tu snang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi dpal mtha' yas pa rab tu 'bar ba/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par snang ba thams cad du zhugs pa'i de bzhin

gshegs pa'i skus rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i cho 'phrul gyi mthu dang ldan pa/ dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis yongs su grub pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshegs stabs phun sum

tshogs pa/ chos kyi dbang phyug brnyes pas chos thams cad la mnga' ba dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo nas byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pas shin tu skyangs pa mnga' ba/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung

ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po shin tu sbyangs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dpes dper 'gyur ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba/ mtshan thams cad kyi lo ma shin tu 'phags pa'i sku

can/ stobs bcu'i rgyal mtshan gyi stobs chen po dang ldan pa/ bskal pa mi zad pa thams cad du blta bas mi ngoms pa/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ston pa'i dbyangs kyi ye shes kyi nga ror gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad pas 'gro ba thams cad la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa/ yon tan thams cad kyi rgyal po chos thams cad kyi srid la mnga' ba'i phyir dus gsum du snang bar byed pa'i gsung mnga' bas byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan sngon gyi dge ba'i

rtsa ba'i tshogs las yang dag par byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis tshul 'di lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / rgyan kun tu bshams pa byas te/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha bye ba

brgya stong grangs pa dang lhan cig du/ zhe sa can rim gro dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/ bde

bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis spyan drangs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rnam pa

'di lta bu dang / sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba 'gro ba thams cad la mdzes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mos pa/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad mngon par dga' ba/ lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis mi ngoms par

rim gror bya zhing / tshad med pa'i sems can sangs rgyas la par brtson pa bskyed pa/ tshad med pa'i sems can sangs rgyas su dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mi zad pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur pa/ dad pa dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyis

bstsags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal blta ba dang / mchod pas skyo bar mi 'gyur ba/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dge ba'i tshogs kyis yang dag par bsdus pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / smon lam dang sems bskyed pa las byung

bas khang pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan par gshegs so/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi dang / /dga' ldan gyi gnas dag du'ang gshegs par snang ngo / /bcom ldan

'das rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs ma thag tu de'i tshe/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang pa rin po che'i rgyan las shin tu 'das par gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun

nas yog par gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab par gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyis brgyan par gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das

pa'i gos thams cad kyi sprin rab tu gtong bar gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i tsan dan thams cad kyi sprin chen po rab tu gtong bar gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i dri thams cad kyi mchog dang / bdug pa 'thul

ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab par gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin rnam pa tha dad pa'i char rab tu 'bab par gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i me tog mang po'i sprin gyi tshogs kyi char rab tu

'bab par gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i sil snyan dang / brdung ba bye ba brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra rab tu 'byin par gnas so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi dbyings su grag pa'i rol mo'i sgra dang / glu'i dbyangs kyang rab tu 'gyed

par gnas par gyur te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu yang rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs par

snang ngo / /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis lha'i gnas thams cad du lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab po zhes sgra brjod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la bar chad du mi 'gyur

ba dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang / tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa dang / mtha' yas par sems bskyed pa'i dad pa rnam par 'phel ba dang / shugs chen po yang dag par bskyed pa dang / dga' ba chen po shin tu bskyed pa dang /

dge ba'i bsam pa rnam par sbyangs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pas dga' bar bya ba dang / chos la bar chad med pa'i yid du 'gyur bar bya ba dang / chos rnams mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir dga' ldan gnas kyi glu dang / rol mo

brdung ba dang / dkrol ba'i sgra rgyun mi chad par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag rjes su dran nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su

bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /chags pa med pa'i zla bar mtshan gsol mtshan btags pa/ /pho brang mchog du rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang

zhig gis/ /ye shes mtha' yas dbang zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ /kha dog gser du rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /kun tu mtha' yas spyan zhes bya bar mtshan

btags pa/ /pad mo'i rtse mor rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /yan lag rin po che zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ /rin chen mdzod du rab gshegs pa/ /des ni

'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /dpal rab rgol ba'i stag ces bya bar mtshan btags pa/ /dbang po'i khang par rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra

shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /yon tan thams cad ston pa'i nyi mar mtshan btags pa/ /me tog snying por rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /yan lag 'od

gzer mtha' yas par ni mtshan btags pa/ /shing gis brgyan par rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /mgon po the tsom 'joms pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan te/ /

rin chen khang par rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /mi yi seng ge ye shes sgron ma mtha' yas pa/ /spos kyi rtse mor rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra

shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'od mnga' ba/ /nor bus brgyan par rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /ji ltar lha'i rgyal po rab dga'

ldan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan brjod de/ glu'i dbyangs su tshigs su bcad pas/ rgyal ba gshegs pa mngon par bstod pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang lha'i

rgyal po rab dga' ldan rnams sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis glu dbyangs su tshigs su bcad cing / sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan brjod pa byed cing rgyal ba gshegs pa'ang mngon par bstod

par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sku dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rigs gcig tu gyur pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rgyud

kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su thugs su chud pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / chos thams cad la bsgribs pa par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi byin

gyi rlabs rgyun mi 'chad pa dang sems can 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsgribs pa med pa'i rgyan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang / dus bzhin du byung ba'i chos bstan pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yang dag par spyod pa/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi

mthu phyung bas/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs nas gdan bting ba la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang bzhugs par gyur te/

ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs pa dang byon pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi rim gro dang mchod pa byas shing / rgyan gyis brgyan pa de dag thams cad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs pa'i

tshe/ grangs med par gyur pa dang / grangs med pa'i rnam par lha rdzas las 'das pa'i me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rin po che dang / rol mo

brdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / glu dang / bstod pa dang / zhe sa dang / rim gro dang / dad pa dang / dga' ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i rgyan dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i

bstod pa dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i gdugs gcig nas gcig du brgyud de bsgreng ba dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i rgyal mtshan la ba dan

spyangs pa dang / shin tu spyangs pa grangs med pas sbyar ba/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i yo byad kyi tshul dang / bsam pa rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bas/ sangs rgyas mnyes par bya ba dang / mdzes pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dri

thams cad dang / phyogs brgyan pa'i spos kyi sprin chen po dang / rim gro rnam pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rim gro la brtson pas de bzhin gshegs pa gdan la bzhugs pa'i tshe/

grangs med pa'i gyur du mchod pa byas so/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu yang mchod pa byas par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa dang gshegs pa dang / bzhugs pa'i rgyan ces

bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu mngon par lhags te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i

rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas 'ongs par gyur pa dag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' dag dang lhan cig tu phyin to/ /

byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya bdag ste/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang / dam pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i

rgyal mtshan dang / rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / dri ma med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bdag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag

nas 'ongs par gyur pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rin po che'i snying po dang / yid du 'ong ba'i snying po dang / dngul gyi snying po dang / gser gyi snying po dang / nor bu'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / pad mo'i snying po dang / ut+pa la'i snying po dang / tsan

dan gyi snying po dang / spos kyi snying po zhes bya bdag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal dang / g.yo ba med

pa'i dpal dang / bcings pa med pa'i dpal dang / spyod pa'i dpal dang / 'od zer gyi dpal dang / mtha' las rgal ba'i dpal dang / mchog gi dpal dang / dbang phyug gi dpal dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / shin tu bstsags pa'i dpal zhes bya

ba dag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs bcu rgyas par byas te/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten nas/ seng ge'i khri rin po che'i snying po can nor bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag mngon par sprul

te/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa'i lus dang / 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa gtong ba dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od gtong ba dang / tshad med pa'i 'od rab tu skyed pa dang / bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i rin po che yang dag par 'dzin

pa'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa kha na ma tho ba med pa las byung ba'i smon lam dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na yid du 'ong ba dang / blta na don yod par sems can gdul ba dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos kyis sangs rgyas kyi

rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab par byang chub sems dpa'i rtse gcig du smon lam btab pas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ chags

pa med par spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / 'di lta ste/ gnas med pa'i lus dang / 'di lta ste/ tshad med pa'i lus kyis kun tu 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi lus kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / 'di lta ste/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs

rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang / 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo 'byam klas pa/ tshad med par gyur pa dang / 'di lta ste/ chos la mi 'jigs par mkhas pa'i snang ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'di lta

ste/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par mi zad pa'i tha dad pa yang dag pa shes pa'i tshul bshad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ gzugs thams cad kyis snang bar byas pa'i ye shes kyi phung po rab tu rgyas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par gyur

pa'i shes rab kyi rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas par ye shes kyi spyod yul yongs su gnas pa dang / mtshams med cing mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa rab

tu thob par gyur pa dag go /ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i dga' ldan gyi gnas su/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus par gyur pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu yang /

byang chub sems dpa' ming de skad bya ba dag /'jig rten gyi khams ming de skad ces bya ba dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de skad ces bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa sha stag 'ongs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs pus mo'i

lha nga gnyis nas 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong byung ste/ phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bstan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi gling bzhi pa thams

cad dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yod pa mthong bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji snyed kyis phyogs bcur chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa

dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa

la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i grogs su gyur pa dag ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mos rnam par 'phrul pa la mos pa sha stag go /chos kyi dbyings kyi lus tha dad pa med pa'i rjes su song ba sha stag go /gnas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi

zhing du 'gro ba'i rjes su song bas rab tu zhugs pa sha stag go /sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa blta ba la rjes su gzhol ba sha stag go /chags pa med pa'i sems skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings khyab par byed pa sha stag go /bsam pa rin po che rdul

dang bral ba dang ldan pa sha stag go /brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas mang po dang 'grogs pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs grangs med pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /yang dag par spyod pa'i mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag go /

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dran pa rnam par dag pa la gnas pa sha stag go /blo dang sems skad cig thams cad kyis cher 'phags pa rab tu thob pa sha stag go /chung ngur zhugs shing cher gyur pa'i spyod pa la dbang ba sha stag

go /cher gyur pa la zhugs shing chung ngur 'jug pa'i rjes su chud nas ye shes kyis spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag go /de lta bu'i gnas dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang

'grogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs ltar grub pa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba'i spyod yul thams cad du 'gro ba dang / ye shes chen po'i rgyud kyi sgo rnam par phye

ba dang / ye shes kyi stobs rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi mthu'i mchog thob pa dang / rdo rje gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rab tu thob pa dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa rnams yongs su smyin par gdul ba la rmongs pa

med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad du 'gro ba gdon mi za ba'i mchog thob pa dang / bgrang ba thams cad la mngon par chags pa dang / bgrang ba'i mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad shin tu bslabs pa dang /

bgrang ba'i shes pa thams cad kyi mthar thug cing chos rnam par dgod pa la mkhas pa dang / 'di dag dang gzhan yang yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa dang / yon tan bsngags pa rnam par dag pa mi zad pas/ byang chub sems
sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum gyi yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa sha stag /de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bya ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byam klas pa thams cad blta ba'i phyir kun nas 'dus par

gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /yang dag sangs rgyas skye ba med/ /rgyal ba

mya ngan mi 'da' ste/ /rgyu mthun pa yi smon lam gyis/ /des ni rnam par 'phrul pa snang / /'di dag chos ni bsam mi khyab/ /'di dag sems kyi spyod yul min/ /gang gis ye shes pha rol phyin/ /des ni sangs rgyas spyod
yul mthong / /lus 'di yang dag sangs rgyas / /sgra yang de bzhin gshegs pa / /lus dang sgra las gzhan na yang / /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul mi mthong / /sngon gyi las rnams ma gtogs
par/ /rang byung rnams kyi spyod yul gyi/ /mchog gi tshul rnams shes pa ni/ /blo zhan rnams kyis mi nus so/ /yang dag sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di/ /gang dag nas kyang ma 'ongs te/ /gang du 'gro
bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di dag rang byung sku yin no/ /tshad med shin tu 'dren pa rnams/ /chos 'di rab tu bshad mdzad kyang / /chos la gnas pa gang yang med/ /zhing rnams bye ba kun na snang / /mkhyen pas
mtha' dang dbus med de/ /chos kun thugs su chud cing rtogs/ /chos kyi dbyings la rab zhugs nas/ /rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa mdzad/ /chos rnams kun la chags pa med/ /'gro la de ni bsgribs mi mnga'/ /

tshad med pa yi yon tan gyis/ /zhing rnams kun na rab tu snang / /gang zhig ye shes 'di dag dang / /ye shes thams cad rtogs 'dod pas/ /bsam pa rnam par spyad byas te/ /byang chub spyod pa spyad par bya/ /drang srong chen

po'i byin gyi rlabs/ /'di 'dra gang gis mthong gyur cing / /de ni the tsom mi byed na/ /dge bshes mchog la bsnyen pa yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs

bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /shin tu zab ste brjod du med/ /brjod du yod kyang 'da' bar dka'/ /tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das/ /nam mkha' la ni rgyal ba snang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i

byin rlabs kyis/ /mi yi seng ge mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang dag sangs rgyas rtog med kyang / /rgyal ba rnam par rtog par snang / /'jig rten mgon pos chos nyid dngos/ /zab mo 'di dag yang dag bstan/ /gang zag mtshungs pa med pa yi/ /des ni sku 'di

rab tu 'byung / /thams cad gzigs kyi spyod yul gyi/ /ye shes chen po 'di 'dra ste/ /'di la gang zhig rtogs 'dod pa/ /des ni rgyal ba mngon du byos/ /yid kyi dbang po rnam dag pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyen bkur zhing / /'di yi tshul las 'da'

byed tshe/ /nam yang skyo bar mi bya'o/ /mi zad pa yi bsod nams dang / /byang chub sems kyis brtan pa rnams/ /the tsom rnam par bzlog byas te/ /de dag la ni skyo med ltos/ /rgyal sras gang gis chos dbyings kyi/ /shin tu bstan pa'i mthar phyin pa/ /des ni kun

gzigs rnam 'phrul ba/ /'di dag shin tu 'da' bar bya/ /dad pa chos 'di'i rtsa ba zhes/ /chos kyi phung pos bshad mdzad kyis/ /dad pa shin tu cher bskyed la/ /byang chub spyod pa spyad par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bsti stang gang byed cing / /de bzhin gshegs la drin gzo ba/ /

yang dag sangs rgyas dpal ldan las/ /de dag rgyang mar mi gnas so/ /bdag nyid che ba 'di lta bu/ /gang gis thos mthong mkhas pa rnams/ /spyod yul thob par cis 'gyur ba'i/ /smon lam su zhig sbyong mi byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa'

ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas/ /mig gis gzugs rnams mthong gyur pa/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas byin rlabs kyis/ /dag pa'i

sems ldan rgyal ba mthong / /ji ltar brtson 'grus stobs ldan pa/ /rgya mtsho la ni 'jug par byed/ /de bzhin ye shes stobs ldan pas/ /bsam du med pa'i sangs rgyas mthong / /ji ltar sa bon rnam pa dag /zhing bzang la ni skyer 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin sems

bsam rnam dag la/ /sangs rgyas chos ni skye bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar nor gyi phung po yis/ /dbul ba thams cad spong byed pa/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag 'gyur/ /ji ltar dug tu gyur pa la/ /nad med dug sman

rgyal bar byed/ /de bzhin nyon mongs rnam pa la/ /rnam dag tshul ni spyod yul lo/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gang bsngags pa'i/ /dge ba'i bshes la brten byas na/ /de yi mthus ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos nyid 'di dag thos par 'gyur/ /

bskal pa bye ba grangs med par/ /sbyin pa mchog rnams sbyin byas kyang / /'di yi tshul la rab spyod pa'i/ /grangs dang char yang 'gro'o/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/ /mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par bris/ /brjod pas

yang dag sangs rgyas rnams/ /rgyal ba shes par mi nus so/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /gnas nas g.yo ba mnga' bar/ /sku ni kun tu rnam rgyu zhing / /chos kyi dbyings ni ston pa mdzad/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i khams

'di ni/ /nam yang rang bzhin mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang / /ngo bo nyid las 'gyur ba med/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs

bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /mi yi 'jig rten 'di kun dang / /lha yi gnas rnams thams cad dang / /'gro ba ma lus kun na yang / /mi yi gtso bo shin tu snang / /ji ltar sems dngos gcig

pu las/ /rnam pa tha dad sems brjod pa/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas sku gcig las/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brjod pa yin/ /byang chub gnyis su med pa brjod/ /byang chub de yang mtshan nyid med/ /mtshan gyis mngon par rnam bris pa'i/ /

sku rnams gnyis su snang bar gyur/ /mkha' dang chos kyi dbyings la zhugs/ /sgyu ma'i sa yang rab tu bstan/ /de phyir sangs rgyas de dag gi /spyod yul blta ba zad pa med/ /yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/ /mgon po thams cad

dus gsum du/ /ji ltar 'dul ba'i 'gro ba la/ /gzugs kyi sku yang rab tu snang / /'di 'dra'i lus su bdag gyur ces/ /sangs rgyas rtog par mi mdzad de/ /ston la rnam rtog mi mnga' yang / /byin gyi rlabs ni ston
pa mdzad/ /dbyer med pa yi dbyings la yang / /chos kyi dbyings ni yang dag gnas/ /'jig rten khams ni tshad med par/ /thub pas rnam par rtog pa bstan/ /sku ni sprul pa ma yin te/ /sprul pa pa'ang sku

ma yin/ /sprul pa med pa'i chos 'di yis/ /sprul pa rnams ni rab tu bstan/ /yang dag sangs rgyas tshad med pa/ /chos kyi dbyings la shin tu brten/ /mtha' dang dbus med rab tu zab/ /tshig gi lam gyis bzla bar
dka'/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i chos rnams la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don des mkhyen/ /zhing rnams kun la chags mi mnga'/ /chos kyi dbyings la rnam par spyod/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal

mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /kun mkhyen ye shes ma chags pa/ /de la zhugs par gang gyur pa/ /de yi sems ni tshad mi zin/ /

byang chub kyi ni spyad pa spyod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mang po rnams/ /yul dang yul du de dag snang / /chos rnams phyogs gcig gang la yang / /yang dag sangs rgyas gnas pa med/ /'jig rten sgron ma de dag gis/ /byin gyi

rlabs ni gang bstan pa/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par/ /'di yi mtha' ni rnyed par dka'/ /dus gsum rnams ni ji snyed pa'i/ /sems can rnams kyi mthar thug pa/ /bgrang ba'i mthar ni phyin par nus/ /'dren pa la ni mthar

thug / /de dag sku ni gcig tu snang / /sku gnyis de dag bsam mi khyab/ /'jig rten khams su snang gyur kyang / /sku la gnyis su gyur pa med/ /ji ltar zla ba shar gyur pa/ /tshad med pa yi gzugs brnyan rnams/ /chu yi snod du snang gyur kyang / /zla ba gnyis

su gyur pa / /de bzhin chags mkhyen ldan rnams/ /chags med rnam par 'tshang rgya ba/ /zhing rnams kun la rab tu snang / /sangs rgyas la ni gnyis kyang med/ /'di la gcig kyang yod ma yin/ /sku ni gnyis sam gsum du med/ /

ji ltar sems can bsam pa bzhin/ /tshad par ni rab tu snang / /sku ni 'das pa ma yin te/ /ma 'ongs pa'ang sku ma yin/ /skyes dang byang chub mya ngan 'das/ /skad cig gis ni rab tu snang / /ji ltar sgyu mar gyur pa'i gzugs/ /skyes pa

ma yin 'ongs pa / /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /skye ba par shin tu bstan/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs

su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /yang dag sangs rgyas tshad pas/ /tshad du sku yang rnam par bstan/ /ji ltar 'dul ba'i sems can rnams/ /de bzhin 'dren pa rab tu mthong / /sku la phyogs ni par brjod/ /sangs rgyas

yul ni ma lus khyab/ /bar snang nam mkha' ji lta bar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /der ni sems la 'pho ba / /sems la skye ba'ang yod ma yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni/ /skye ba la rab tu gnas/ /ji ltar

rab rib ldan pa'i /nang na cing phyi na'ang / /de bzhin 'jig rten sangs rgyas dag /nang na bzhugs phyi na'ang / /'jig rten kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rkang gnyis kyi ni mchog byung ste/ /'jig rten du ni ma byung ba yang / /'jig rten

dag tu skye bos mthong / /sangs rgyas rnams la zhing gnas/ /rgyal ba dag la nyin mtshan med/ /skad gcig ma yin zla ba / /rgyal ba la ni lo mi gnas/ /'jig rten dag na 'di skad brjod/ /nyi ma che ge mo zhig tu/ /rang byung byang chub rgyal

bas thob/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma rjes mi 'brang / /de la bskal pa yod ma yin/ /dus kyang ma lus med pa ste/ /dus gsum yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /mgon po rnams ni mnga' bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /nams kyang mtshan dang

mi gnas te/ /nyin mtshan zhes kyang rab tu brjod/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid do/ /bskal pa gcig dang dus gsum du/ /'dren pa bzhugs pa ma yin te/ /dus gsum zhes kyang rab tu brjod/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ltos/ de nas byang chub sems

dpa' rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /yang dag sangs rgyas sku gcig ste/ /'dren pa thams cad don

gcig kyang / /tshad gzhan dang gzhan dag tu/ /phyogs bcu kun nas rab tu snang / /gang gis ma lus thams cad kyi/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams kun khyab pas/ /sems can gtso bo thub pa yi/ /spyod yul rnams ni ci 'dra ltos/ /sangs rgyas

rnams kyi chos nyid ni/ /nang gi skus kyang snang ba / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs/ /phyi rol skus kyang snang ngo / /dus mang kun tu las rnams kyis/ /ji ltar las rnams bstsags pa bzhin/ /de bzhin so sor phye ba'i skus/ /rigs

su byung bar rab tu bstan/ /rgyal ba'i chos nyid ma gtogs par/ /sangs rgyas sku ni 'di 'dra ba/ /grangs su bgrang bar nus te/ /bsam pas lta yang shes nus/ /ji ltar bdag cag sems kyi las/ /bsam gyis khyab 'byung ba/ /de bzhin

sangs rgyas bsam khyab/ /sems kyi 'phrin las mnga'o/ /ji ltar zhing rnams bsam yas pa/ /sa la rnam par dag par mdzes/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /'gro ba dag na mdzes par snang / /ji ltar las rnams

'jug pa ni/ /rkyen gyis rab tu 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin rgyu rnams 'thun pa las/ /sangs rgyas shin tu mthong bar 'gyur/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal po ni/ /ji ltar yid bsam rdzogs byed pa/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang / /rtag tu

smon lam rdzogs par sgrub/ /mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten 'dir/ /'jig rten mgon po 'dren par 'gyur/ /de yi smon lam de dag gis/ /phyogs bcu 'di dag rgyal bas gang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i rgyal

mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas te/ /'jig rten chos rnams rnam par sbyong / /'jig rten chos rnams

rnam sbyangs nas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu brjod/ /de ste sems can mnyam sangs rgyas/ /sems can la la bsam byas na/ /rgyal ba de dag thams cad mthong / /sangs rgyas la ni gshegs pa med/ /sangs rgyas la ni dmigs

byas nas/ /sems kyis sangs rgyas pas na/ /sems bskyed pa dang rgyal mnyam par/ /de bzhin de dag rgyal ba mthong / /dkar po'i chos kyis nyer brtan cing / /gang gis grags pa rnam sbyangs pa/ /de dag thams cad sems bskyed

la/ /shes rab ldan pa rab tu bzhugs/ /pa dag dang byin gyi rlabs/ /yi gtso bo ston pa mdzad/ /de phyir pa kun tu yang / /sangs rgyas rgyal ba gshegs par brjod/ /'jig rten khams rnams 'di dag ni/ /sangs

rgyas sku rnams bdag gi / /sems la bdag gi med pa bstan/ /byang chub rtogs la bdag gi med/ /mi yi seng ge'i chos nyid dang / /dpa' ba'i stobs la rab tu gnas/ /lus dang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ste/ /snang ba'i sems dang mnyam

pa'i sku/ /ji ltar 'jig rten de bzhin sku/ /ji bzhin skur yang rgyal ba ste/ /sku yi rang bzhin shes pa ni/ /sangs rgyas chags pa med ces bya/ /sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa ste/ /chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs/ /sangs

rgyas chos dang byang chub rnams/ /gang la'ang pa med pa yin/ /sangs rgyas la ni gshegs pa / /sangs rgyas gang na'ang mi bzhugs te/ /yang dag sangs rgyas log pa med/ /de bzhin gshegs la len mi mnga'/ de nas byang chub

sems dpa' dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kun tu khyab/ /zhing gcig la ni mi gnas te/ /

thams cad du ni sangs rgyas gshegs/ /zhing rnams kun tu rab tu snang / /sangs rgyas sku ni thams cad du/ /byin gyi rlabs dag rab tu 'byung / /'tshang rgya chos kyi 'khor lo dang / /bsam pa bzhin du mya ngan 'da'/ /sangs rgyas la ni su zhig

sems/ /ci phyir sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /yang dag sangs rgyas su yis mthong / /rgyal ba sus kyang mthong mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar chos rnams chos nyid dang / /ji ltar sangs rgyas spyod yul du/ /gang dag chos rnams gcig tsam yang / /de

bzhin nyid la mi 'jug go /'di ni 'jig rten 'di rgyal zhes/ /'jig rten dag na rnam rtog yod/ /gang gis ngo bo nyid shes na/ /'jig rten de rgyal ba'ang med/ /'jig rten dad par bya ba'i phyir/ /mgon po dag ni mngon sum ston/ /de dag

gi ni lta ba 'di/ /shin tu par mi rung de/ /gang gis chags pa rnams bzlog cing / /chags pa med pa dga' byed pa/ /chags pa thams cad rnam bzlog nas/ /chags med chos nyid rtogs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhes brjod gang yin dang / /

gang gi rnam 'phrul snang gyur pa'i/ /chos ni dus gsum thams cad du/ /rnam pa kun du mi rnyed de/ /gang gis chos nyid 'di shes shing / /gang gis 'di bzhin yid shes na/ /thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs kun pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa myur du 'gyur/ /

sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pa/ /'di dag thams cad tshig gis bstan/ /yang dag sangs rgyas tshig lam / /tshig gi lam gyis rab tu brjod/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis

phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang gis rnam par 'phrul snang ba'i/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa bas/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad ni/ /sdug bsngal phung po blangs kyang bla/ /'gro ba

gang gis byang chub tu/ /sems ni nam yang ma bskyed pa/ /de dag gnas 'di thos gyur na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang gis bsam pa gcig gis kyang / /'di la mos byed mkhas pa ni/ /mi yi mchog tu mi 'gyur zhes/ /des

ni the tsom mi bya'o/ /de yi rnam par 'phrul pa ni/ /bskal pa bye ba'i bar du dkon/ /su zhig 'di la mos byed pa/ /de dag bla na med par 'gyur/ /brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /skad cig skad cig bsnyen bkur kyang / /'di yi tshul la ma

gnas na/ /de dag bsnyen bkur byas ma yin/ /gang las sangs rgyas brjod 'gyur ba'i/ /chos 'di gang gis thos gyur pa/ /des ni bde kun gyis kyang / /spyad pa rnams ni blang bar bya/ /ji tsam chos kyi dbyings rnams dang / /dus gsum gyi ni

mgon po yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni rten pa yi/ /ye shes chen po gcig thos nas/ /phyi mtha'i bskal pa bye ba rnams/ /zhing rnams re rer zad byas shing / /'di yi tshul ni brtson byed na/ /de la byang chub dkon pa / /sems can rnams kyi sngon

mtha' yi/ /'khor bar mi rnams gnas gyur kyang / /des ni sangs rgyas rab byung ba/ /chos nyid 'di ni shes ma gyur/ /chos rnams zhig par byas pa med/ /chos ni 'jig par mi 'gyur te/ /kun tu snang las rnam 'phrul pa/ /'jig rten dag tu

thams cad bstan/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu dgu pa'o// //sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po sum

cu pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan byang chub sems dpa'i

ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag du/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya

phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis zhal bstan pa mthong ste/ de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ mtshan rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sha stag go /phyogs gcig nas ji lta ba ltar phyogs bcu nas kyang de bzhin te/ de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis

'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so legs so/ /'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs bcu nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs

rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyang mtshan 'thun pa sha stag gis/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / khyod kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / spobs pa chags pa med par bya ba dang / ye shes kyis bsgribs pa pa'i sar 'jug par bya ba dang /

thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems yangs pa la rab tu 'jug par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba zad pa phun sum tshogs par bya ba dang / bsgribs pa pa'i chos dkar po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la sgo kun nas 'jug par bya ba dang /

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho 'phrul bstan par bya ba dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i ye shes dang / dran pa rgyun mi chod par rnam par dag par bya ba dang / dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs par bya ba dang /

chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa bstan par bya ba dang / shes pa kun tu gzung bar bya ba dang / 'di lta ste/ yongs su bsngo ba bcu yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzung bar bya ba dang / 'jig rten

las 'das pa'i tshogs rnams rab tu bstan par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mi chod par bya ba dang / smon lam chen po'i skabs dbye bar bya ba dang / don shin tu bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes

par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yid rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srid pa gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'thun pa la bsten par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par gzung bar

bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlab pa mdzad kyis/ kye rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyis brtan pa dang / gzungs kyi snang ba la zhugs pa dang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgribs pa med pa la zhugs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i chos nyid du bya ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dkar po yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi spyod yul yangs pa la gnas pa dang / bsgribs pa med pa'i chos

snang ba la gnas pas chos bstan pa 'di brjod pa dang / bstan pa'i phyir spobs par gyis shig /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes tshad med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /spobs

pa chags pa pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /bsgribs pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku dang gcig pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /tshad

med pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad nyams pa med par

yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /chos thams cad kyi lhag mthong mngon par bskyed pa la mkhas pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /chos thams cad bstan pa'i gnas rgyun mi chad pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyi phyir ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi phyag g.yas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi spyi bo la byug pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan la reg ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin de las rnam par langs te langs nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam

'di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad khyab par byed pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'das pa'i sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba la slob bo/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba la slob par 'gyur ro/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba la slob bo/ /

kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bsngo ba gang la bsams te de skad du smras pa de dag ni gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag yongs su bsngo ba'i grangs du zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bsngo ba bcu po 'di dag

ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi 'du shes 'gog cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su

skyob pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba dang po dang / mi phyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gnyis pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems

dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gsum pa dang / thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bzhi pa dang / bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba

lnga pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba drug pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su

bsngo ba bdun pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba brgyad pa dang / chags pa med cing bcings pa dang dgrol ba pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su

bsngo ba dgu pa dang / chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bcu po de dag ni/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa

dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba dang po sems can rnams kyi

'du shes 'gog cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la rab tu sbyor ba'am tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par sbyong ba'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa la sems pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtsom pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par dpyod pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa'am/ byams pa bsgom pa yang dag par skyed pa'am/ snying rjes snying

brtse bar byed pa'am/ dga' ba la rab tu dga' bar byed pa'am/ btang snyoms la shin tu gnas pa byed kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la shin tu bsams nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang de dag la rab tu sbyor zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad pa rnam par phye nas/

'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i ngan song rgyun chad par 'gyur ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par ldog par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'gro ba thams cad

la rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par phan 'dogs pa gang yin zhes sems skyed do/ /de de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par bskyed pa na/ 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir

bdag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur cig /nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir bdag sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen du gyur cig /'jigs pa kun las bsrung ba'i phyir bdag sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su

gyur cig /thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi lam du gyur cig /shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur cig /rab rib pa'i ye shes snang ba

yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi snang bar gyur cig /ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par bsal ba'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi sgron mar gyur cig /shin tu dag pa la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/ bdag sems

can thams cad kyi mar mer gyur cig /chos kyi tshul la gzud pa'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur cig /bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phung po bstan pa'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi yongs su 'dren par gyur

cig ces/ de de ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar shin tu thug par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste/ ji ltar mdza' ba bsrung ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba de ltar mi mdza' ba bsrung ba'i phyir yang yongs su bsngo'o/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bdag tu bya ba'i bsam pas mi mdza' ba ni gang yang de/ de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la yang dag par byung ba ste/ de 'di snyam

du byang chub sems dpa' la mi mdza' ba'i don byed pa de dag thams cad ni bdag gi rgyud la dgod dgod pa yin no zhes te/ de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi yul thams cad la zhe sdang ba pa'i mig gis lta'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i chos yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir 'jug go /'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dug thams cad kyis gdug par bya bar mi nus so/ /

de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang drin mi gzo ba dang / blo zhen pa dang / sems 'khrug pa dang / rnyog pa dang / mun par gyur pa dang / rang bzhin stor ba dang / rlom sems dang ldan pa dang / sgrub pa nyams pa dang /

sems rmus long lta bur gyur pa'i sems can byis pa thams cad kyis skyon can du mi nus so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu nyi ma 'char ba de ni rmus long gi skyon gyis 'char ba la thogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /dri za'i grong khyer gyi skyon gyis thogs

par mi 'gyur ro/ /gling bzhi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa'i rdul gyi skyon gyis thogs par 'gyur ro/ /lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyi skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /du ba 'khrigs pa'i skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dzam bu'i

gling gi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /grib ma sna tshogs kyi skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /dug gi ri'i skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /khams kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /

dus yongs su 'gyur ba'i skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa can yang dag par shes pa dang ldan pa/ sems kyi bdag nyid che ba nyid shin tu zab cing yangs pa yid la yang dag par rtog pa/

mi zhan pa yon tan spyad pas ye shes mthar gyur pa chos la shin tu dad pa'i sems mngon par skyes pa/ chos kyi snang ba'i 'od kyis rab tu snang ba don thams cad mthong ba chos mngon par shes pa ye shes rig pa spyod pa med pa lhur byed pa/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos spyod pa la rab

tu sbyor ba/ sems can thams cad kyis nyes par sems bskyed pa la 'khrul pa med pa de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba na/ gnod par byed pa thams cad kyi skyon gyis thogs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can mi srun pa'i tshul gyis ldog par

'gyur ro/ /sems can gyi lta ba'i rnyog pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can gyi sems 'khrugs pas ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud stor bas byang chub sems dpa'i go cha chen po

bgos pa las ring bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i smon lam dkrugs ma'i rnyog pa thams cad kyis bcil bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa chen po sems can drin du mi gzo ba mthong bas lhod par mi

'gyur ro/ /byang chub tu pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can mi srun pa'i dbang pos zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin las byis pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa las 'phang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can gzhan gyi skyon gyis skyo

bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni bsgribs pa med par 'gro ba thams cad/ rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'byung ba ste/ /sems can gcig la shing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ma yin/ 'di lta ste/ zhing rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir zhing gcig la te/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la mngon par spro ba ma yin/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas

lta ba rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas gcig la te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dad pa skye ba ma yin/ 'di lta ste ye shes gcig rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir ye shes gcig la nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi

smon lam skye ba ma yin gyi 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o/ /zhing thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod cing rim

gror bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad blta ba la nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dad pa skye'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyis rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba rnams kyi smon lam skye'o/ /de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi stobs la dmigs pa la sems yangs pa/

bsam pa ma 'khrugs pa/ bskal pa thams cad du shin tu dkon pa'i sems rin po che dang ldan pa rnams kyi sems ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir rab tu skyes te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par mthong nas/ sems dad pa chen po rnam par dag pa dang / snying rje chen pos brtan pas bsngo zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo ste de yang tshig tsam du ma yin gyi bsam pa thag pas

yongs su bsngo'o/ /de yang dga' ba'i sems dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang / dad pa'i sems dang / mos pa'i sems dang / 'jam pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / nye ba'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems

dang / phan gdags pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/ /de yang 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba rnam par dag par gyur cig /skye ba yongs su dag par gyur cig /bsod

nams kyi bdag nyid che ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /zil gyis mi non par gyur cig /mi zad par gyur cig /thub par dka' ba'i sems su gyur cig /dran pa nyams pa med par gyur cig /rtogs pa nges par gyur cig /blo tshad med par

gyur cig /lus kyi las dang ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kyi yon tan gyi rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mnyes

par byas nas kyang thugs 'byung ba med par gyur cig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mi phyed pa'i dad pa yang thob par gyur cig /de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis

chos bstan pa thob par gyur cig /thos nas kyang the tsom dang yid gnyis med par gyur cig /yang dag par 'dzin cing nan tan gyis bsgrub par gyur cig /sems can gyi dga' ba nyid kyang thob par gyur cig /kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus kyi las kyang

yang dag par grub par gyur cig /dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po la bdag rab tu gzhog par gyur cig /shin tu dbul ba dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig /nor bdun 'thob pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su yang

slob par gyur cig /dge ba'i dbang po 'thob par bya ba'ang thob par gyur cig /mos pa chen po'i mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi go yang rnyed par gyur cig /'gro ba thams cad du nyams pa med

pa'i mig kyang rnyed par gyur cig /mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs pa yang thob par gyur cig /yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i tshig rnam par dag pa yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /dbang po bsdams shing stobs bcu

dang ldan pa'i sems dge ba yang yang dag par grub par gyur cig /gnas med par spyod pa yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba'i rim gro gang dang ldan pa'i bde ba'i rim gro de dag sems can thams cad kyis thob par gyur cig

sangs rgyas kyi gnas rab tu thob pas tshad med pa'i gnas su gyur cig /sems can de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po sgrib pa'i las sna tshogs las byung ba/ sgrib pa'i las de dag gis bsgribs pas sangs rgyas mi mthong ba

dang / chos mi thos pa dang / dge 'dun mi shes pa'i bsgribs pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bstsags pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po de dag bdag gi lus 'dis sems can dmyal ba'i skye gnas dang / ngan song gi sa'i gnas de dang de dag du blang bar bya'o/ /

sems can de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis de nas bton te/ bdag gis de dag gi sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa de dag blang bar bya'o/ /spro bar bya'o/ /mi ldog par bya'o/ /de las mi 'bros par bya'o/ /mi skrag par bya'o/ /mi 'jigs par bya'o/ /

phyir mi ldog par bya'o/ /zhum pa med par bya'o/ /mi skyo bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis ni sems can thams cad bsgral bar smon lam btab pas na sems can thams cad kyi khur bkur dgos so/ /'di ltar bdag gis sems can thams cad

yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o/ /skye ba'i dgon pa dang / rga ba dang na ba'i dgon pa dang / 'chi ba'i dgon pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'i dgon pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dgon pa dang /

mi khom pa thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / 'khod pa thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / lta ba'i thibs po thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad stong ba'i dgon pa dang / mi shes pa las byung ba'i dgon pa dang / dgon pa de dag thams cad

nas bdag gis sems can srid pa'i dra bas 'khrigs pa/ ma rig pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa/ srid pa'i sred pa dang ldan pa/ zhen pa'i mthar gyur pa/ sdug bsngal gyi shing thags kyis bskor ba/ bdud kyi las la rten pa/ mi mkhas pa/ bsod nams

'gags pa/ the tsom du gyur pa/ rtag tu yid gnyis dang ldan pa/ mi bde ba mthong ba/ 'byung ba la mi mkhas pa/ tshub mas bskor ba'i lo ma lta bur 'khor zhing 'phyan pa de dag thams cad yongs su thar bar bya'o/ /zhes de la byang chub sems dpa'i

snying rje chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pas sems can gyi khams 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba mthong nas/ sems can de dag la snying brtse ba chen po skyes pa/ phan cher gdags pa'i sems rab tu bskyed pa/ sems can rnams kyi don chen

po bya bar dga' ba sems can mang po rab tu 'grol bar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba/ yongs su bsngo ba chen po la zhugs pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba la rab tu zhugs pa/

bsngo ba chen po'i mdos sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba/ sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag par bya bar sems pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug par

yongs su bsngo ba de sems 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal srid la rab tu gzhag pa'i phyir bdag spyod de/ bdag ni bdag 'ba' shig yongs su dgrol ba la mngon par zhugs pa ma yin gyis/ bdag

gis sems can 'di dag kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rab tu snang bas 'khor ba'i dgon pa brgal dka' ba nas gdon par bya'o/ /g.yang sa chen po nas blang bar bya'o/ /gnod pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/ /'khor ba'i rgyud

las rab tu bsgral bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po blang bar spro bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can de dag thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po'i sa'i 'og nas drang bar bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams

kyi mthar thug pa thams cad kyi ngan song kun gyi sdug bsngal thams cad blangs te nyams su myong bar bya ba la bdag gis spro bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba las mi spang bar bya'o/ /sems can thams cad

yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir bdag ngan song gcig nas phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par gnas par spro bar bya'o/ /ngan song gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i ngan song thams cad du gnas par spro bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ kyi hud sems can 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi gnas su lhung babs ni bdag gcig pu sdug bsngal myong bar bla'i bdag gis der bdag nyid gtar bcug ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i

'jig rten gyi dgon pa nas/ 'gro ba thams cad blus te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdug bsngal tshor ba'i phung po 'di dag thams cad bdag gis lus 'dis myong bar bya'o/ /bdag gis ni sems can thams cad kyi gnya' bden

par smra ba dang / yid ches shing mi bslu bar spro bar bya'i bdag la ni sems can thams cad kyis ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/ bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems/ sems

can thams cad la pa skye ste/ bdag nyid 'dod pa'i phyir ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs so/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' zhing spyod pa'i phyir yang ma yin no/ /'dod pa'i yul la bsnyen pa'i phyir yang ma yin

no/ /'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i dga' ba mang po gzhan blang ba'i phyir yang byang chub kyi spyod pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi dga' ba 'di dag thams cad ni dgra yin no/ /'dod pa la bsten pa 'di ni bdud kyi yul lo/ /

'dod pa la bsten pa de ni blo ngan pas bstan pa'i lam mo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis smad pa'i yul lo/ /de dag la bsten pa de las sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de las sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye

gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de las sems can rnams 'thab pa dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / gnad la 'bebs pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / kun tu 'khrug pa rnams kyang rab tu 'byung

ngo / /sems can 'di dag ni 'dod pa la bsten pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las ring du gyur pa ste/ 'dod pa de dag ni mtho ris su skye ba la yang bar du gcod na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la lta smos kyang ci

dgos te/ sems can thams cad kyi bde ba dang / dga' ba thams cad kyi yang bar chad du 'gyur ro/ /de ltar bdag gis 'dod pa ni ro chung zhing tshad med pa'i nyes pa can du mthong na/ ci yang de dag spyod pa'i phyir 'jug gam/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

bdag ni don 'di dag gi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa ma yin no/ /'dod pa la dga' ba'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi spyod de/ de bas na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar zhugs pa'i

sems bskyed de/ bdag ni 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir de dag nyid kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bsngo zhing bsgrub pa'i phyir don de la zhugs pa ste/ de bas na bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal gyi zhags

pas bcings pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi zhags pa bcad de/ sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/ /sdug bsngal gyi rgyud las rnam par bzlog par bya'o/ /bdag gis ji lta ji ltar sems can 'di dag thams cad shin

tu bde ba dang / phan par 'gyur ba'i bde ba dang / tshor ba med pa'i bde ba dang / zhi ba'i bde ba dang / mi gnas pa'i bde ba dang / mi g.yo ba'i bde ba dang / tshad med pa'i bde ba dang / mnyams pa'i bde ba dang / mi 'gag pa'i

bde ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /bdag kha lo sgyur ba dang / bdag mgon po dang / bdag me sgron 'dzin pa dang / bdag lam bde ba ston pa dang /

bdag khom pa rnyed pa dang / bdag thabs la mkhas pa dang / bdag don shes pa dang / bdag 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la thams cad mkhyen pa'i gru bo che'i mnyan par gyur pa dang / bdag yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa dang / bdag pha rol ston pas dge ba'i rtsa

ba de dag ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ba dang / 'khor bar gyur pa rnams yongs su rgal bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsgribs pa med par 'gyur ba dang /

bdud kyi yul rnams la mi gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i grogs po thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bsten par 'gyur ba dang / las rnam par dag pa la kha na

ma tho ba med par 'gyur ba dang / spyad pa chen po'i smon lam rnams yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su

bsngo ba na sems 'di snyam du bskyed de/ kye ma gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar bya ba'i phyir/ gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed pa de snyed kyi nyi ma ni mi 'char gyi gling bzhi'i 'jig rten snang bar bya ba'i phyir nyi ma 'di nyid

gcig pu 'char te/ sems can gling bzhir gtogs pa de dag rang rang gi lus las kyang snang ba gang gis de dag gis nyi ma'i grangs shes par 'gyur ba'am/ rang gi don bsgrub par 'gyur ba'am/ lo tog yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'am/ nyin gcig nyin

gcig cing bza' shing gi ra ba dang / grong khyer dag tu dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'gyur ba'am/ phyogs snang bar 'gyur ba'am/ grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag tu 'gro ba dang 'ong bar bya

ba 'am/ spyod pa'i don sbyar bar bya ba'i snang ba mi 'byung ste/ sems can de dag rang rang gi lus la yang 'od gang gis de dag gi don bsgrub pa'i 'od de lta bu mi gtong ste/ 'di ltar lha'i bu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig pu gnyis su med pa de ni gling bzhi'i 'jig

rten gyi khams su sems can rnams la snang bar bya ba'i phyir 'char zhing rab tu 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba na sems 'di ltar skye ste/ sems can 'di dag thams cad la gang gis de dag bdag nyid yongs su

bskyab par bya ba de nyid kyang med na/ gzhan bskyab pa lta ci smos kyi bdag nyid gcig pu gnyis su med pas/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'di ltar sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad snang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams
cad gsal bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad shes par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad gzung bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bsdu bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bskyed par bya

ba dang / sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bsdu'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /bdag gis ni

nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de lta bur bya ste/ gzhan las phan pa'i lan re bar mi bya'o/ /gzhan gyis skabs mi rnyed par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi phyir go cha mi 'dor bar bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi don du spro ba mi bzlog par

bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi bde ba bsgrub pa'i yongs su bsngo ba las phyir ldog par mi bya'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu yang bsdu bar bya ste/ yongs su bsngo ba chung ngus yongs su bsngo zhing dga' bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba phan par mi 'gyur ba rnams ni

sems can rnams la bsngo bar mi bya ste/ ci nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la bde bar 'gyur ba de ltar bsngo'o/ /mngon par chags pa med pa'i chos nyid la rten te/ yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /sems can rnams kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs

su bsngo bar bya'o zhes te/ de ni 'pho ba'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba la gnas pa ma yin/ srid pa la mngon par chags pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la mi gnas so/ /mtshan ma'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su mi bsngo'o/ /dngos po la

mngon par chags pa'i phyir las kyi rnam par smin pa la yongs su mi rtog go /phung po rnams kyi 'du shes la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o/ /phung po 'jig pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o/ /las rnam par rtog pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o/ /rnam par smin pa la re bas

ma yin no/ /brten pas bsnyems shing ma yin no/ /'brel par 'byung ba la kun tu rtog pas ma yin no/ /grags pa la gnas pas ma yin no/ /gnas kyi 'du shes la gnas pas ma yin no/ /gnas su rtog pa la gnas pas ma yin no/ /chos la rnam par

rtog pa la gnas pas ma yin no/ /sems can gyi 'du shes la gnas pas ma yin te/ khams kyi tshul rnam pa tha dad pa'i rjes su song bas yongs su mi bsngo'o/ /sems kyi kun tu rtog pa la gnas te/ yongs su mi bsngo'o/ /sems kyi phyin

ci log la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o/ /'du shes phyin ci log la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o/ /lta ba phyin ci log la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o/ /tshig gi lam la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o/ /de ni 'di ltar chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin rnam par

dpyod cing yongs su bsngo'o/ /sems can rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid la sems shing yongs su bsngo'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyas btab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba dang mnyam pa'i chos kyis yongs su brtags pa'i dge

ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/ /chos thams cad la sgro gdags pa med par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rjes su rtogs par byed do/ /gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par lta zhing yongs su bsngo ba de dag la rab tu 'jug ste/ chos gang yang skye ba

'am/ 'gag par byed pa med do/ /de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste/ gnyen pos yongs su dag pas bsngo ba de dag la yang dag par spyod do/ /'jig rten las 'das pa 'byam klas pa'i rjes su song ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mthong ste/ gnyis

kyi tshul gyis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad khong du chud par mi byed do/ /las kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par mi spyod do/ /las las gzhan du yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su mi bsngo'o/ /las gang yin pa de yang thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid la yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /las kyi lam dang bral bas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam thob par mi 'gyur te las kyi gzugs brnyan gyis rnam par smin pa'i gzugs brnyan yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par smin pa'i gzugs brnyan

yongs su dag pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bsngo ba de g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang rnam par spyod pa dang bral bar yang rab tu shes so/ /des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/ /yongs su bsngo ba 'dis

yongs su bsngos pas sems can rab tu dgrol ba rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba 'dis yongs su bsngo ba na/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la gnas pa'ang mi gtod ste/ las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i chos

thams cad la nyon mongs pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis las dang rnam par smin pa bsgrub pa la mngon par mkhas pa yin no/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

rjes su spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba sems can rnams kyi 'du shes 'gog cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba ste dang po'o /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bltas nas/ don dang tshig dang yi ge la 'jug par bya ba dang / sems rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su

bsgom pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad snying rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi gdung la sems yang dag par 'brel par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yon tan thams cad la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rab tu dbye ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i dus la ji ltar 'bab pa yang dag par blta ba dang / chos kyi las dang 'thun pa'i gzugs kyi lus

yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang zhig bsam yas bskal par spyod pa dag /sems can phan

phyir rtag tu zhugs pa ste/ /de dag brtson brtan chags med yid ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu sbyor zhing tshol/ /gang zhig mtshungs med skyes bu 'dul drung du/ /bsam pa dri ma med par rnam sbyangs shing / /chos mkhas 'gro ba

bskyab pa'i sems ldan pa/ /de dag yongs bsngo'i mdzod du zhugs pa yin/ /brtson 'grus stobs dang de dag nyer ldan zhing / /ye shes stobs kyis rnam dag yid gzhung ste/ /bzod pa'i stobs ldan sgul bar mi nus pa/ /de dag 'gro ba kun skyob mngon

par brtson/ /shin tu yid brtan mtshungs pa med pa dang / /bsam pa rnam dag dga' ba'i blo ldan pa/ /de dag sa dang 'dra ba'i bzod stobs kyis/ /'gro ba kun la phan phyir mngon par brtson/ /bdag la bde ba tshol bar mi byed de/ /snying rje

can gyis bsam pa de 'dra'o/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab sems can/ /chags med gyur par de dag zhugs pa yin/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed gang yang rung / /'gro ba kun nas ma lus bsdu byas te/ /de dag don du brtan

sems ldan pa rnams/ /de dag yongs su bsngo tshul bslabs pa yin/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtong bar byed/ /skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims rnam dag pa/ /brtson 'grus stobs la brtan par gnas pa'i sems/ /de dag ye shes

dge bas yongs su bsu bsngo/ /de dag blo gros yangs shing mtha' yas pa/ /bzod pa'i stobs la rtag par rab tu zhugs/ /bsam gtan stobs la rjes su sems pas na/ /mkhas pa de dag shes rab bsam mi khyab/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun na gang yod pa'i/ /

dge ba de dag yang dag bsgrub pa na/ /'gro ba kun la phan dang bde sems kyis/ /ye shes mkhas la de dag yongs su bsngo/ /dge ba de dag gang la tshad med pa/ /brtan pa de dag yongs su sdud pa'i tshe/ /de la rtag brtson dam pa'i blo gros can/ /
bsam yas ye shes la ni rab tu gzhog /de dag 'gro ba'i don du mnar med par/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas par spro/ /de dag yid ni zhum par mi 'gyur te/ /de dag bsngo rtogs bsam pa'i yid dang

ldan/ /gzugs tshol mi byed sgra dang dri ma yin/ /ro dang reg pa de bzhin mi tshol te/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol sems kyis/ /ye shes dam pa'i stobs ni rtag tu tshol/ /mkhas pa de dag ye shes mkha' 'dra bas/ /

mtha' dang dbus med spyad pa spyod pa byed/ /rgyal ba'i chos kyi chos nyid ci 'dra ba/ /mtha' yas grags pa'i spyod pa de 'dra'o/ /de dag gang dang gang du 'dong byed pa/ /'gro la bde ba rgya chen rab tu sgrub/ /rtag tu mchog brtson dga'

ba byed pa ste/ /byang chub spyod pas dga' ba tshol ba med/ /gdug med sems la gnas shing zhugs pa rnams/ /ye shes dam pa mchog la rjes su sems/ /de dag bdag la bde bar mi 'dod de/ /'gro ba kun la bde dang dga' phyir

brtson/ /de dag yongs su bsngo ba mthar phyin dang / /bsam pa gdug med rnam par dag yid kyis/ /dus gsum rgyal ba gang na bzhugs bzhugs pa'i/ /chos kyi grong rdal de na rab tu gnas/ /gzugs dang tshor ba dag la mi gnas shing / /

'du shes 'du byed yid la 'dam yin te/ /srid pa gsum las yongs su yid bskyod de/ /bsod nams gter la de dag yongs su bsngo/ /sems can ji snyed rgyal bas sad byas pa/ /'gro ba kun nas ma lus bsdu byas te/ /skyes bu dam

pa de dag dgrol ba'i phyir/ /spyod pa'i mchog la gang zhig brtson byed pa/ /de dag rnam pa kun tu sems brtan te/ /de dag blo gros yangs pa gzhal du med/ /de dag dran pa'i dbang po ma nyams pa/ /de dag mnyam gzhag bsam pa rnam par

dag /'jig rten 'di'i nang dang phyi rnams su/ /gang du'ang de dag gnas 'char mi byed de/ /mkha' la rlung dang rlung mar ci 'dra ba/ /phyogs rnams kun du sems ni de bzhin no/ /de dag lus kyi las rnams brtson byed pa/ /des ni

rgyal ba mngon par mnyes par byed/ /rgyal ba rnams la ngag kyang bsdams pa ste/ /yid kyis de dag zhugs pa gang yang med/ /mi yi dbang po gang na bzhugs pa'i zhing / /mtha' yas zhing du de dag 'dong byed cing / /de dag kun tu thugs rje

rgyal ba mthong / /rgyal ba rim gro byas shing de nas 'dong / /de dag rtag tu kha na ma tho med/ /'gro ba kun na de dag 'jigs pa med/ /de dag srid gsum 'di na mu stegs byed/ /de dag bde gshegs lam la gnas pa yin/ /de dag rnam

par sgom zhing mngon brtson pa/ /skye dang 'jig pa'i tshul la rjes su sems/ /chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rab tu zhugs/ /nyon mongs med pa'i tshul la rab tu zhugs pa yin/ /gang gis spyod pa rab tu brtan gyur cing / /'gro ba kun las shes pa mi ldog

pa/ /de 'dra'i chos nyid de dag rjes su sems/ /des ni dus gsum chags pa med par 'gyur/ /gang rnams 'gro ba rnam par dag byed pa/ /de dag yongs su bsngo ba'i pha rol phyin/ /de dag gnas rnams thams cad phyir bzlog pas/ /

de phyir de dag spyod la mi gnas so/ /'gro ba kun kyi tshig lam ji snyed dang / /skye dgu thams cad smra zhing mngon brjod pa/ /de dag smra yang rlom sems med pa yin/ /chags med yid ldan spyod pa 'di 'dra'o/ /bsod nams tshul la blo

gros mtha' yas pa/ /de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bas na/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs pa ji snyed pa'i/ /mi yi dbang po de dag mnyes pa yin/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba ste/ yongs su bsngo ba dang po'o/ /

kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba mi phyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba gnyis pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / rgyud kyi tshul

gcig par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa gcig thob pa yan chad kun la yang mi phyed par dad pa yin/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la

mi phyed par dad pa yin/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ bstan pa yang dag par gzung zhing bsrung ba'i phyir/ de dang de dag du skyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mi phyed par dad pa yin/ 'di lta ste/ sdang ba med pa'i mig

rab tu 'thob pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi don du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin/ 'di lta ste/ mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya zhing / yang dag par bsgrub

pa'i phyir chos dkar po thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba la mi phyed par dad pa yin/ 'di lta ste/ ston pa'i 'du

shes yongs su ma rgyas pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ chos smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dad par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang

cho 'phrul la mi phyed par dad pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa/ rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par gzung ba dmigs pa kun tu rgyu ba/ gzhan dang gzhan can de dag thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin te/ de ltar

mi phyed pa'i gnas rab tu thob pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung ste/ sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'am/

sems can rnams la pa gang dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs sam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa'am/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnam par 'phel bar bya ba 'am/ byams pa bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pas kyang rung ste/

snying rje chen po yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ yang dag par mthong bas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yangs par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su nan tan du bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

yang dag par bsdu ba dang / don shes pa la yang dag par 'jug par bya ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sbyin pa'i tshogs rab tu brtsam pa dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs la rab tu 'jug par bya ba dang / dus gsum

mnyam pa nyid du rnam par dpyod par byed cing / de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshogs bsag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad blta ba dang mi 'bral ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad

dang mi 'bral ba rab tu thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mi 'bral bar 'grogs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par gzung zhing bsrung ba

dang mi 'bral ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das par sems bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos smra ba thams cad phu dud

du bya ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos kyi snang ba thams cad thob pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / smon lam chen po rab tu brtson par bya ba dang mi 'bral bar yongs su bsngo'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par sgrub cing / yang

dag par sdud pa dang / nye bar bapa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / sems pa dang / par byed pa dang / rab tu rtog pa dang / yang dag par smon pa dang / kun tu spyod pa dang / nye bar ston pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar yongs su

bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag 'di ltar bsgrubs pa las/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu 'thun pa'i 'bras bu gang byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / rgyu 'thun pa'i 'bras bu des bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems kyi skad cig re re la brjod du med pa'i

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar gyur cig /de dag kyang mnyes par byed par gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang / sangs rgyas kyi rim gro rgya chen po byed par gyur cig /

rin po che grangs med pa dang / me tog grangs med pa dang / dri grangs med pa dang / 'phreng ba grangs med pa dang / na bza' grangs med pa dang / gdugs grangs med pa dang / rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang / ba dan grangs med pa dang / rgyan

grangs med pa dang / lhab lhub grangs med pa dang / rim gro grangs med pa dang / byug pa grangs med pa dang / rnam par byug pa grangs med pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang / spos thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa

dang / 'phreng ba thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang / tsan dan bzang po thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang / gos thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang / rdo rje thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che thams

cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang / rin po che'i spang leb thams cad kyi gdan grangs med pa dang / rin po che'i kha dog gi gdan grangs med pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'chag sa grangs med pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi

'chag sa grangs med pa dang / spos thams cad kyi 'chag sa grangs med pa dang / phreng ba'i rgyan thams cad kyi 'chag sa grangs med pa dang / gos thams cad kyi 'chag sa grangs med pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyis sna tshogs su

spras pa'i 'chag sa grangs med pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi spang leb bting ba'i 'chag sa grangs med pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi shing ta la'i phreng ba bsgreng ba'i 'chag sa grangs med pa dang / rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba'i 'chag

sa grangs med pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra bas kun nas yog par byed pa'i 'chag sa grangs med pa dang / lha rdzas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'i rin po che'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / lha rdzas thams cad las shin tu

'das pa'i me tog thams cad kyi gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / lha rdzas las shin tu 'das pa'i spos thams cad kyi gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / lha rdzas las shin tu 'das pa'i phreng ba thams cad kyi gtsug lag khang grangs med

pa dang / lha rdzas las shin tu 'das pa'i tsan+dan thams cad kyi gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / lha rdzas las shin tu 'das pa'i spos dang gdug pa mchog dam pa thams cad kyi gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / lha rdzas thams cad

las shin tu 'das pa'i rdo rje'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / spos kyi shing dang / gos kyi shing dang / rol mo'i shing dang / lhab lhub kyi shing dang / shing

sna tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba'i shing grangs med pa dang / snam bu rin po che sbyangs pa'i shing grangs med pa dang / rin po che mang po'i shing grangs med pa dang / me tog dang /

phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad grangs med pa dang / shing thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pa dang / ba gam gyi rgyan grangs med pa dang / skar khung gi

rgyan grangs med pa dang / rta babs kyi rgyan grangs med pa dang / pu shu'i rgyan dang / zla gam gyi rgyan dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgyan dang / bla re'i rgyan grangs med pa dang / gser gyi dra ba'i khab grangs med pa dang / spos dang / bdug pa dam

pa thams cad kyi rgyan grangs med pa dang / gos thams cad gding bar bting ba'i rgyan gyis thams cad rab tu brgyan pa'i gtsug lag khang grangs med pas bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig /de ltar mchod pa rgya chen po sbyar te/ sangs rgyas thams

cad la yid kyi dbang po shin tu dang bas mchod pa dang / rim gro rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / sangs rgyas phu dud du bya ba'i phyir mi ldog pa las byung bas phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rim gro bya bas bskal pa

brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zad par gyur cig /'gro ba thams cad dad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdu ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems rgya chen po bskyed pa

la mos par bya ba dang / rgyan chen pos yang dag par brgyan pa dang / tshad med par rnam par bre ba'i rgyan dang / brtsams pa mthar phyin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dkon pa brjod par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i

stobs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / mchod rten sna tshogs bsnyen bkur bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba la de lta bu'i rim gro byed pa dang /

de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi sku gdung mchod pa la rab tu brtson par bya bas/ bskal pa grangs med pa zad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba'i rgyan dang / brjod pa
